story:
About The Project


It's about hats! The fashion-accessory which over centuries has had various styles. Our product in this case is a mixture of different styles for women, which can bring to mind the 30's, 70's and also earlier times. 


But in this case it is the use of materials with a modern twist that has given the hats a new image, which in this case is neither ceremonial nor the usual wool bonnet; instead it's an object that can enhance your image!


Materials include high quality Boiled Wool and Jersey made by one of the best brands in the world; the Austrian Moessmer. 


We also use certain delicate fabrics in various band types around head to avoid irritating the forehead and face.


The most interesting part of all that we have brought in a modern way is a detail that was not being used anymore: The velette.


But by plasticizing the velette we have obtained a hard tissue, a rigid reticulated plastic tissue:


Using the velette in this way reveals the face like in the old days, but by a modern twist which gives the hat a much more sporty theme, though still elegant. 


What is unique about this object is that it can have your daily usage according to whatever dress code you're using; Ceremonial, formal, semi-formal, informal or casual, no matter what you choose for your daily outfit you can easily level up your public image.

Please also see the photo gallery.

Sizes & Colors

  • Sizes are: S (54/56), M (56/58), L (58/60). Numbers indicate the circumference of the head. Putting the measuring tool on the forehead and doing a closed circle going towards back of the head and returning,
  • Colors are many. The more commons are: Gray, Brown (light, dark), Black, Dark Gray, Dark Red, Beige, Blue, Navy, White (Milky), Green, Loden, Dark Green, Yellow. +Any combination of colors.

About The Goal

Achieving the goal will help me order raw material just enough to start producing the Cloches by large scales and in various colors. Also I would need to hire two skilled tailors to give me a hand.

About Me

My name is Alberto Lusona, I'm an Italian fashion designer and style enthusiast.

  • After over 30 years of work, I'm still passionate about doing what I do best and what I love to contribute to life and to manners of living.
  • I have designed tens of seasonal collections and have participated in tens of fashion shows as a fashion designer or as we say in Italian: as a "stilista"
  • But I'm still excited to offer new things and to do them in new ways like on Indiegogo.

About What I Do Here

  • The projects that I will share here will be my side-projects in which there is more creativity involved than in my regular fashion collections. 
  • Most of the projects are prefered to be stand-alone items rather than belonging to a collection. However some of them may have appreared in some past collections as complementary objects.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you're not interested but know someone who might be impressed by this collection, please share this project with them on any of the social networking services.

Thank you and see you again with more projects!!

story:
Who is Tattoo My Shoes?

  • Hi, My name is Ernie Moreno I am the owner and artist of www.tattoomyshoes.com
  • I have multiple examples of each of my shoes at my site, so I encourage you to visit me to see what is possible on a pair of shoes!
  • As a former tattoo artist I wanted to share the art-form with people that may love the art, but are not wanting a lifetime commitment to one design, I also wanted to stop filling notebooks and sketch pads with designs that were just going to sit and gather dust
  • The reason I started this campaign is to first and foremost share my art, secondly to order more shoes to be able to continue to jump start my business. I want to order 200 pairs of shoes so I can pass along the savings to those that participate in this campaign
  • I am offering my tattooed shoes at a considerable savings to what you would be able to get them otherwise, The Vans style shoes I use are high quality and allows me to really get the detail that others that do similar shoes lack.
  • I use high quality shoes and art supplies that will last as well as stay vibrant

Where will my money go?

  • 100% of the funding will go to ordering 200 pairs of shoes, this will cover everything from manufacture to shipping.
  • I was recently interviewed for Texas Country Reporter and I want to be able to meet the anticipated demandnce the shoes are received I will start creating the works of art on the shoes in order of the pledges, I guarantee you will not be disappointed in the quality of the shoe or the artwork.
  • If I do not reach my total goal of $2500 I will make a smaller shoe order and still honor the pledges made
Why Pledge?
  • Be on the ground floor of the new business that this will help jump start.
  • Get a one of a kind work of art that you can wear and enjoy on a daily basis
  • Each pair of shoe is made especially for you, no two pairs are ever the same, each pair is also hand signed and dated. These shoes will be numbered to show that your shoes are unique to this project
  • I have made hundreds of shoes so far and you can see examples at my website www.tattoomyshoes.com
  • I hope to get shoes out as soon as the order arrives from the manufacturer. Typically it takes 3 months from the placing of the order to the time of arrival.

Examples of Perks!!

Artist's Choice

At this level you I pick  your design for you
Specify male or female and I will do the rest!!
This let's my imagination run wild and I usually create my best designs 

Day of the dead
These are my most popular designs, No 2 are ever alike you choose color and embellisments

Japanese Traditional
This is my favorite form of art, I love the imagery and the bold designs

American Traditional
These are BOLD designs that have stood the test of time

Comic Book and Anime
Choose from Spiderman, Batman, or any other Game or anime character
 

Mix and Match
Get 4 pair when you purchase 2
I make these interchangeable so you can have multiple pairs by mixing them



Risks & Challenges

The risks involved are minimal the biggest issue will be in the time you get your shoes.

  • unfortunately if you want your shoes as soon as the project is funded this will not be the case, as I stated above I will honor all pledges in order as soon as the shoes arrive from the manufacturer.
  • once shoes arrive I will immediately start on the shoes and post progress as shoes are shipped to each person.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can not contribute monetarily you can still help

  • Share this campain
  • Share my website www.tattoomyshoes.com
  • share my etsy store https://www.etsy.com/shop/TattooMyShoes
  • share using the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
A truly minimal & discreet brass key chain capsule.

This brass stash container is at home in your pocket, on a backpack or your key ring for everyday carry. Made with brass it is virtually indestructible, the rubber o-ring provides a water tight seal keeping your items air-tight and dry. It is the perfect container for carrying pills, a fire starting kit, matches, cash, medicine, urban essentials, small batteries, tic-tac's, breath mints, tobacco, or herbs!


Material: Brass

Length: (incl. top): 2.19" (5.56 cm)

Inside Diameter: 0.31" (0.78 cm)

Inside Circumference: 0.125" (0.32 cm)

Weight: 30 grams




May - June: Indiegogo Campaign

June - July: Receive Funds & Start Manufacturing

August: Start Distribution to Backers

September: Backers Receive Rewards



Risks and challenges

The biggest risks we face with this project are the quality of craftsmanship, brass bar stock supply, logistics and communication with our manufacturer as we shift production from small batch to large quantity manufacturing.

However, we have built strong relationships with our manufacturer, logistics team and quality control agent to ensure that we meet our customer's expectations of quality.

Essentially, pending a zombie apocalypse or a rogue asteroid we expect to have this project running smoothly on all cylinders.

story:
Our Vision




Sustainability does not have to remain a niche in sports.


We would like to equip individual athletes, teams and clubs with ecologically and socially fair produced sportswear.

We combine ecological materials, such as recycled fishing nets and biological cotton, with a social production process involving work therapy in Germany.

With our products, we are proposing an alternative path in the sportswear sector.
This will provide new opportunities for athletes, clubs and sponsors, who are publicly committed to sustainability, animal and environmental protection, as well as social production by wearing our clothes.

 

 

What is Re-Athlete all about? What are our values?

 

   Recycling.

Environmental and animal protection through recycled nylon materials (e.g. old fishing nets, used old carpets, plastic components) also from the world's oceans.

 

   Biologically.

Our cotton comes from Europe and is certified according to GOTS.

 

Sustainable.

   Sustainable materials, short trade routes, plastic-free packaging, use of eco-electricity, ethical investments.

 

   Social.

We promote various forms of work therapy in our production.

 

   Handmade - Made in Germany.

               ALL our products are made locally. No "fair trade" or mass production.

 

Clean the seas and the Earth from waste. Stand up for a fair production. Save the planet.
Join the Movement.
Re-Athlete

 



   ©Aquafil Spa
 

 

Our Products

Check out our jerseys, shorts, t-shirts and tops!

 

                                          
 

 

            *NEW* Longsleeve "High Impact"

                                          

 

 

 

*NEW* T-Shirt "Green Purge"


                "Ocean Savior" Men - Gray/Blue



                  "Ocean Savior" Men - Green



                "Ocean Savior" Men - Gray/Orange



                  "Ocean Savior" Women - Red

 


Sport Shorts Men - Gray/Blue         Sport Shorts Men - Green

 

 

 
Sport Shorts Men - Gray/Orange         Sport Shorts Women - Red


                                  Women Sports Top


                     Yoga/Fitness Pants Women


                                    Tank-Top


                                   T-Shirt "Re-Athlete Logo"

 


                                             T-Shirt "Leaf"
 



            

      Side View: "Ocean Savior" Gray/Blue & "Ocean Savior" Green

 

 

 

Saving our planet. With sport.

 

Between 2010 and 2020 global fiber consumption is likely to increase by 30%. That will be over 96 million tons. From that, there are millions of tons of nylon waste, which often end up in our environment and oceans.
As a result, fabric and plastic waste, as well as old fishing nets are floating in the seas and endanger our environment and the animals that live in it. More than 1200 kilometers of fishing nets are ending annually in the European seas alone.

With our product we have found a way to support cleaning the seas, protecting our animals and the environment and stand up for fair work conditions.

In addition, the unique ECONYL® regeneration process recovers precious raw material that would be otherwise wasted and saves the extraction of virgin raw material normally used for nylon. The regeneration process gives new life to material that would otherwise be wasted (e.g. in landfills, nature).

 

Millions of people train each day, play in teams and clubs and visit professional sports events. If we establish a sustainable solution for everyone, we can work together to achieve something great.

 

 

The Story behind the 100% regenerated Nylon yarn we use:
The Econyl® Regeneration System
 

                                                      

©Aquafil Spa

 

Made in Germany
 

We attach great importance to a regional and socially fair production.
For this reason, we have our textiles made in Germany involving work therapy.

This means that people with mental disorders, physical or mental disabilities are brought to working life. The work serves as a therapeutic tool. In this way, people with limitations are given the opportunity to become part of the society.

For our first collection, we are working together with a regional workshop for people with psychiatric or challenging backgrounds. We will support further forms of work therapy in the future.
 

 

 

Risks and challenges

 

With the money spent on the campaign, we finance our first production.
We would also like to develop further products for other sports. Our unique materials and our special manufacturing process are not cheap, but we try to guarantee an affordable price for everyone.
We have qualified employees in the field of psychology, design and business management on board to combine our social, ecological and sporting components.

Our goal is to bring sustainability to all athletes in different sports. We want people to realize that cheap alternatives and brands leave their mark on our planet - both on ecological or social factors.

There is still no sports brand that offers an ecological and social solution for the general public. Especially not for the area of team sports. We want to overcome this barrier and work with you as a good example. Great athletes also act great.

Now it's up to you!

Are YOU a Re-Athlete?!

 

 

 

Other ways to help
 

Are you a professional athlete?
Do you play in a professional sports team?
Do you work at a sports organization?
Are you an entrepreneur and would like to join the sports sponsoring?

Excellent!
Let's talk about possibilities to bring sustainability to you and your sport.
Join us and be one of the first to benefit from a sustainable sponsorship!

Just contact us and we'll keep in touch: info@re-athlete.de

Otherwise just spread the word!

Follow us on facebook or visit us online!

story:
The brand will focus on putting out one collection a year that will allow consumers to purchase clothing from any season. Instead of releasing two-four collections a year. This model will not only keep costs down but also slow the rush and desire for an immediate and unecessary purchase each season. In addition to this, both menswear and womenswear will be showcased in the same collection, creating equality and unity within the brand.

I'm aiming to create a different kind of fashion brand, one that is even slower than the current high end market. With the intention of creating clothing that not only lasts longer, but challenges consumers to be more socially aware of what they're purchasing, how it's made and why consumption and waste is so high.

The money raised here will go toward studio space, machinery and resources to produce and showcase the first collection and lead us into the second.

This kickstarter campaign is also part of a larger goal: the sustainable growth of the brand and the investment into future designers and organisations that want to create a more harmonious relationship with fashion. In essence, the formation a fashion research centre.

With your help we can create something truly wonderful and unique.

Thank you.

campaign_city: London Borough of Ealing, United Kingdom

story:
The loss by abduction or disappearance of a loved one can be tragic...

...although tools are available that help try and prevent loss and then track those that are lost or abducted, rarely are they successful in achieving their purpose. Our goals at Find My Fam by Byte Logic Systems, Inc have been none other than to create fool proof solutions to allow for the personal assurance of never having to go through one of these moments. 

For the last 7 months, our team has been in process of developing the next revolutionary tracking and safety device.  Rrecently we have been able to successfully run first round testing on the first ever discrete and effective gps shoelace, or as we call it the (G)eo Lace.

  • Waterproof gps/gsm device discreetly integrated into shoelace (patent pending)
  • Dial in to assigned number which will activate tracking of lace, audio will tell you, email and text you gps coordinates
  • Dial in and press key combination and you can hear ambient sounds around device
  • Device available in 9 different colors/variations (black, white, yellow, blue, green, pink, orange, camo, pink camo)


AS FEATURED IN:


Yes, we did, what we've done is created a simple, always needed accessory into one of the most useful devices available. A waterproof, fully connected, discrete and non bulky item that 99% of humans wear and is available to place on any variety of host (the shoe).


...Well, let's think.

On a daily basis, thousands of people with autism, bipolar disorder, dementia, alzheimers and other health conditions are lost due to walking or wandering off from home.  Currently, the only methods of retrieval or tracing their location is by hoping that someone kind of heart is nice enough to notice them then:

  • Read from a band on their wrist or a dogtag around their neck
  •  Be willing to make efforts to communicate with the person listed on the information found on the bracelet or dogtag of the lost individual.

Folks, Truth is, most people aren't that caring in today's society, the chances of that one caring person going through all that effort to help someone they don't know just isn't likely.    


The ability to have a device that would be in tact, online, on the person and always connected is what makes the G Lace not only an absolute necessity but just as well grows on the possibility of application.   


Every month there are thousands of child abductions throughout the US and when child abductions happen, most likely following the abduction, the abductor will discard all personal items the child or individual may be carrying. In most cases however, it's been proven that victims of abductions will be found with their shoes still on and in tact. With this fact alone, and the G Lace we will be able to achieve both goals and create a truly positive impact on society while reducing crime rates.

Those that may suffer from dementia, autism, alzheimers and other disorders can help their families feel at peace by knowing they are safe and not alone.

For the G Lace, the possibilities are endless, and the application is geared at a better, safer society. We ask you here, today, will you help us in making this a product that every family in need can make their own? ...to feel safe, secure and truly at peace?

Fire, Police, Military, Rescue officials and others can now be always located without having to carry bulky equipment and be assured that they know someone is looking out for them, such as in drastic search and rescue events.

Children and the Disabled will be always connected and will be able to be traced in the event of an abduction or other emergency by authorized guardians and allowed to dispatch geo-location to officials to not only recover the lost individual but also track down the wrongdoers.

Help us make the G Lace the ultimate human loss prevention device, help us in making a global change in reducing abductions, loss and the pain associated with each. Looking forward to making this happen folks, we need your help!


Stage of Development - Version 1 is built and in pilot testing, ready for manufacture, features include:

  • Waterproof gps/gsm device integrated into shoelace (patent pending)
  • Dial in to assigned number which will activate tracking of lace, audio will tell you gps coordinates
  • Dial in and press key combination and you can hear ambient sounds around device
  • Device available in 9 different colors/variations (black, white, yellow, blue, green, pink, orange, camo, pink camo)


In short...

  1. Purchase the required materials to create our own circuit boards here locally in the states which would make it easier for us to manage and cheaper for the consumer... Two wins in one!
  2. Integrate a smaller system which is going to take a bit of manpower, manpower = money, so, some of the finances will go to make sure our geeks stay happy (look below for more detail on our geeks) :)
  3. Create a larger local facility to keep things running smoothly and allow us to develop further into technologies that would sync in with the shoelace and allow expansion into other markets such as for runners, military as mentioned, etc etc..
  4. Finally, to allow us to build relationships with other wearable technology providers in order to build a more in-sync community with regard to both safety and healthcare

With these capabilities achieved, we can prevent the loss of more lives globally than with any other device,  all stemmed from a shoelace! 

In addition to advancing our technologies, we would like use part funding to provide informational brochures and literature to potential clients and families in need, as well as promotion of the product at health community conventions throughout the United States to include Autism Spectrum Communities, ALF networks, Dementia Care Givers Networks and others. Market research has shown that interest in providing safer methods of monitoring individuals in need and the safety industry surrounding is rising, and we believe that your help small or large will help in creating a global safety impact like none other.


Some Geek Pics:


Specs:

  • GSM/GPRS 850/900/1800/1900Mhz Freq
  • Input AC 110-220V Micro USB
  • Lithium Ion Battery2.7 mAh
  • Contained within water resistant silicone molding for water resistance

First prototype shoelace used and as displayed in video

Angel Ramirez - angel@cuemby.com
Juan Lopez - juan@cuemby.com

Any Questions, please feel free to give us a shout 800.615.0230

200 S Biscayne Blvd St 2790
Miami Florida, 333035

800.615.0230


Perks which include a set of (G)eo Laces will be shipped out at the end of December.  Although we hope to hit our goal and ship out in time so they make it for the Holidays, we can't guarantee that although we will make every attempt.

When contributing for a perk that includes a set of Laces, please let us know in a comment which color you would prefer.  Again, the available colors are black, white, yellow, blue, green, pink, orange and camo, pink camo if relevant to the perk.  If you have any questions at all, please do not hesitate to call and ask to speak to one of us personally.
story_txt:
The loss by abduction or disappearance of a loved one can be tragic......although tools are available that help try and prevent loss and then track those that are lost or abducted, rarely are they successful in achieving their purpose.  Our goals at Find My Fam by Byte Logic Systems, Inc have been none other than to create fool proof solutions to allow for the personal assurance of never having to go through one of these moments. For the last 7 months, our team has been in process of developing the next revolutionary tracking and safety device.  Rrecently we have been able to successfully run first round testing on the first ever discrete and effective gps shoelace, or as we call it the (G)eo Lace.
Waterproof gps/gsm device discreetly integrated into shoelace (patent pending)
Dial in to assigned number which will activate tracking of lace, audio will tell you,  email and text you gps coordinates
Dial in and press key combination and you can hear ambient sounds around device
Device available in 9 different colors/variations (black, white, yellow, blue, green, pink, orange, camo, pink camo)
AS FEATURED IN:
Yes, we did, what we've done is created a simple, always needed accessory into one of the most useful devices available.  A waterproof, fully connected, discrete and non bulky item that 99% of humans wear and is available to place on any variety of host (the shoe).

...Well, let's think.
On a daily basis, thousands of people with autism, bipolar disorder, dementia, alzheimers and other health conditions are lost due to walking or wandering off from home.  Currently, the only methods of retrieval or tracing their location is by hoping that someone kind of heart is nice enough to notice them then:
Read from a band on their wrist or a dogtag around their neck
 Be willing to make efforts to communicate with the person listed on the information found on the bracelet or dogtag of the lost individual.



Folks, Truth is, most people aren't that caring in today's society, the chances of that one caring person going through all that effort to help someone they don't know just isn't likely.     

The ability to have a device that would be in tact, online, on the person and always connected is what makes the G Lace not only an absolute necessity but just as well grows on the possibility of application.    Every month there are thousands of child abductions throughout the US and when child abductions happen, most likely following the abduction, the abductor will discard all personal items the child or individual may be carrying. In most cases however, it's been proven that victims of abductions will be found with their shoes still on and in tact. With this fact alone, and the G Lace we will be able to achieve both goals and create a truly positive impact on society while reducing crime rates.


Those that may suffer from dementia, autism, alzheimers and other disorders can help their families feel at peace by knowing they are safe and not alone.

For the G Lace, the possibilities are endless, and the application is geared at a better, safer society.  We ask you here, today, will you help us in making this a product that every family in need can make their own? ...to feel safe, secure and truly at peace?Fire, Police, Military, Rescue officials and others can now be always located
 without having to carry bulky equipment and be assured that they know 
someone is looking out for them, such as in drastic search and rescue 
events.Children and the Disabled will be always connected
 and will be able to be traced in the event of an abduction or other 
emergency by authorized guardians and allowed to dispatch geo-location 
to officials to not only recover the lost individual but also track down
 the wrongdoers.Help us make the G Lace the ultimate human loss prevention device, help us in making a global change in reducing abductions, loss and the pain associated with each.  Looking forward to making this happen folks, we need your help!

Stage of Development - Version 1 is built and in pilot testing, ready for manufacture, features include:

Waterproof gps/gsm device integrated into shoelace (patent pending)
Dial in to assigned number which will activate tracking of lace, audio will tell you gps coordinates
Dial in and press key combination and you can hear ambient sounds around device
Device available in 9 different colors/variations (black, white, yellow, blue, green, pink, orange, camo, pink camo)



In short...
Purchase the required materials to create our own circuit boards here 
locally in the states which would make it easier for us to manage and 
cheaper for the consumer... Two wins in one!
Integrate a smaller system which is going to take a bit of manpower, 
manpower = money, so, some of the finances will go to make sure our 
geeks stay happy (look below for more detail on our geeks) :)

Create a larger local facility to keep things running smoothly and allow us to develop further into technologies that would sync in with the shoelace and allow expansion into other markets such as for runners, military as mentioned, etc etc..
Finally, to allow us to build relationships with other wearable technology providers in order to build a more in-sync community with regard to both safety and healthcare

With these capabilities achieved, we can prevent the loss of more lives globally than with any other device,  all stemmed from a shoelace!  In addition to advancing our technologies, we would like use part funding to provide informational brochures and literature to potential clients and families in need, as well as promotion of the product at health community conventions throughout the United States to include Autism Spectrum Communities, ALF networks, Dementia Care Givers Networks and others. story:
STORY

à l'aise is a concept that originated from a simple logo designed by AB Benmiloud in 2011. It went from a cool word, to a concept idea, to a logo. With time, the concept became deeper and developed more texture. With reflection, the vision naturally expanded. The supreme epiphany was that à l’aise represents full-circle balance. In design through life, the concept of balance is the most divine state of existence. Like building a house, with a strong foundation and an underground structure, along with beautiful, appeasing aesthetics. à l’aise is reached once the exterior (texture) is in balance with the interior (depth), whilst the left (logic) is balanced with the right (creativity). A brick, the fundamental of all construction, represents the harmonized design The 8 ‘stem cells’ that rise from the brick consists of the essential units, or ingredients, to advance in the journey… ‘stacking bricks’. Realistically, this translates to creating beautiful design through a beautiful life, as ‘cool’ inside as out, rising progressively to the light. This essence of this journey is sharing a positive experience with the world. Definitely a “New Age” concept, one by one, unit by unit, the experience will spread.


MISSION/VISION

à l’aise (AH-LEZ) is a lifestyle and design brand that seeks to elevate the standards of life and design, while spreading love through crafted experiences. We want to reach everyone that can relate to a façade of this vision, and eventually the entire spectrum. Our first focus (MISSION1) is the art-form of TISSU design, creating clothing and accessories for the male and female, using organic and recycled materials. Currently in the "Experimentation" phase of growth, the team and workspace is set up in Fort Lauderdale, FL. We are actively and consistently recycling/designing clothing, on top of sculpting the foundation for AH-LEZ. With still the DÉMO Package (December 16, 2015) & the DÉMO 2.0 Update (March 16. 2016) to the released, the brand and organization is still in construction. The plan is to launch a first physical location in the South of France in the Fall of 2016. 


JOURNEY/OBSTACLES

In order to work with difficulties and obstacles, we designed the trajectory for the growth of AH-LEZ to include an experimental phase. Constantly taking calculated risks and learning from mistakes, this is still a young venture. As the resources slowly accumulate and the team builds, tangible expenses are always the most tedious in the creative/artistic world. With the aim of the “à l’aise” vision, it is key that we rally as many individuals as possible - the love and support is key. Financial donation, amongst other forms of aid such are resource recycling, constructive feedback and spreading the movement, are tremendously crucial for the growth of AH-LEZ. With the help of all, “à l'aise” can be experienced by all. Everything falls into place at the right moment, as long as heart and eyes are kept open. We have imagined an ideal state and we will strive to reach it.


INVESTMENT

For Brand development in between the first experimental package “BETA”, and the “DÉMO” Package release, WE NEED YOUR HELP. This fundraiser is part of the à l’aise “ÉXPERIMENTATION” Phase. As the brand is growing, we have developed this project as a sign “open arms” to financial donations, one of many ways you support the vision. The accumulative rewards for donations are diverse yet essential, exclusively sculpted for this fundraiser campaign. So to make the idea and campaign worthwhile, we created a creative donation/exchange process, a real investment:

Reward #1 : Donation of $20+

-> 1x “OG AH-LEZ Tag” print on item of choice*

(Must respect palette: Blues,Greens,Greys, Browns)

Reward #2: Donation of $80+

->1x “à l’aise” screen print on item of choice*

-> 1x LVL4:Custom (STG1)

NOTE: This is an ideal way to have “à l’aise” printed on whatever you want*, receive one or two scrolls that aren’t for sale, and order a LVL4:Custom Design for less than regular price, in a bundle with the print and scroll! If you support the momentum of this vision, whatever aspect you may appreciate/support, and want to see continuous and progressive growth, please donate whatever you can afford. The amount of money you donate does not quantify your support. Its all love.

*(Must respect palette: Blues,Greens,Greys, Browns)


ALTERNATIVE SUPPORT

RECYCLE:

-Help us recycle TISSUS (textiles) to create the "DÉMO" PACKAGE for December 16th 2015 -> Consciously repurpose resources for a cause

-Donation your used/un-used clothing located in Fort Lauderdale, (FL) all recycled textiles that meets color palette of AH-LEZ (Blues, Greens, Greys, Browns)

SUPPORT:

-Share insight and provide constructive feedback --> contact@ah-lez.org

-Share our campaign and/or spread the word of the movement


Visit ah-lez.org for more information/contact.

1<3

story:
Problem: 

You love the outdoors, hiking, camping, and just being outside... You love the city, the lights, going to concerts, and being downtown. The apparel world is full of brands that encompass one or the other. But your life is made up of both. You want a brand that represents your lifestyle. We couldn't find one either, which is why we created Unmap.


Your Initial Questions:

We are incredibly grateful for your support. We have had quite a few people ask about selecting sizes and how to see the perks. There are images at the bottom of this page. As far as sizes, if you contribute, at the end of our campaign you will be sent an email where you will be able to select your sizes. Thank you, we couldn't do this without you.

T-Shirts - $25

The highest quality t-shirts. We can't tell you how much you will love these. They not only fit incredibly, but will last. This is that t-shirt you will never be able to let go of.

Flex Fleece Pullover - $45

A great pullover for a hike, run, bike ride or if you are just heading out to the store. Super practical, but still fashionable.

Five Panel Hats - $25

These hats are just straight cool. Your choice of wool and suede or solid black with genuine leather.  

Windbreaker - $55

Our pride and joy of this collection. This is the windbreaker of all windbreakers. Its breathable, it looks great. Just have a look.

Bag - $25

Our Indiegogo exclusive. This bag is for the gym or that quick weekend trip. It's that one you always wish you had. Only 50 of these available.


At the top of our values:

  • The highest quality. Creating things that not only last, but look and feel the same years down the road.
  • Honesty. Everything is done the way it should be. We see our customers as our closest friends, we will never shortchange, or rip you off.
  • Balance. Embracing the two worlds we love. Our vision is that Unmap will be an imprint in the world for loving both the urban and the outdoors

Where are we going?

We want a full line of apparel that our backers have helped create, are proud to wear, and more importantly are passionate about what it represents. We will keep you updated on every single step of the way. More than anything we value your input and ideas. We want a friendship with our backers, because we know you are the ones turning our dream into something real. 


Who started Unmap?

As a teenager I idolized brands like RVCA, Obey, Volcom and what they created. I would say the dream was sparked there. I used money I had saved up to buy a screen printing kit from the craft store down the street and printed my first t shirt out of my basement. Since then I have explored brands and ideas that have ultimately led me to Unmap. With such a demand for a brand that represents what Unmap now stands for we set out on this journey. My name is Pierce Tews, my wife Paris and I are the creators behind Unmap.

How will Unmap fulfill?

We have found sources for the highest quality garments and extremely reputable manufacturers to produce our apparel line. Once Indiegogo sends us the funds, we will put in our first order, which should take approximately one to two months to get back to our fulfillment team. They will then ship out your goods as soon as we recieve them!

Risks.

The main setback we face is growth, we are entering into an extremely full world of apparel. We know though that our brand of outdoor gear and urban wear will set us apart, and that our backers will share with what they love about Unmap.

Thank You.

It's always impossible to find words to say how grateful we are for you, and making this dream come true. Thank you friends. We love you.
Pierce & Paris Tews

story:
This  Textured Bonded Leather jacket and apparel is ...

1) Made from premium Quality High Grade Lamb Leather . Since the hand feel of the jacket is maintained very soft, in spite of the fact that sweater is bonded to leather. This is only possible with selection of   high grade lamb leather. This can only be done if the we use Lamb gloving and has no covering on top to maintain the natural look of the leather .

2) Backed by a 10 year guarantee. We're so confident that our Designer look textured Bonded Leather Jacket be the most durable jacket . In spite of the fact that it is a designer jacket but has been taken care that the bonding will last for ever.

3) Made in India. India is the among the fastest developing country and has the capability to develop the best of the quality and price. Developing a concept is not that important but developing commercially which buyers can afford is important , and this is what we have manage to achieve. 

4) Sold wholesale. By offering our jackets directly via  Indiegogo  we are able to cut out the retail channel and offer you a jacket that would usually retail for $1400-1500+ at only $200-400. This price is only for the indiegogo backers.

5) Get rid off your heavy, bulky jackets and sweaters - These are unique jacket where the sweater is bonded to leather and are light weight. So these are  not just  fashionable and trendy but comfortable as well.  

6) Perfect Fit -  Normal Jackets don't fit properly over heavy sweater. Either its tight over heavy sweater OR loose fitted without sweater . Now GET RID OF SUCH ISSUE. Our jacket fits perfectly as there is no separate lining/ no extra sweater . Just a perfect fit. Moreover we offer what no company can offer- Customized order - made to measure.

 

This campaigns is really important to us,  as we every year develop lot of innovative and creative design but could not get it across to the world due lack of fund to promote it. We have been doing lot of surface ornamentation/ Embroidery/ Washed and different techniques which people are afraid doing on leather .This could be a platform which can help the  fraternity who want some innovative / creative leather apparels at best of the price.

Be a part of the passion to create something new 

Since both partner of the company are from designer background - graduated from NIFT ( India's leading and top fashion institute)  , have taken leather garment designing to new level and have never been afraid to do experiment while  making leather apparel. It's the passion for making quality clothes that led us to make different concept/ Embroidery/ Surface ornamentation (burning/washing/embroidery/cut work/and many more to follow)and which include Textured bonded leather garments

 

How the jacket is made?

The Textured Bonded leather Jacket is made from the high grade lamb gloving leather, as the feel and touch cannot be achieved with lower grade Lamb Nappa(with pigment covering on Top). First the leather is shaved to a very minimum required  thickness so that the knitted sweater texture is very well visible on the top which is  the beauty of the Textured bonded  leather Apparel.

Then with a very special technique  it is bonded to Knitted Sweater. The beauty of this bonded concept is that, heat is not applied to bond the leather with knit which keeps the sweater and leather soft .As on application  of heat, leather has the tendency to get Hard. 

The jacket is 100% hand crafted garment, after bonding the impression is created on each garment individually with hand and is assured that the bonding is perfect.( Pls refer to Video). 

The trims like Zip/ button are used from the world best supplier like YKK, which make the jacket very durable. We only use azo/ Nickle and chrome free trims

Key features of Bonded Textured Leather Jacket 

  • Great Textured Bonding Design. We have mastered the technique of bonding  leather with Knit while keeping the hand feel very good and without damaging the knit and leather, as it does not involve heat.
  • Best Quality Woollen / Acrylic Sweater . 
  • No need to have separate lining to be attached  to jacket leather shell.
  • Get rid of the extra padding and stuffing added to lining to make it warm. The bonded leather with sweater is a perfect for your cold weather.
  • This designer jacket is further modified into the best travelling jacket ever created specially for the cold season travel. Now you don't have to carry multiple woolen sweater + Heavy jacket as this is enough for all. Pls refer STYLE- CAIRO
  • Best Quality Trims like YKK Zip.

We need funding 

1. To buy raw material - Leather 60-70% value of the project

2. Chemicals  imported - 10% of the cost 

The Impact of your Contribution

Your contribution will have a great impact on our thrust to make more innovative and creative leather product  at best of the price at best of the price.

  • We believe in our product and want our partners to believe the same.Would like to Create unlimited designer product for our Buyer.
  • We are in this business for last 10 years and have been developing lot of creative design but again due to lack of fund not able to showcase to the world. Your support is really valuable to us.

Seven Timeless Design  

STYLE- Charlette- ( Basic Features)

  • Plain Knit for body/ Rib Knit for back hem and Cuff
  • Front Pocket -warm yourself from any harsh winter.
  • Raglan Style designed Sleeve.

STYLE- Sienna- ( Basic Features)

  • Cable  Knit for body/ Rib Knit for Hem and Cuff
  • Front Zipper Pocket 
  • Biker Jacket styling .

  • Honeycomb  Knit for body
  • Front Pocket 
  • Blazer look style.

 

STYLE- CAIRO- ( Basic Features)

  • Plain Knit for Body/ Rib Knit for Hem and Cuff
  • Small Pocket for the earphone. Now no losing your small earphone as the small slot will keep you earphone secure and ready for any time use.
  • I -Phone pocket of 10” or any tablet and will keep you hassle free from keeping in luggage or purse for your easy to use . Now boarding a plane has become quite easy and Hassel Free with dif.
  • Now no searching of passport and boarding passes on demand. Separate pocket for passport and boarding passes . Keep all secure
  • The key holder loop . No more losing your valuables.
  • Smart Phone Pocket  and proper accessible with the earphone.
  • Now never miss your style . Separate Sunglasses pocket 
  • Front Pocket will keep you  warm from any harsh winter.

MEN'S STYLE- JORDAN- ( Basic Features)

  • Honey Comb  for Body
  • Front Zipper Pocket . Casual fitting
  • Inside Pocket at chest level.

​We are a team of self motivated people to create something different. Leather is not just boring , a lot can be created out of it. Why to buy same old fashion leather jacket at high prices , when you can buy designer /creative leather jacket from vannamoda.

    This project means a lot to us,

    Those who can't contribute,  but that doesn't mean you  can't help:

    • Pls promote the campaign  to your friends and close one , Pls make some noise about our campaign.
    • Pls use the  Indiegogo share tools!.
    • Pls participate in our Referral Programme.

    Referral Program

    Well you can purchase our bonded leather collection at almost 50% discount for Indiegogo , but still you can get extra rewards through our referral program, with just 1 click and share.

    https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/203660683-How-To-Participate-In-A-Referral-Contest

    Additional benefit

    • Get Free Gift -  Unisex Unique bonded Textured Cap with all perks.

    Get exclusive textured unisex Bonded Leather Cap worth USD 40 on purchase of each perk. This is only and only available for the indiegogo buyers.

     

    MEASUREMENT CHART 

    Note For Jacket Backers:

    ………..Above Size chart is of Ready Jackets. Please select your size carefully.We suggest you, jacket Chest size must be 4-5  inches bigger than your actual body Chest size.If your Actual Body Chest is 40 Inches then you have to select 44-45 Inches Chest Size from our Size Chart.

     

    ……….Above Size chart is of Ready Jackets. Please select your size carefully.We suggest you, jacket Chest size must be 10 CM bigger than your actual body Chest size.If your Actual Body Chest is 102 CM then you have to select 112-114 CM Chest Size from our Size Chart

    While you buy our product- please refer the size chart & send us your selected size through mail

    We have our own manufacturing so the best part is we can customised jacket as per your requirement. 

     

    Important Notes- 

    Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts. We stand back to what we commit. We are confident with our product and technique. Once we can hit the goal, will start delivering goods.You can rest assured even if we do not meet the goal - your goods will be shipped. A win- win situation for all backers.

     Thank you for your support!


    We are motivated and are here because of you all. We love you all.
     
    We are ready to go with the production , all our supplier and partners are having decades of experience  and are eagerly waiting to proceed with the production process.


    We have dedicated freight forwarders and we partners with best of the courier company and move thousands of goods annually.  We do make sure our backers gets their jacket in time and best of the condition.
    Delays in fashion and manufacturing business are quite often. Even some time natural disasters and accidents are unavoidable, but still we hope to delivery all in time as we have planned out dates with reasonable ease. We may even deliver your perks before time.


    How shipments are made     


    Express shipment DHL / FedEx/UPS/TNT   are employed for shipping all orders. Express shipment means that the consignment is traceable and can be tracked. During this entire stretch, it is possible to track the package, with the courier tracking number provided by the express shipment company. The courier tracking number is provided by us, once your parcel is shipped. This facility helps you to keep a close-watch on the movement of your shipment, towards its final destination. The entire shipping process is traceable; hence the customers can get their parcels right at their door-step as per their convenience and without any hassles.

    In case it is not possible for you to sign and collect your shipment at the probable date of arrival of your shipment, you can certainly leave a note on the door directing delivery to a neighbor, who can sign for the package on your behalf.

    If no one can sign for the delivery on your behalf, Express courier will leave a note with shipment number and a contact number so that you can call them and arrange for the delivery.

    Lost & Damage during Shipment


    In the rare cases of lost and damaged goods during the shipment, buyer should immediately notify the courier within the first 24 hours after the delivery and file a formal claim. All evidence and documents must be retained as proof. The courier may investigate the claim before compensation can be assessed. Buyer should also notify us immediately to help process the claim.
    .


    Re-delivery & Failed Delivery


    FedEx, UPS, and DHL attempt to deliver the shipment for up to three times. If delivery still fails, the express couriers will attempt to contact buyer via phone number and email. If buyer still fails to take delivery, the goods may be returned to us. 
    .
    Re-deliveries and returns to sender due to delivery failures usually incur significant delays. In any circumstances, we are not  responsible for such delays, failed deliveries, wrong shipping addresses provided by buyers, and any other situations that we  is not at fault.
    If buyer fails to take delivery, the goods shall be held at buyer's sole risk in all respects. In such a case we , acting on buyer's behalf and at buyer's expense, may store, insure, protect, and resell the goods for the buyer.


    Customs Duties


    Many countries offer duty-free or reduced duty for importing goods from certain countries. For example, there is no import duty or tax for importing consumer electronics goods from Hong Kong to USA. Many countries offer duty-free allowance for gifts and small quantity imports from most countries.
    We will provide the basic export documents and information, including commercial invoice and packing slip, for customs clearance at the designated country. For small to medium shipment using express couriers, we  may help buyer to clear the customs as a courtesy.
    We will help buyers minimize their customs duties and will cooperate with them to satisfy their requirements legitimately. However we are not responsible for customs duties, fees, and other taxes imposed by the consignee's or buyer's countries. We are  also not responsible for informing the customer or consignee about their own country's import regulations, taxes or duties.
    In any circumstances, customs clearance is buyer's responsibility,  We  recommends buyers to consult with their countries' customs authority before importing any merchandise in large quantity to minimize customs duties and avoid delay. For bulk order kindly order separately to get better prices. All bulk order will be send through proper custom clearance.
    If the shipment is held or impounded by the customs in consignee's country because the customer or consignee refuses to pay customs fees, duties, or taxes, buyer will assume all additional fees and penalties associated with such an act.
story_txt:
This  Textured Bonded Leather jacket and apparel is ...
1) Made from premium Quality High Grade Lamb Leather . Since the hand feel of the jacket is maintained very soft, in spite of the fact that sweater is bonded to leather. This is only possible with selection of   high grade lamb leather. This can only be done if the we use Lamb gloving and has no covering on top to maintain the natural look of the leather .
2) Backed by a 10 year guarantee. We're so confident that our Designer look textured Bonded Leather Jacket be the most durable jacket . In spite of the fact that it is a designer jacket but has been taken care that the bonding will last for ever.
3) Made in India. India is the among the fastest developing country and has the capability to develop the best of the quality and price. Developing a concept is not that important but developing commercially which buyers can afford is important , and this is what we have manage to achieve. 
4) Sold wholesale. By offering our jackets directly via  Indiegogo  we are able to cut out the retail channel and offer you a jacket that would usually retail for $1400-1500+ at only $200-400. This price is only for the indiegogo backers.
5) Get rid off your heavy, bulky jackets and sweaters - These are unique jacket where the sweater is bonded to leather and are light weight. So these are  not just  fashionable and trendy but comfortable as well.  
6) Perfect Fit -  Normal Jackets don't fit properly over heavy sweater. Either its tight over heavy sweater OR loose fitted without sweater . Now GET RID OF SUCH ISSUE. Our jacket fits perfectly as there is no separate lining/ no extra sweater . Just a perfect fit. Moreover we offer what no company can offer- Customized order - made to measure.

 
This campaigns is really important to us,  as we every year develop lot of innovative and creative design but could not get it across to the world due lack of fund to promote it. We have been doing lot of surface ornamentation/ Embroidery/ Washed and different techniques which people are afraid doing on leather .This could be a platform which can help the  fraternity who want some innovative / creative leather apparels at best of the price.
Be a part of the passion to create something new 
Since both partner of the company are from designer background - graduated from NIFT ( India's leading and top fashion institute)  , have taken leather garment designing to new level and have never been afraid to do experiment while  making leather apparel. It's the passion for making quality clothes that led us to make different concept/ Embroidery/ Surface ornamentation (burning/washing/embroidery/cut work/and many more to follow)and which include Textured bonded leather garments
 
How the jacket is made?
The Textured Bonded leather Jacket is made from the high grade lamb gloving leather, as the feel and touch cannot be achieved with lower grade Lamb Nappa(with pigment covering on Top). First the leather is shaved to a very minimum required  thickness so that the knitted sweater texture is very well visible on the top which is  the beauty of the Textured bonded  leather Apparel.
Then with a very special technique  it is bonded to Knitted Sweater. The beauty of this bonded concept is that, heat is not applied to bond the leather with knit which keeps the sweater and leather soft .As on application  of heat, leather has the tendency to get Hard. 




The jacket is 100% hand crafted garment, after bonding the impression is created on each garment individually with hand and is assured that the bonding is perfect.( Pls refer to Video). 
The trims like Zip/ button are used from the world best supplier like YKK, which make the jacket very durable. We only use azo/ Nickle and chrome free trims
Key features of Bonded Textured Leather Jacket 

Great Textured Bonding Design. We have mastered the technique of bonding  leather with Knit while keeping the hand feel very good and without damaging the knit and leather, as it does not involve heat.
Best Quality Woollen / Acrylic Sweater . 
No need to have separate lining to be attached  to jacket leather shell.
Get rid of the extra padding and stuffing added to lining to make it warm. The bonded leather with sweater is a perfect for your cold weather.

This designer jacket is further modified into the best travelling jacket ever created specially for the cold season travel. Now you don't have to carry multiple woolen sweater + Heavy jacket as this is enough for all. Pls refer STYLE- CAIRO

Best Quality Trims like YKK Zip.



We need funding 
1. To buy raw material - Leather 60-70% value of the project
2. Chemicals  imported - 10% of the cost 

The Impact of your Contribution
Your contribution will have a great impact on our thrust to make more innovative and creative leather product  at best of the price at best of the price.


We believe in our product and want our partners to believe the same.Would like to Create unlimited designer product for our Buyer.
We are in this business for last 10 years and have been developing lot of creative design but again due to lack of fund not able to showcase to the world. Your support is really valuable to us.

Seven Timeless Design  




STYLE- Charlette- ( Basic Features)

Plain Knit for body/ Rib Knit for back hem and Cuff
Front Pocket -warm yourself from any harsh winter.
Raglan Style designed Sleeve.


STYLE- Sienna- ( Basic Features)

story:
Hello there Indiegogo people, my name is Michael and I design clothing. Currently I'm designing on my school's computers and a family laptop with a trial version of photoshop and illustrator.  I need help getting funded to be able to print shirts, pay for a year of programs, and shipping.


Your funding will be put towards the printing of shirts most of all and shipping. If the goal is met, I can afford to make the designs on my family laptop as well as print the shirts in multiple colorways, Currently I have 445 shirts ready to be printed in multiple colors, one is black and the others are a secret. These shirts will then be available on my web store for a limited time if you didn't get a chance to back, but still liked the shirts.

I'm going to be honest, doing this is terrifying. I'm just a 17 year old kid that wants to get my designs out and make clothing that I enjoy and want other people to enjoy. I'm very committed to this because I love fashion and streetwear.


If you are unable to fund there are still other ways to help me such as posting to social media or talking to friends about this is greatly appreciated, one simple click of the share button can make a huge difference.

story:
I love creating. I have passion. I love to design. I love being inspired. For some time, before starting Harlow Jewelry Co., I was and am currently a server. I quickly realized that it was not my thing – not forever, at least. I did not love (or even like) asking what I could get you to eat or drink. But, in these times, I dreamt of what I wanted to do. I wanted to own my own business. I wanted to makes things beautiful, unique, and give breath to the gifts I've been given. From this, Harlow Jewelry Co. was born.

Hi. I am Paula. I live in Cleveland, Ohio with my amazing husband, Mat, and our Scottie, Harlow. I have a Bachelor's Degree from Baldwin-Wallace College with a primary focus on metal design. I consider, design, and craft all of the jewelry for Harlow Jewelry Co. from a private studio near Westpark. While my studio is not open to the general public, I have a strong presence online via etsy, my website, and social media. Additionally, I love to meet with my clients directly and work with them to create their own custom jewelry.

I was creating jewelry for some time when I given the great honor of creating an engagement ring for a bride who was near and dear to me. Then, another person inquired and ordered an engagement ring and wedding set from Harlow Jewelry Co.. Before I knew it, had multiple opportunities to make incredibly unique engagement rings for incredibly unique people. Although this has become a part of Harlow Jewelry Co., I enjoy creating all sorts of jewelry for a multitude of occasions.

I strive to create designs that are interesting and meaningful. I handcraft each piece using different precious metals, stones, and other materials that work well together. Harlow Jewelry Company's work is interesting, unique and beautiful! I put a lot of love into each and every piece of jewelry and I know you will notice that as soon as you wear it!

story:
Who Are We?

First off, we want to say THANK YOU for taking the time to learn more about ASSET. We, at LionNFC, embrace the vision of designing everyday consumer products to be the sleekest and smartest they can be with the integration of modern technology.

Black and Silver Asset

Red Asset

Violet Asset

Blue Asset

Gold Asset

The Collection


Perks



What is Asset?

The ASSET WALLET is a sleek wallet constructed out of two ultra thin Aluminum 6061 grade plates with 2 NFC chips integrated in each wallet. 

What can the Asset do?

And so much more! 

The Design

We chose high grade aluminum for the Asset because of its light weight (~ 1/3 the weight of steel), non-magnetic (RFID-resistant), and rust resistant properties. Each wallet is anodized with a bright metallic color. 

It's less than 4mm thin and weighs 1.40oz

Gold Asset with 4 credit cards and cash

The Precise Cut

Our original idea for the Asset was a money clip, but we disliked that we had to remove everything to get the card or item you wanted most. Not anymore. With our hexagonal cutout finger groove, you can now easily access any card. 


Place your ID on top, for example, and when you get carded at a club, you can now easily pull it out, put it back, and be on your way to a fun night. 

Slide your cards in easily with an internal beveled edge. 

The Perfect Size

Made in the same dimension as a credit card for the perfect fit.

The Band

Throughout a one year period, we have visited numerous manufacturers and ran elastic tests to find the most durable and elastic bands that will last a long time. By using a wider 1.5” band, we achieve security for your cards and the ability to hold those extra things we all carry. 

Holds Cash Securely


For Those Extras

What is NFC?

NFC or Near Field Communication is the ability to transfer data by establishing a radio communication with two devices by tapping them together. No batteries, no cords, no fuss! 

The NFC Chip we use is made of high quality plastic. It is a high capacity, high range chip, that allows transfer even by tapping through your jeans. No need to take your ASSET out of your pocket. 

High Quality Plastic NFC Chip

What's better than 1 NFC chip? 2 NFC chips!

Program each chip with personal or business information you wish to share. For example, program one side to launch your LinkedIn profile, and the other to share your personal contact. 

Our Partner

By partnering with TRIGGER, one of the most popular NFC programming apps available, the ASSET Wallet capabilities are endless. Their app gives you the ability to open your favorite applications, or even create a group of functions. 

For example, simply program your chip to turn on your Bluetooth, turn off Wifi, and open Pandora. Now when you enter your car, simply tap your NFC enabled phone on ASSET and go! The uses are infinite and best of all... it can be tailored to your life. 

From Idea to Life

It's always a rare opportunity that an idea can turn into a reality. Throughout our adventure, we have reworked and redesigned multiple times before we finally found our ideal design. 


Will NFC work with your phone?

The ASSET Wallet works with Android, Windows, and Blackberry phones with NFC capabilities. Current iPhones do not support NFC but can work with NFC enabled adapters and cases. Though the iPhone 6 and 6+ do have NFC, Apple has locked it down to be used for only Apple Pay.

To find out if your device is compatible, check out the list of NFC phones and tablets

RFID (Radio Frequency Identification) Security

Worried about RFID thieves? Don’t be. The Asset completely blocks RFID signals. Safe, stylish and simple! Radio Frequency Identity Theft is a form of identity theft using wireless machine to receive your credit card information in close proximity. With the Asset's aluminum plates, the frequency is completely blocked and you are safe from RFID thieves.


Come join us to bring Asset to full production!

Your pledge will go towards materials, manufacturing, assembly, and shipping on a large scale. If the goal is met and barring any setbacks, everyone who loves technology and simplicity will have an ASSET! 

Special Thanks!

Ryan Spratt for composing these amazing tones for the video. (http://sprattmusic.com) 

Reunion Night Club in El Dorado Hills, CA and Cup and Cake Cafe in SF for letting us film in their locations.

Risks & Challenges

We have been working very closely with our manufacturer for a year now. After having gone through several prototypes and design changes, we are ready for our first production run. We have all the pieces in place and don't anticipate any setbacks after the campaign ends. We anticipate the first orders to go out by the end of April.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Share this campaign to a social network
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

Place your ID on top, for example, and when you get carded at a club, you can now easily pull it out, put it back, and be on your way to a fun night. 
Slide your cards in easily with an internal beveled edge. 


The Perfect Size
Made in the same dimension as a credit card for the perfect fit.


The Band

Throughout a one year period, we have visited numerous manufacturers and ran elastic tests to find the most durable and elastic bands that will last a long time. By using a wider 1.5” band, we achieve security for your cards and the ability to hold those extra things we all carry. 




Holds Cash Securely








For Those Extras


What is NFC?
NFC or Near Field Communication is the ability to transfer data by establishing a radio communication with two devices by tapping them together. No batteries, no cords, no fuss! 
The NFC Chip we use is made of high quality plastic. It is a high capacity, high range chip, that allows transfer even by tapping through your jeans. No need to take your ASSET out of your pocket. 
High Quality Plastic NFC Chip


What's better than 1 NFC chip? 2 NFC chips!

Program each chip with personal or business information you wish to share. For example, program one side to launch your LinkedIn profile, and the other to share your personal contact. 


Our PartnerBy partnering with TRIGGER, one of the most popular NFC programming apps available, the ASSET Wallet capabilities are endless. Their app gives you the ability to open your favorite applications, or even create a group of functions. 


For example, simply program your chip to turn on your Bluetooth, turn off Wifi, and open Pandora. Now when you enter your car, simply tap your NFC enabled phone on ASSET and go! The uses are infinite and best of all... it can be tailored to your life. 
From Idea to LifeIt's always a rare opportunity that an idea can turn into a reality. Throughout our adventure, we have reworked and redesigned multiple times before we finally found our ideal design. 


Will NFC work with your phone?
The ASSET Wallet works with Android, Windows, and Blackberry phones with NFC capabilities. Current iPhones do not support NFC but can work with NFC enabled adapters and cases. Though the iPhone 6 and 6+ do have NFC, Apple has locked it down to be used for only Apple Pay.
To find out if your device is compatible, check out the list of NFC phones and tablets

RFID (Radio Frequency Identification) Security
Worried about RFID thieves? Don’t be. The Asset completely blocks RFID signals. Safe, stylish and simple! Radio Frequency Identity Theft is a form of identity theft using wireless machine to receive your credit card information in close proximity. With the Asset's aluminum plates, the frequency is completely blocked and you are safe from RFID thieves.


Come join us to bring Asset to full production!Your pledge will go towards materials, manufacturing, assembly, and shipping on a large scale. If the goal is met and barring any setbacks, everyone who loves technology and simplicity will have an ASSET! 


Special Thanks!

Ryan Spratt for composing these amazing tones for the video. (http://sprattmusic.com) 
Reunion Night Club in El Dorado Hills, CA and Cup and Cake Cafe in SF for letting us film in their locations.

    Risks & Challenges  We have been working very closely with our manufacturer for a year now. After having gone through several prototypes and design changes, we are ready for our first production run. We have all the pieces in place and don't anticipate any setbacks after the campaign ends. We anticipate the first orders to go out by the end of April. 
  Other Ways You Can Help  Share this campaign to a social network Use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
PostScript Apparel Debut Collection


About This Project

Many of you have watched and supported me as I have devoted my life toward a profession as an independent designer. Those years of work have built up to now – creating my debut collection and launching my career. I have previously dedicated much of my time to the many aspects of building and running a successful business in this field. Meanwhile I have been designing and sewing one piece at a time, purchasing two yards of fabric, one zipper, one spool of thread at a time. Most of my pieces were available in one size only. This project will allow me to create a complete collection, produce size runs and provide a full inventory available for sale, and to restock as items sell. Where I previously had a handful of pieces for sale, I will now have a collection that I am proud to stand behind.



About Me

Since my mother taught me to sew as a child, it has been my one passion. I love the tactile experience of fabric, needle and thread. I love the mechanics of patterning. I love the creativity of design. I love the absolutely limitless exploration before me that fabric provides as a medium to the utilitarian art form of clothing – art that you wear and use, art that expresses your soul and uplifts your spirit. I love the concept of walking poetry.

Having my own business allows me to be both creative and to exercise the skills I have spent so long learning. It allows me the freedom to express myself with this art form and also to create a balance of work and life wherein I spend my days loving what my hands are doing; where I know my purpose in the world.


About PostScript

PostScript is about intrinsic value. It’s about things that are cherished. I named my clothing line PostScript because of the reminiscence that is conjured when you think of a handwritten letter to a loved one. I create each of my pieces as something to be cherished.

It is also about the beauty of women. I don’t ascribe to that stereotype that women must look a certain way to be beautiful, as is commonly found in the fashion industry. You are beautiful as you are because you are a woman, and our diversity is our strength. I do not create clothing to make women beautiful – but rather to adorn their given beauty, to enrich their confidence in that. Because every woman deserves to walk proud. My hope is that in my clothing you feel as beautiful as you deserve to.



Until Now…

I have, with much help from my business coach Jenny MacLeod, created many designs, built my sewing studio, gained experience in both tailoring custom garments for women and learning to develop my off-the-rack garments to fit a variety of women. I have learned the legalities and technicalities of owning a business, developed habits of time-management when working from home, built my website PostScriptApparel.com, sold at farmers markets, and been privileged to have my work sold at Sassafras boutique.


Why I Need Your Help

The final step to launching my career is to create this, my debut collection. With the solid inventory that this provides I will be able to carry my work to a bigger audience, and to take advantage of the opportunities that I am blessed to have already knocking at my door to sell my work.

The bare minimum I need to produce this collection is $6900 (Which will be 6400 after Indiegogo fees). This will mostly go to materials, and will also compensate me for the time I take off my café job to work on this, pay for a part-time employee to assist me, and cover the costs of a look book of this collection to send to you, my supporters, so that you can see the fruits of your contributions.

If I reach $10,800 (10,000 after fees) I will have more freedom with my materials, my time, and more time with my employee.

And if I get as far as $12,900 (12,000 after fees) I will have a runway show to premier this collection. To have my first runway show of my first collection would be an absolute dream.

The collection will be finished and available for sale this June.


What Will This Collection Look Like?

My inspiration for this work is the balance of structure and flow; architecture verses water. I have chosen a simple, clean color palette in whitescale to better show the designs. The song Across the Universe by the Beatles has been a common theme in my design process and the beautiful imagery therein I hope to portray in this collection. I’ve been thinking a lot about raw sensitivity, feeling your breath, and always, walking poetry. I am using this opportunity to really explore and develop my design and patterning abilities.



How Will Helping Me Make a Difference?

I am here because I have followed in the footsteps of bold adventurers before me – and I want to exemplify to my peers that they too can be successful in their craft, and to take every opportunity I can to support them along the way; to continue with the trunk shows that I with my sister Carmel have been hosting to give artists in our neighborhood a leg up in showing and selling their work, to share my knowledge with interns as I was blessed to learn in my internship, and as my business grows to provide jobs for others going down this path. This is not a solo enterprise; this is one piece of a community, of a movement.


Thanks

As the poet Ranier Maria Rilke advised an aspiring poet:

“There is only one thing you should do. Go into yourself. Find out the reason that commands you to write; see whether it has spread its roots into the very depths of your heart; confess to yourself whether you would have to die if you were forbidden to write. This most of all: ask yourself in the most silent hour of your night: must I write? Dig into yourself for a deep answer. And if this answer rings out in assent, if you meet this solemn question with a strong, simple "I must", then build your life in accordance with this necessity; your whole life, even into its humblest and most indifferent hour, must become a sign and witness to this impulse.”

I would have to die if I could not do this. If I couldn’t do it for a living I would do it in all my spare time. If I won the lottery I would spend all my time doing this. It is my skill and my craft, my heart and my soul, and with your help I can take the final step toward making it my livelihood.

I could not have made it this far without the support I’ve received all along the way from dozens in my community and family. Thank you with all my heart, for it is each one of you who has made all the difference.

To see examples of my work and learn more about PostScript, you may visit my website, http://www.postscriptapparel.com/. For updates on the process as I work on the collection, feel free to “like” PostScript Apparel on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/p.s.apparel


And if you are unable to make a monetary contribution, you can still help! Please help me to spread the word about this campaign.


Thank your to Pepper Proud and Emily Crenshaw for modeling for me, and to Ian Gill for putting together my video.

story:
Our Mission

Worthy Village builds pathways out of poverty for women and children in Guatemala by providing economic opportunity, healthcare, and education. To accomplish this mission, we have established partnerships with more than 50 skilled women artisans living in the impoverished villages surrounding Lake Atitlan. Our artisan partners sell their wares to tourists, but profits are not sufficient enough to pay for basic needs. That's where we come in. 

We are guided by the belief that our artisan partners know best what they need to help change their circumstances for the better. Over the past three years, our team has made half a dozen trips to Guatemala to meet with these women, hear their stories, and gain a better understanding of how we can best impact their lives. Fair wages, access to basic healthcare, and income to support their children's education are among their highest priorities.

The Need

Despite years of chronic instability and civic strife, Guatemala is a place of fiercely resourceful people who honor traditions, welcome visitors, and speak candidly about their lives. Sadly, women are among the most marginalized communities here. Unleashing their economic potential is central to growing their voice, improving their lives, and ultimately, strengthening their communities. 

In a country where ten dollars feeds 40 people, our impact has the potential to be huge, but only if it's sustainable.  That's where you come in. 

What Your Gift Will Do

Earlier this year, with seed funding from some generous individuals, we were able to commission a collection of scarves and handbags and pay our artisan partners a fair wage for their work. Our next step is to establish an online marketplace for this collection. Profits will enable us to continue purchasing products, thus providing our artisan partners with a stable source of income. Surplus profits will go towards supporting two key initiatives: healthcare and education. 

With your help we will accomplish the following within the next year:

  • Develop a sophisticated website and online marketplace for selling Worthy Village products. 

  • Lead at least three organized trips to Guatemala with physicians, teachers, and student volunteers.

  • Broaden our Healthcare Initiative to reach 1,000 individuals with basic healthcare education in first aid, hand washing, CPR, oral hygiene, safe sex practices, nutrition and exercise (healthy living).

  • Launch an after school program that provides students with tutoring, English language instruction, homework help, and extracurricular activities.

  • Establish a home base office in Panajachel so that our team can work more closely and consistently with the people we serve. 

As a young organization, Worthy Village is spearheaded by two unpaid Directors, one of whom was born and still has family in Guatemala. The rest of our staff, two of whom live in Guatemala, is comprised of committed volunteers with professional backgrounds in fundraising, strategic planning, healthcare, international relations, and business development. 

We are at an exciting place in our evolution as an organization and are focused on ensuring our own sustainability so that we can make the greatest impact possible. The proceeds from this campaign will help kickstart those efforts.

Finally, we have worked hard to establish a community of trust with our artisan partners, who firmly believe that our efforts will substantially improve their lives.  We refuse to let them down.

The Perks

The postcard and pictures below are from our most recent trip to Guatemala! The scarves and handbags are all handmade by our artisan partners using traditional techniques passed down from generations of women. When you make your donation, you'll be given a series of prints and colors from which to choose. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share the Worthy Village story with friends, family, colleagues, and anyone you think may be interested in supporting us!  Visit our website: worthyvillage.org, like us on Facebook: facebook.com/worthyvillage, and follow us on Twitter: @WorthyVillage. Thank you!
