story:
Chers riders,

Nous sommes Hugo De La Losa et Jérémy Mouchel, amis d'études en sport et pratiquants de sports extrêmes depuis plus de 10 ans. Suite à notre volonté commune de dynamiser la région et de faire découvrir des sports alternatifs au plus grand nombre, nous avons décidé de nous lancer dans cette aventure: créer le premier site de wakeboard dans le Nord-Est!

Le wakeboard, qu'est ce que c'est? 

Le wakeboard (de l’anglais wake, vague et board, planche), est un sport nautique qui surgit dans les années 80 après l’avènement du snowboard (son cousin des neiges). Pour tenir debout et avancer, le pratiquant est tracté par une corde au bout duquel se trouve un palonnier.

L'A.FA Wakepark, qu'est ce que c'est? 

C'est le premier téléski nautique du Nord-est et d'Alsace. A la différence de la discipline tractée par bateau, vous serez tractés à l’aide d'un câble fixé entre 2 pylônes. Non polluant, électrique et plus facile d'accès, la session sera aussi moins onéreuse (dès 13 euros la session).

Comment est financé le projet?

L'investissement global est bouclé mais nous avons besoin de vous pour la création des modules.

Mais des modules, c'est quoi?!

 Ce sont des obstacles flottants qui servent à faire des figures en tous genres: jump, rotations,grabs...Il est possible de les acheter ou de les faire soi-même. Les modules à réaliser seront fabriqués en bois et recouverts de plastique haute densité pour une glisse parfaite.

10 bonnes raisons d'aider l'A.F.A Wakepark:  

  • N°10 : Tu as une importante somme d'argent à blanchir, nous saurons rester discrets.
  • N°9:  Tu n'avais plus d'excuses pour quitter le domicile conjugal ou familial, le wakepark sera ouvert 7j/7 pendant les vacances. Te voilà sauvé.
  • N°8: Tu viens de faire une clef de bras à ton patron ou à ton prof de maths. C'est signe que tu es un peu tendu en ce moment. Venir décompresser au wakepark avant ou après le boulot te fera le plus grand bien.
  • N°7: Tu es pansu(e), tu souhaites te préparer un corps d'athlète pour l'été. Musculation, bronzage et flow, le wakepark est pour toi l'outil idéal.
  • N°6: Tu ne fais pas de sports extrêmes mais tu es quelqu'un de passionné. Un projet qui permet à plusieurs personnes de vivre des disciplines qui leur sont chères, tu ne peux qu'adhérer!
  • N°5: Tu souhaites soutenir le projet car tu sais que de nos jours, créer une entreprise relève du parcours du combattant, c'est comme écouter un album de Zaz jusqu'à la fin.
  • N°4: Tu es fan de sports alternatifs et comme nous, tu ne peux que constater le manque d'infrastructures en France pour ces disciplines. Tu souhaites soutenir le projet pour inciter les initiatives de ce type à se multiplier.
  • N°3: Tu ne fais pas de wakeboard mais tu rides souvent au Bikepark AFA. Tu souhaites soutenir le projet car tu sais que le wakepark permettra à l'AFA de grandir et donc de développer de nombreux autres projets dans la région. 
  • N°2: Tu fais du wakeboard mais tu n'habites pas à proximité. Tu souhaites soutenir le projet car tu as maintenant un nouveau sport à découvrir pour tes prochaines vacances.
  • N°1: Tu fais du wakeboard et tu habites en Alsace. Depuis que tu as appris qu'un site allait ouvrir, tu comptes les jours, tu ne dors plus, tu ne manges plus, tu ne bois plus et tu souhaites que le wakepark ait le plus de modules possibles.
Les contreparties proposées:   
Tirage au sort parmi tous les contributeurs pour gagner l'un des nombreux lots fournis par nos sponsors, dont ce t-shirt Obrien 


  Votre nom gravé sur le site dès 7 euros de don 


 Les lunettes AFA pour un don de 15 euros


  Le t-shirt AFA pour un don de 25 euros

  La casquette brodée pour un don de 35 euros

 Le sweat AFA pour un don de 45 euros

Pour 99 euros, le pack AFA et enfin, pour 199 euros, la soirée privée.

D'autres façons de nous aider:

Si vous êtes sensible à cette collecte, vous pouvez faire passer le message à vos amis et ainsi relayer l'information. Nous vous en serons reconnaissants.

Vous pourrez liker et voir l'avancée de nos travaux sur notre page facebook facebook.com/afa.wakepark  ou sur le site internet alsacefreerideacademy.com.

Nous apprécierons toutes les démarches pour faire de ce projet une réalité! D'avance, merci à tous!

N°6: Tu ne fais pas de sports extrêmes mais tu es quelqu'un de passionné. Un projet qui permet à plusieurs personnes de vivre des disciplines qui leur sont chères, tu ne peux qu'adhérer!

N°5: Tu souhaites soutenir le projet car tu sais que de nos jours, créer une entreprise relève du parcours du combattant, c'est comme écouter un album de Zaz jusqu'à la fin.
N°4: Tu es fan de sports alternatifs et comme nous, tu ne peux que constater le manque d'infrastructures en France pour ces disciplines. Tu souhaites soutenir le projet pour inciter les initiatives de ce type à se multiplier.

N°3: Tu ne fais pas de wakeboard mais tu rides souvent au Bikepark AFA. Tu souhaites soutenir le projet car tu sais que le wakepark permettra à l'AFA de grandir et donc de développer de nombreux autres projets dans la région. 

N°2: Tu fais du wakeboard mais tu n'habites pas à proximité. Tu souhaites soutenir le projet car tu as maintenant un nouveau sport à découvrir pour tes prochaines vacances.

N°1: Tu fais du wakeboard et tu habites en Alsace. Depuis que tu as appris qu'un site allait ouvrir, tu comptes les jours, tu ne dors plus, tu ne manges plus, tu ne bois plus et tu souhaites que le wakepark ait le plus de modules possibles.
Les contreparties proposées:   
Tirage au sort parmi tous les contributeurs pour gagner l'un des nombreux lots fournis par nos sponsors, dont ce t-shirt Obrien 



  Votre nom gravé sur le site dès 7 euros de don 


 Les lunettes AFA pour un don de 15 euros
  Le t-shirt AFA pour un don de 25 euros
  La casquette brodée pour un don de 35 euros
 Le sweat AFA pour un don de 45 euros

Pour 99 euros, le pack AFA et enfin, pour 199 euros, la soirée privée.
D'autres façons de nous aider:
Si vous êtes sensible à cette collecte, vous pouvez faire passer le message
à vos amis et ainsi relayer l'information. Nous vous en serons reconnaissants.
Vous pourrez liker et voir l'avancée de nos travaux sur notre page
facebook facebook.com/afa.wakepark  ou sur le site
internet alsacefreerideacademy.com.
Nous apprécierons toutes les démarches pour faire de ce projet une réalité!
D'avance, merci à tous!

story:
If you would like to buy some shoes, go here: www.tuccipolo.com

Not every brand has a story, and not every story is as inspiring as the one you will find at the heart of the beautiful fashions and styles of handmade luxury classic elegant mens Italian leather dress shoes offered by TucciPolo. Simply looking at the quality of handcrafted artisan workmanship will provide a glimpse into the passion and the careful selection of each element of the design. 

TucciPolo was founded in 2015 by award winning Star Tochukwu Mbiamnozie, a start-up expert, thought leader and visionary entrepreneur who has an amazing story of his own.

 

 

TucciPolo takes pride in making exclusive and unique styles of handmade luxury Italian leather mens dress shoes with their matching belts, wallets and other accessories for discerning, fashion conscious individuals who take pride in being stylish and classy.  Being an independently self-funded company, we need your help to support us expand and increase our production,  which will enable us to give back to our community through job creation and youth empowerment. 

 

 

A combination of beauty and style is TucciPolo's handmade luxury Italian leather mens dress shoes.  Make a bold, powerful fashion statement with TucciPolo handmade shoes. We are a reputable company accredited under the BBB (Better Business Bureau) code of ethical business standards and conduct.  

 

 

 

 

TucciPolo is the first and only handmade luxury shoe brand that makes shoes up to sizes US 18 and will allow Indiegogo supporters showcase their individuality and unique taste of fashion and style by customizing their shoes using different colors, style, and variety of premium Italian leathers including exotic skin leathers such as genuine Python skin leather, genuine Ostrich skin leather, genuine real Stingray Fish leather & more with their matching belt, wallet and card holders. Our shoes are handcrafted using top quality Italian leather upper, leather insole, leather lining & leather outsole and comes with small kit of shoe polish, shoe horn and dust bag to preserve your shoes.

 

 
Its stylish, innovative, unique, classy and simply the best handcrafted shoes for men in the Industry. Are you a fortune 500 or fortune 1000 company or simply small business owner, whats the best reward to give to your male employees for their hard work than a beautiful pair of TucciPolo handmade luxury Italian leather dress shoes.
 
 

 

TucciPolo offers Elegant and classic styles with a new twist on footwear, belts, and accessories for classy men of distinction and has a well-deserved reputation as among the leaders in the international fashion industry

 

 

If you’re a guy with big feet in search of high-quality shoes size US 15 and over, you’re in luck because we offer shoe sizes up to US 18 while traditional shoe brands typically stop at size 13 and we can even fill special orders up to size 22.

 

 

The only luxury shoe that is extremely cost effective for the quality and comfort of handcrafted classic elegant shoes and accessories we provide. No matter how you dress or what you wear, all eyes will be on your TucciPolo shoes. Our shoes are works of art and will get lots of compliments and admiration.

 

 

 

Complementing the panache of TucciPolo seductively designed shoes is sheer elegance courtesy of our experienced artisans. Our designers cut no corners while creating our shoes. They are fashion statement that will demand praise and appreciation from every person you walk by or to. And, yes, expect a few jealous glances because our shoes are bellissimo pairs that only fashionable individuals like you can flaunt.

 

 

 

Designed with the classy gentleman in mind, our shoe  colors testifies to its elegance while our innovative designs and craftsmanship adds a modern touch that will make fashion lovers of all ages stop you to ask where in the world you managed to get such a bold, sassy and downright classy pair of shoes.

 

 

 

TucciPolo shoes are the trademark of every stylish monsieur who fancies the best in fashion and shoes. What attracts the eye first is the eccentric rich vibrant leather tones these shoes flaunts so naturally. So prepare to watch people’s gaze start from your feet and move up to see the respected gentleman rocking them.

 

 

 

TucciPolo luxury monkstrap shoes are very few pairs that drive their wearers and those they walk by to exclaim ‘Meno male!’  Flaunting their difference shades, these pairs will definitely catch eyes and ascertain your position as a stylish, fashion-loving gentleman. Our team have also added their personal touch thus, further enhancing the beauty of these masterpiece through a delicate fleur-de-lis design for you to enjoy a perfect fit and everlasting value for your money. Just slip these classic shoes on and discover by yourself  why TucciPolo shoes are the best.

 

 

Our exotic luxury shoes are special type of shoes handcrafted using exotic skin leathers from the best Italian Tanneries. These leathers include: Python skin leather, Ostrich leather, Stingray Fish leather, Crocodile leather & more.  If you want to feel rich, classy, sophisticated, powerful and to showcase your scene of fashion and success, then you definitely should get one of this.

 

 

 

Despite the time and effort we invest in designing our shoes and guaranteeing their appeal, we never compromise on quality and comfort. Our Shoes combines luxury and durability and are the ideal choice for men with a strong sense of fashion and molti class. Each pair is made from 100% calf skin leather purchased from Italy’s top leather providers. So why deprive yourself of a stylish, functional and very comfy investment?

 

In addition to feeling responsible for providing the latest in luxury fashion, TucciPolo considers itself a strong contributor to the society. According to our corporate responsibility mission, our aim is to alleviate poverty and help the less privileged. One of the ways we plan to achieve this mission besides donating a portion of the proceeds from our indiegogo campaign to food bank in Connecticut to provide food for under privileged children and those who cannot afford food this Holiday season is by providing numerous job opportunities and empowering our youths. 

Get your pair of TucciPolo luxury shoe today to upgrade your style and make a powerful bold fashion statement while helping us provide food for the under privileged children and those who cannot afford food to eat this Holiday season.

Yes, TucciPolo handmade luxury shoes are work of Art, powerful and designed for fashion conscious Men of distinction and modern gentlemen who take pride in being stylish and classy. If you want to feel rich, classy, sophisticated, powerful and to showcase your sence of fashion and success then TucciPolo handmade luxury shoes is the answer. Make a bold fashion statement today!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

As a US Better Business Bureau accredited business, we stand by every BBB code of business standard and conduct as an ethical business and pride our self in providing our customers with quality customer service and product selection that keeps them coming back for more.

 

We appreciate our backers and will at every pledge level provide our backers with:

  • Backers at any level with be added to TucciPolo Elite group and have free access to insider news of upcoming product launch, limited run customizable shoes using different colors and materials.
  • Receive Free shipping within the continental US states and Canada
  • Free access to expanded sizes of TucciPolo shoes from US size 15 to 18  (a $60 Value)

TucciPolo shoes are available from US sizes 6 to 18, including half sizes and available in 2 width options. We can also fill special orders up to US size 22.

Our width options include:

"D", medium/standard width cut generously around the midfoot and heel to prevent unnecessary pressure on the foot.

"E", wider than a "D" width, cut generously around the midfoot and heel to prevent unnecessary pressure on the foot.

Below is our shoe size guide. It is pertinent that you follow the sizing and fitting instructions however, we accommodate exchanges should your pair doesn't fit.

Once the campaign is funded, we will send out a survey within 2-3 weeks to receive from our backers, the style, color and size they want. The faster we get the survey back the less likely any delays in production and delivery.

It will take typically 8-10 weeks to complete production, and approximately 3 weeks for shipping.

We anticipate to start shipping to you by February 2018, or sooner from our facility in the US.
 
We will do everything possible in our power to make sure all shoes are shipped on time.

All shipments within the continental United States & Canada, will be delivered at a flat shipping rate of $25 per address and $45 for International Shipment per address. 

While our products are loved and appreciated, we offer exchanges too if the need for an exchange arises. However, we will need to charge for the exchange shipping cost both ways as we are a startup and work with very small margins on Indiegogo. This is true for domestic & international orders. 

All exchange requests must be submitted within 30 days of receiving your reward. 

The cost of international shipping & VAT (if applicable) will be charged at the time of the survey once the campaign is over and will vary based on the destination country. If applicable, duties and local taxes will be charged by the appropriate authority at the destination country. Please determine these charges locally.

All orders both domestic and international will ship from our US facility.

Innovation

One thing you may have noticed when buying shoes is the lack of variety. From one store to the next, many of the styles seem exactly the same. TucciPolo is very different. Each one of our creations was made with innovation in mind. Our goal is to stand out from the crowd and provide you with a high-quality, unique shoe that you cannot find anywhere else.

The Message

Do you have any idea how much a great shoe means when it comes to conveying a message to the public? Wearing any of our selection of shoes will help you stand out and tell the world that you deserve the finer things in life and you are not going to rest until you get them. Not only is this a remarkable personal motto, but it mirrors the message we convey to everyone who shop from us.

Quality

These days, it is easy to walk into any store and find shoes that were made by a machine. It is far more difficult to unearth shoes that are well made and crafted by hand. Every stitch it takes to make one of our shoes is perfect; from the first to the last. When you spend your money, it is important that the price reflects the quality of the item you are about to receive. These are expensive shoes and they are worth every cent.

Another thing that you are usually unclear on when buying shoes is how long they have sat around waiting for a new owner. Materials like suede and leather start to wear down over time. This is never a concern when shopping from us. Every pair of shoes is made to order. This does mean that you will need to order at least two weeks in advance of your event to ensure a prompt delivery, but you will know that they were not collecting dust before you decided to make a purchase.

Customization

If you come across any of our shoe and it is not exactly as you would like, you can get in touch with us to discuss making changes. We truly care about the satisfaction of each and every customer, so can go the extra mile. Every time you shop from us, you can customize a creation that will make your items like no other. Not only will you be the best dressed in your social circle, but you will have items that no one else does.

Accessories

Do you need a fashionable belt to go with the customized shoes you just ordered? Does your beau need a matching wallet or card holder to make his ensemble complete? Everything you need is at your fingertips at TucciPolo. There will not be any reason to scramble about trying to find what you need at different places; TucciPolo is your final stop.

Returns

You have probably encountered this issue in the past. There are some luxury shoe stores that will not allow returns, even if the items have not been worn. This is no way to treat someone who commands the finer things in life. If you receive the shoes you ordered and they are not to your liking, you can feel free to return them for a refund or exchange. Just because you have money, that does not mean that you should be forced to waste it on unwanted items.
Our promise is that you you will certainly not be disappointed shopping from us.

1. Back us! Join and become a member of our family to be entered into our contest to win a free pair of shoe.

2. Share this campaign with your friends or family. Help them upgrade their style.

3. Like, tweet, instagram, share on Facebook or blog - you know what to do.

4. Get a free pair of TucciPolo handcrafted luxury shoe if you back us and get/refer 8 friends to back us using your Indiegogo referral link. 

NOTE:

To count as a referrer, you must promote our campaign with Indiegogo’s share tools while logged into your Indiegogo account. This is very important otherwise, your unique ID won’t be attached to the resulting backers and you will not get any credit for your referral.

We can not accept any claims of referral that do not come through your unique Indiegogo ID.

Can I claim multiple perks?
Yes you can, if you would like to claim multiple perks, please make a new contribution for each perk.

Can TucciPolo Deliver to My Country?
Yes, We take pride in delivering to virtually any address in the world. We’re offering shipping at a flat rate of $25 for US and Canadian address and $45 per International address.

When Will I Receive My Perk?
We will provide you with estimates for shipping and delivery dates as soon as our campaign is over and we received back the survey sent to our backers to select style, size and color of their products. The earlier we receive back the survey the faster all products are sent to production.

What happens if the project gets pushed back past the delivery date?
With crowdfunding we are expected to deliver a product that can otherwise take months to deliver. While we will do our best to deliver on the estimated time frame, we also want to make sure we produce a quality product that you are extremely satisfied with. However, if any set back arise that could delay production, we will always be transparent and keep you all up to date.

Trouble making a payment?

We're sorry to hear that! If you're having trouble making a payment, please reach out to IndieGoGo's Customer Happiness Team at support@indiegogo.com. One of their payment specialists will be able to assist you within 24 hours.

Can I get a refund after the campaign has ended?
The money raised here on Indiegogo will go into product production, purchasing of materials, and production of TucciPolo handmade shoes and delivery to your home. Refunds will only be issued if we can not deliver the final product after exploring all possible options. We will do our best to be transparent and keep you updated on all production.
For questions please contact us at: crowd@tuccipolo.com

What will happen after the campaign?

TucciPolo shoe prices will return to their original retail prices and can be purchased directly from our website - www.tuccipolo.com

High resolution photos and media files for PRESS download here. For press inquiries, please contact: media@tuccipolo.com

The success of our campaign depends on you, therefore we need your support to increase our production to ensure everyone has access to TucciPolo handmade luxury Italian leather classic elegant shoes. We hereby welcome you to be part of our inner circle and help us share our campaign with your inner circle. Thank you!

story:
This is Our "Why"

A Glimpse Into Michelle:

Hi! I’m Michelle! I was born and raised in the ‘burbs of the Nation’s Capital (in Maryland, not Virginia). I was raised to work hard, get good grades, go to college, and work. I eventually I found my way off to law school, and I currently work for the Government (as many in this area do). In this unreasonably expensive area, I’ve become accustomed to living paycheck to paycheck and sucking up the Monday blues EVERY.DAMN.WEEK just to get by.

In December of 2015, I gave birth to my son. From the day I first laid eyes on my son, I knew I had to be happy for him and for me. Shortly after giving birth, I was plagued with severe post-partum depression. My day job, which was not fulfilling in the least, did not help my situation. I needed to reinvent my world. I needed to spend more time with my son. I needed to do something that made me happy. So, with a little encouragement from my bestie, I started selling clothing through a popular direct sales brand. I found that I became addicted to matching outfits, taking pictures, and being creative again (as law school has a tendency to take any creativity away from you), while helping other women find their beauty through clothes. However, I want a little bit more. I want to be able to live and work by my own rules, and create my own world of clothes and fashion. I want FREEDOM!

This is what has led me to co-founding Up-Rising Clothing, LLC. I am happy working with my best friend, being creative, designing and playing with clothes, helping others feel beautiful in their own skin, being able to live and work by my own rules, and spending more time with my son and husband, while helping amazing artists advertise their creations through the world’s most popular commodity – clothing.

A Glimpse Into Amanda:

Do you ever find your mind wandering off and wondering "is this as good as it gets?" At 31, I find myself sitting at a desk job (don't get me wrong it pays the bills) day in and day out and feel myself withering away.  I worked hard to get to where I am, but now that I am here the challenge is gone. The fire inside my heart has dwindled to an invisible flame. I'm sure there are many who can relate to the 9-5, checking in on that time clock and counting down the minutes until you're able to check out. This isn't the way life is supposed to be!! 

For as long as I can remember, I've been a dreamer; and for the same amount of time I have been on the constant pursuit of happiness. Aren't we all?? By having this state of mind, I've taken many risks, some offering rewards and some offering up the greatest life lessons. The interesting part now, is you ALL get to experience and follow along on this journey, this risk, that Michelle and me are embarking upon. Neither one of us have degrees in business, we definitely aren't rich, but we are determined. There is no option for failure; we came to succeed. We're just two average gals, who love art and believe in the constant pursuit of happiness .

We have started on this journey in the hopes of making our own lives better – to live out our dreams – but also to help artists live out their dreams and for our customers to feel beautiful in amazing clothing! I hope that you will all join us on our journey through self-exploration, self-love, and happiness! So join us, this is the beginning of our UP-RISING!

There's No "I" in Team

We understand that there is no Up-Rising Clothing, LLC without your help and support to make this possible! We want you to love our products just as much as we do, and that's why every product is quality checked numerous times before mass production, including quality checks by the artists themselves who have created the prints. We are asking for a total contribution amount of $15,000.00 to be spread throughout the company. A majority of the funding will go to paying the artists for their works and manufacturing the product.  The rest will primarily go towards funding the fulfillment center, which includes packaging materials, supplies, time, training and great customer service. 

When you invest in Up-Rising Clothing you are not only investing in a Woman-Owned Small Business, you are also supporting local artists; the dreamers of the world.

For a limited time, with every $100.00 donation, you will receive a FREE pair of leggings. We are also offering the opportunity for artists to submit up to 3 pieces of their artwork to be featured in a limited production print. If the product is chosen, free marketing for their business is provided. For this opportunity: artists are directed submit one email attaching 3 pieces of work in PDF or Adobe Illustrator format to hquprisingclothing@gmail.com.

Did You Notice?

  • Throughout this campaign you have already seen the beginning stages of our prints. Were you looking close enough?? We have given you a small glimpse into our lives, our artistic minds and the journey we are about to take each and every one of you on. 
  • We even have introduced you to some of the local artists we are featuring. 
  • Is there a print that has caught your eye already?? TELL US! We are looking for feedback. 

Full Speed Ahead

It is without a doubt that Michelle and I will make mistakes along this journey, we are humans after all. But I can guarantee you that we are trying our best in every way possible to avoid them. Both of us spend hours a day researching branding, marketing, funding, finances and so much more. Each of us participates in weekly webinars, and we have sought out a business adviser. We have mentors who have run businesses and have shared both their secrets to success and lessons learned from failure.

As I stated before, there is no option for failure. We are too determined and, honestly, too stubborn to quit. We will RISE. 

Other Ways You Can Help

We realize that not everyone is financially able to donate AND THAT'S OK! We understand, and any support that you can provide is greatly appreciated. Here are some ways you can help without spending a dime:

  • Word of mouth! Please shout our company name from the rooftops :) Tell your friends to tell their friends, so we can all be friends!
  • Join our email list at https://www.up-risingclothing.com to be notified of our launch and anytime we have sales or special discounts.
  • Follow us on Tumblr @ https://up-risingclothing.tumblr.com/
  • Give us honest feedback on our progress, business, and prints, or recommendations for awesome local artists that might want to participate.
  • Don't forget to use the Indiegogo share feature and share this page. 

Thank you for your time and support! Welcome to the up-rise!

story:
The most stylish, comfortable, and versatile pants you’ll ever own!

PI Yoga Pants Scrunched Bottom are our ultimate best seller!  Feel confident on and off your yoga mat with our form-flattering and comfortable yoga pants.

 Here is Why You Need a Pair of PI Yoga Pants:

1. They are so comfortable

Tired of wearing tight leggings or jeans? The only thing you can think of is to go back home and change into something comfy? Start wearing PI Yoga Pants! They are so versatile people won't even know you are wearing yoga pants and you will feel comfortable all day long. Be prepared, people will start asking you where you got those pants because they look so good & comfortable (yes, it happens to each of us all the time!)

  

2. They are lightweight & versatile

Easy to pack, they only weigh 8 ounces and a must have for the next time you travel.

Dress them up or down. Wear them for yoga or while exploring a new country, PI has you covered! The best part? At night wear the same pants with a cute top & heels for a whole new style and say bye-bye to mosquitoes bites, too! 

3. Match your pants to your mood & intentions

We handpick the fabric and design each style to make sure the color and print convey the right message. We believe clothes have a big influence on our mood so we don't take this lightly. 

This is what we believe clothes are made for as well. To make you feel empowered, inspired, confident and comfortable on and off your yoga mat and giving you the extra push we sometimes need in life to accomplish our dreams.

4. Designed & Tested with Care

Each pair of PI Yoga Pants is designed with care. Inch by inch we are perfecting them to fit just the way they are supposed to and we test them out in the wild before even thinking of releasing them on our website (in hot humid Bali streets, during long airplane rides, at various yoga classes, etc). 

We tested Pi Yoga Pants on over 100 women of all different ages and sizes to design them true to size. Take a look at our size chart here. We are also happy to provide online fit consultations to make sure you pick your perfect size and style.

 

Our Mission

PI is a boutique line of yoga, travel & lounge wear designed in California and ethically handmade with love from the tropical shores of Bali. They’re so comfortable, you will never want to take them off!

By purchasing PI, you are supporting our mission to:

1. Empower women & men of all body types and shapes to feel confident on and off their yoga mat with form flattering and comfortable clothes. 

Did you know the average American woman is a size 16? Though most yoga clothing companies only offer pants up to a size 12...

PI is inclusive of different body types. Our body is not just about a size. We come in all shapes, too! The way PI Yoga Pants are built really accommodates all body types. 

We are bringing our mission to life with a wide variety of sizes including petite, tall, regular, large, and now plus size which fits size 18-24! 

2. Save the Sea Turtles. The ocean and its marine life are dear and near to our heart at PI. 

Each purchase helps us to bring our dream to a reality. 10% of our net profits go to sea turtle and ocean conservation projects around the world. We work hand in hand with organizations that are actively helping to protect our oceans. See more about our efforts HERE.

Our Story

PI was created when a young California yoga enthusiast quit her job to travel the world for a year. Her name is Larissa Miller. She felt spiritually connected with the culture in Bali and was devastated to see so much of the coral reef destroyed. Today, her dream to make a positive impact became a reality. PI donates 10% of net profits to sea turtle conservation. Traditionally sea turtles are the symbol for inner empowerment.

Why the name PI?  

There are few things on this earth that have universal meaning. The curious nature of the magical mystery number Pi is something that goes beyond mathematics and is universally recognized. 

Pi symbolizes infinity and living proof that something can continue on infinitely.

The symbolism of the sea turtles and the mystery number align with the mission of the brand to empower and inspire women and men of all shapes and sizes to continue infinitely in the direction of your dreams.

Larissa Miller, founder of PI

 

Customer Feedback

Our pants have been put through the test of daily life since May, 2016. From yoga, pilates, skating, sky diving, rock climbing, the office, the beach, vacation, travel, and sleeping our customers agree this is the one pair of pants they never want to take off. You can count on your Pi Yoga Pants to keep you comfortable, fresh, and confident with ever step. You can take our 30 day money back guarantee as our promise to you.

Since we've launched...

Thank you so much for all your continuous support. Since we've launched our Indie Go Go Campaign we've reached these goals:

1. More than Yoga Pants, PI is a boutique line of yoga, travel & lounge wear.

We've expanded production into petite, plus, kid’s and men’s yoga pants and we grew into a full clothing line including skirts, shorts, dresses, tops, shawls, jewelry, accessories & more.

See our entire collection here. 

2. Available Internationally

In the last 3 years, we extended our presence internationally. You can find us at many events all around the world. See the current list of events here.

We are also partnering with many yoga studios and clothing boutiques all over the world to bring style and comfort closer to you. Take a look at our numerous locations here. 

You can also shop PI on Amazon USA, Canada, Australia & UK. 

Wholesale - Do you have a yoga studio or clothing boutique?

We offer up to 50% off and free international shipping when you do wholesale with us.
For more information, click here. 

3. Saving the Sea Turtles

We have worked on different projects in Indonesia and Florida and partnered with different organizations to help bring awareness on ocean conservation and save the sea turtles. See all our efforts here.

4. Press Recognition

Since we started, we have been published in many magazines & TV shows. 

Fox 11 News Los Angeles - Click here to watch the "PIYOGA pants packed with purpose" segment on the Morning Show

Cox Channel 4 News - Click here to watch the PIYOGA interview with Jen Morris

PACIFIC Magazine - Click here to read the published PIYOGA article "cOMfort + Joy: PIYOGA brings unique apparel from Bali stateside"

Yoga Magazine UK - "Top Ethical Fashion Brand to Follow."

Yogiapproved - Click here to read the full article: "This Yoga Brand Is Using Artificial Coral Reefs to Help Save Our Oceans" and "7 Eco-Friendly Yoga Brands You Should Probably Know About"

See the full press coverage list here.

 

Risks & Challenges

Starting your own business is not easy every day but I would do it all over if I had to.
The biggest risk so far has been investing my entire savings into Pi Yoga Pants- but I have no plans to turn back anytime soon. I understand there are obstacles, but being able to adapt to change will keep me ahead.

There are definitely a few challenges I have faced, but I would rather look at them as new learning experiences.

The first challenge I encountered was that my seamstress in Bali has a small family-owned business and it takes a while for them to fulfill orders. So far, they have been able to manage the orders as they've gotten bigger and they are also looking forward to PI expanding so they can grow their business too.

Another challenge has been that my seamstress doesn’t speak English. Luckily, since we started their son graduated from college and we can now communicate by Whatsapp overseas. 

Follow the Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants on Social Media

Follow us on Instagram @piyogapants & like us on Facebook
Visit our website www.piyogapants.com

We are very grateful for your support! It wouldn't been the same without all of your kind words of encouragement and your support through your purchases. We made this a reality thanks to you. 

Contact information:

If you want to get in touch with us please send us an email at: support@piyogapants.com

For Immediate Press Release Information please click HERE

 

Special Thanks

Thank you @thegentlemangorilla, @blackarmstudio, and @gregorymaestro for taking so many of our amazing photos and @jasonfalasco for the video production.

The 100+ women that gave us their time, feedback, and support to help create Pi Yoga Pants. Special thanks to @californyas, @cwolff88 and @creatiffyoga  for all the assistance behind the scenes.

We cannot thank you enough!

story:
Hello my name is Paula Callejas and this is my story :)

When you first step out onto that sandy beach, take it all in. Breathe in a deep breath, look out at the waves, and realize just how lucky you are. It is an incredible thing to be alive in that moment, and you should revel in it. The sun on your shoulders and happiness all around you, this fun belongs to you.

If you want to make the most of your day at the beach – or anywhere else – you need to look your best. Fashion can go a long way toward that end, but it is up to you to accept it. At Paula Callejas swimwear, we specialize in luxury swimwear. Drawing influence from a variety of sources, we produce top-quality pieces for women who can tell the difference. In all our products. We are using a fabric called power mesh in order to reduce the appearance of the waistline.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We have come to you, Indiegogo, for help raising $25000. This start-up capital will cover the costs of manufacturing, marketing, and distributing the initial run of Paula Callejas swimwear products. As a thank-you, we plan on sending out samples of our clothing to all our contributors.

 

Risks & Challenges

For any new fashion company, the most daunting challenge is locating and connecting with an audience. Our plan is to do our best to produce attractive, luxury swimwear that speaks directly to a specific group of people.

 

The Impact

While we are focusing on keeping the quality of our output up, we are also proud to employ single mothers through the business we are creating. Our clothing will make women feel sexy, graceful, and comfortable, all the while making a positive impact on families and communities.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Beyond making a monetary contribution, you can help us by sharing our campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn. Go ahead and tell everyone you know what we are doing. We want to reach as many women as we can before launch in order to ensure that our first year goes smoothly.

All contributions are greatly appreciated.

Thank you for your time and support.

For any new fashion company, the most daunting challenge is locating and connecting with an audience. Our plan is to do our best to produce attractive, luxury swimwear that speaks directly to a specific group of people.
 
The Impact
While we are focusing on keeping the quality of our output up, we are also proud to employ single mothers through the business we are creating. Our clothing will make women feel sexy, graceful, and comfortable, all the while making a positive impact on families and communities.
 
Other Ways You Can Help
Beyond making a monetary contribution, you can help us by sharing our campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn. Go ahead and tell everyone you know what we are doing. We want to reach as many women as we can before launch in order to ensure that our first year goes smoothly.
All contributions are greatly appreciated.
Thank you for your time and support.

story:
Our Goals

A bit about ourselves

  • Yuuki Hashimoto is a conscious company committed to bringing unparalleled quality and commitment to our consumers.
  • This campaign will cover marketing, expenses, wages, production costs, and shippings costs to bring the best quality minimalist watches to you.
  • We couldn't do this without the help of loyalists like yourself, here taking your time to check out our campaign; in reward, we'll offer early bird discounts for our watches.

 

What We Need & What You Get

Breaking it down for you:

  • $100 000 will cover all wages, production, shipping, and design costs to bring the best quality watches every step of the way, as well as set up our website for future customers.
  • Unique perks for funding this campaign will be getting your watches earlier than everyone else, at a discounted early bird price, and our eternal gratitude.
  • If we don't reach our goals, the funds will go into launching another campaign and preliminary work afterward we'll make sure you've all gotten your watches.

The Impact

Why buy our watches?

  • Our watches will help bolster the economy in many parts of the world where parts will be manufactured as well as we'll be donating 100% of extra proceeds to a responsible charity if we move past our goal.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Can't swing the coin? Don't worry.

  • Get the word out for us! Tell your friends about what we're doing and our awesome product.

Our watches will help bolster the economy in many parts of the world where parts will be manufactured as well as we'll be donating 100% of extra proceeds to a responsible charity if we move past our goal.

story:
Meet the Jevelo Coin

 

My name is Kristian Saarikorpi, and I am a Master Goldsmith by profession. My family consists of my wife, Kirsti, who is a jewelry designer, and two lovely daughters, Aurora and Serafina. We live in Finland in a village called Fiskars, which is famous for, amongst other things, its orange-handled scissors.

I have worked in goldsmithery for over 25 years as a goldsmith, designer, and as an entrepreneur. I founded my own company, Saarikorpi Design Ltd, in 2000 after I graduated as a Master Goldsmith and felt that my job wasn’t providing me with sufficient professional challenges.

I have always been a little different than the average goldsmith. Right from the start it was clear to me that the combination of modern technology and expert handicrafts was my thing. This combination allows me to do things that I would have been unable to do before, and also, as a designer, I am able to inhabit a world where the only limitations are my own imagination. I have made jewelry using 3D printing and CNC techniques for over 17 years already, and my current Jevelo project relies heavily on my extensive experience in this area.

My entire career as a goldsmith is based on designing and making unique and bespoke jewelry for people. In my work, I have noticed how important and meaningful jewelry can be to people and how much they are willing to invest in that jewelry. Telling stories and expressing emotions via jewelry is important to people, but the techniques used in specialised goldsmithery often make this difficult and, unfortunately, expensive. Creating a unique and bespoke piece of jewelry usually involves the work of many people, which makes the process long, challenging, and expensive.

With this in mind, I began to consider: shouldn’t everyone have the right to have meaningful and unique jewelry made just for them, but somehow more easily and cheaply? Having a unique piece of jewelry made shouldn’t be solely for the richest of us. We all have the same need to express our feelings in the way that suits us best.

In my own jewelry designs, I have always disliked the idea that my jewelry would be valued simply according to the amount of gold or diamonds. I have always strived to imbue my jewelry with a deeper meaning, often by way of design, and thus make it more special and meaningful for the wearer.

My mission in the Jevelo project is to give everyone the chance to design unique jewelry that is important to them, and to be able to buy it at mass-production prices.

The Jevelo concept is also an extremely ecological way to produce jewelry. Not a single piece of jewelry is made without reason, rather every piece that is produced has been ordered by someone. We use 100% recycled gold and 80% recycled silver.

We need funding in order to make the Jevelo brand well known. We have created a completely new business model within goldsmithery and therefore we do not have any direct competition because the Jevelo idea is absolutely unique. This is also a challenge for us! We cannot really be compared to other companies using the same type of business model, and therefore we have to work very hard to get people to believe in us and trust that what we say is actually true and also possible.

We also need money for product development so that we can offer our customers better and more innovative tools or creating jewelry. The tool for Jevelo Coin products is already at an advanced stage, and we will get it finished within the Indiegogo project timeframe so that we can start to deliver products very soon after the end of the project.

Jevelo jewelry is of high quality and competitively priced. We hope that you, as a satisfied customer, will pass on the message. We want as many people as possible to be able to fulfill their dreams with Jevelo.

“Jevelo Coin” is our new product. It’s a coin with the picture of your loved one, your own picture, or something completely different. Pretty cool idea, don’t you think? Both sides of the coin can be personalised; there is space in the centre for the picture which is circled with an area for text. After hearing about the idea, a friend of mine said that he would order a coin with his two greatest idols: on one side, Bob Marley, and on the other, Stephen Hawkings; the only limit is your imagination.

The coins come in steel, silver, gold and platinum. The dimensions of the coins are 25.70 x 2.00mm, but the gold and platinum coins will also be available in a smaller 17.00 x 1.30mm size.

The coins will be delivered as orders are received, and as production capacity is still limited at this stage, waiting times could stretch into next year. It’s worth ordering quickly.

Soon after the end of the project you will be sent a unique code for your coin and a link to the tool where you can design your own coin. The code is used during the purchase process to zero the sum in the shopping basket.

We are in an “in demand” mode, so if we don’t reach our goal, nothing in particular will happen. We will still deliver products to those who have ordered them, and we will simply receive a little less attention than what we set out to get: there is, therefore, virtually no risk.

We are making the world a better place together also in terms of jewelry. You get precisely the piece of jewelry you want and precisely what you want it for, instead of having to buy a ready-made piece of jewelry that doesn’t really fulfill your expectations. Jevelo jewelry is only made when needed; there is no unnecessary production. We mainly use recycled materials and therefore we don’t burden the environment in the same way as we would if we mined specifically for them. You also know where your jewelry is from - it is made in Finland by me.

There is no direct risk involved in the project. The worst case scenario is that we would get too many orders and production would be delayed. In this case, the worst effect would be a 1 - 2 month delay on delivery, but we don’t believe this will happen. Our production is quite quickly scalable and we are constantly developing it.

If you like our idea, but you don’t want to order something for yourself, we would really appreciate it if you could recommend us to a friend who might want to be involved in our project.

story:
We asked what you wanted in a bag.
 YOU answered.
We are proud to introduce...





WHAT YOU GET WHEN YOU PLEDGE

Check out some of the Perks (on the right side of the page) associated with each pledge level and pledge accordingly. 



  • The Traveler is timeless and will age nicely as it holds the stories of your travels. It was desigend to last a lifetime and then some. This was made to be a family heirloom, a storybook of your adventures that your kids and grandkids will cherish as much as you. So get out there and live a great story. 

EVERY BAG HELPS SUPPORT AN ORPHAN

WE WANTED TO DO MORE THAN JUST MAKE AN AWESOME BAG. WE WANTED TO HELP ORPHANS SO WE PARTNERED WITH ANGEL HOUSE


In the same way that we researched what made the best backpack, we researched orphanages and charities to find out what works best and has the biggest impact. 

We were thrilled to find Angel House and even more excited about their model. 

They build orphanages in areas where the local community agrees to help support them. Support is primarily given in the form of meals, per Indian culture.  

Then they utilize the education system. In India, public schooling is free but you have to have a few things to get started. Angel House gets birth certificates and required paperwork for the children. They also provide them with shoes, clothing, and school supplies.  

These two pieces alone drastically reduce the cost of caring for an orphan but they do so much more. To learn more visit:  http://angelhouse.me


    *Buy a bag today & Change the life of an orphan*


What We Need

We need $12,000 to start turning this dream a reality. That might not seem like much to start a business, but we have already paid for design and development during each step of the process.  Now we just need your help to cover:

  • Inventory/Manufacturing -
     The prototypes are done but now we need a small amount of inventory.
  • Web Development/Marketing-
    The site needs to be completed & We need to get our product & story out to the world. 

    **If we don't reach our goal, the funds will go to fulfilling perks, and all remaining funds will be donated to Angel House to support orphans while we pursue traditional funding routes.**

Risks & Challenges

Launching a business is always challenging and risky but we will do our best to succeed. If any issues arise we promise to be as transparent as glass. We'll keep you informed and you will  have your orders in a timely manner!


Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help.

  • Spread the word about us & our mission using the share tools provided here. 
  • Help someone in need 
  • Perform random acts of kindness. 

    Together we can make the world a more beautiful and loving place.

story:
Imagine bringing back a fine watch brand from the past and restoring its heritage and prestige. Imagine wearing a watch with an authentic vintage style that evokes a rich history, but also features an unmistakably stylish and contemporary design. Imagine a dynamic new generation of watch enthusiasts discovering their own distinctive way of appreciating tradition – and looking towards a bright new future. Imagine LEJON.

Our vision is to create a watch that is rich at history, features a timeless design, the highest quality and all that for an affordable price.



The LEJON unleashed its roar for the first time during the Roaring Twenties, when it shook the very foundations of the brand's history. As the decade drew to a close, the lion lost its voice and fell dormant, waiting for the day when it could return to prominence once more.

Fast forward nearly 100 years to a scene that unfolded in the heartland of Switzerland's watchmaking tradition. Three young watch enthusiasts happen to stumble upon an antique shop in the cobbled streets of Zurich and are instantly drawn to the LEJON in the shop window. Intrigued, they step inside. The watch is equally functional and simple – a refined timepiece with an edge. The lion on the dial commands an unmistakable presence. Hence, they could not leave the shop that day without it. 

Released once again, the lion begins to stir. Fascinated by the watch's elegance and unique design, the three decide to delve deeper into its heritage. The three vow to revive the forgotten brand. Driven by their passion for timepieces, they set out to unite the brand's authentic heritage with a dynamic design that captures the zeitgeist of the era: “Impeccably classic but unmistakably contemporary”. The LEJON’s timeless strength is given a new lease of life. Hear the king of the urban jungle roar once again. LEJON - heritage reborn.

Our new collection features 4 base unisex watch models, dedicated and named after our homebase's - Zurich, Switzerland - most famous and unique areas.

We didn't just want to celebrate LEJON's rich history - to us, it was also important to give the watch some modern key features - our amazing strap system allows you to play with your creativity, to fine-tune and adjust your watch to your styling and to build a watch that is right for a gala dinner, the office, a noble restaurant, your favourite Irish pub or perfect for the every day use.

[DISTRICT1]

Bahnhofstrasse - is Zurich's answer to New Yorks 5th Ave, Paris Champs Elysees or Londons Oxford Street. Sophisticated, metropolitan, timeless, powerful and as the watch - a fusion of yesterdays elegance with todays latest trends.


[DISTRICT2]

Enge - is very similar to Zurich's District  One - the biggest difference is that the time is turning slower, the streets are dominated by beautiful old stone buildings. District Two is noble, elegant, classy, timeless. 

[DISTRICT5]

Langstrasse -   known as Zurich's most famous nightlife street, the center of the redlight district and our company headquaters. It's dark, minimalistic, elegant, impulsive, beautiful, mysterious, wild, passionate and diverse.

[DISTRICT8]

SEEFELD -  located right next to the beautiful lake of Zurich. This area is all about the lake - water, sailing, swimming, sun , outdoor fun and enjoying the sundown. The watch is representing the importance of the lake to the people of Zurich. 

We are very proud to announce our strong partnership and involvement with DRAHTZUG (www.drahtzug.ch) - which is a beautiful integration program that allows 300 severe mental handicapped people to participate in the world of employment. Drahtzug is our official logistics and quality control partner.


[SPECIFICATIONS]

Movement: Miyota 
Case Material: Stainless Steel 316L
Case Diameter: 40mm 
Strap Material: Genuine Leather, with Stainless Steel Buckles
Strap Width: 20mm
Optics: Scratch Resistant Sapphire Glass
Water Resistance: 5 ATM
Warranty: 2 Years


As a young start up - the three of us share the passion and drive to make some waves in the watch industry. To establish our company in a market dominated by global players and huge brands - its YOU, its our friends, families and all the supporters out there - that made it possible for our vision, dream and passion to become reality - THANK YOU

story:
Ripe Brand Clothing's vision is to empower men and women throughout the world. Royalty is comes with a certain mindset that means that it's a struggle to get to become King or Queen. Royalty means that you have act a certain way, carry yourself a certain way and have strong beliefs that the people that came before them were strong believers in God themselves. God calls certain people to be rulers over certain places and professions.

BENEFITS TO KINGS

  • MORE THAN 25% OFF FUTURE PURCHASES
  • DIVERSITY
  • SOCIAL MEDIA SHOUT-OUTS
  • BRAND QUALITY
  • AFFORDABLE PRICE
  • FAST SHIPPING (2-3 ARRIVAL)
  • COMMUNITY SUPPORT
  • EDUCATION
  • UPLIFTMENT
  • EMPOWERMENT
  • (CATERING TO EVENT IN THE FUTURE AFTER THE CROWNING SHIRTS.)

ABOUT OUR FOUNDER'S VISION 

Terrance Ramsey's passion for starting a clothing brand is he sees a strong need for a brand to serve the community not just to sell a quality product but also to provide a service to people who need to be catered to. Back in the early mid-2000's, his mother couldn't afford designer clothing from the mall because she was a single mother and had to pay bills. Terrance used to get picked on for not having those types of clothes. We have a vision of where my brand will be one of the top brands of the world but affordable to people who lack finance.

GOALS AND ACCOMPLISHMENTS (RELAUNCH)

Ripe Brand Clothing needs $1,800 to get funded for our first Kingdom shirts. This order will take 30 days to mass produce overseas and orders will be fulfilled as soon as we receive the shipments. If you make a donation, you will get a shirt as well as a coupon code for a future purchase that never expires.  (This is continuation from foreign pineapple shocker). ($377raised)

MORE BENEFITS

 

  • The Seed of Royalty is to sow a seed with us and we are going to bless you with a future coupon code that never expires and each supporter will receive a crowning shirt to say thank you.
  • Each supporter is going to have their picture taken and we are going to put them in our secret Google+ culture community to where people can share their testimonies about our product and communicate how special we made them feel. People may not remember what you have done for them, they will always remember how you made them feel.
  • We are going to crown our kings that supports and serves the community around them.    

MARKET CHALLENGES 

The biggest challenge is building a brand from scratch and selling apparel solely online. The problem is people aren't going to know if the product is quality if it's just sold online. We also face possible production and shipping delays since our products are coming from overseas. The solution is we are going to have fashion shows in the local areas and across the state to get our name established through word of month. We are going to be shipping through DHL for promptness for our supporters to get their product as well as return the product if it doesn't fit correctly or its the wrong size. All you pay is shipping for your shirt.

WORD OF MOUTH GIFT 

Let's say that you're not able to donate any money. That is perfectly fine. We still will need your help. We need your help by spreading the word as well through social media. If someone donates money from your network we will give you a shirt as well to say thank you. Please like us on Tumblr, Instagram, Facebook, and our website is www.ripebrandclothing.com Please also use Indiegogo Share tools as well.
story_txt:
Ripe Brand Clothing's vision is to empower men and women throughout the world. Royalty is comes with a certain mindset that means that it's a struggle to get to become King or Queen. Royalty means that you have act a certain way, carry yourself a certain way and have strong beliefs that the people that came before them were strong believers in God themselves. God calls certain people to be rulers over certain places and professions.BENEFITS TO KINGS
MORE THAN 25% OFF FUTURE PURCHASES
DIVERSITY
SOCIAL MEDIA SHOUT-OUTS
BRAND QUALITY
AFFORDABLE PRICE
FAST SHIPPING (2-3 ARRIVAL)
COMMUNITY SUPPORT
EDUCATION
UPLIFTMENT
EMPOWERMENT
(CATERING TO EVENT IN THE FUTURE AFTER THE CROWNING SHIRTS.)
ABOUT OUR FOUNDER'S VISION Terrance Ramsey's passion for starting a clothing brand is he sees a strong need for a brand to serve the community not just to sell a quality product but also to provide a service to people who need to be catered to. Back in the early mid-2000's, his mother couldn't afford designer clothing from the mall because she was a single mother and had to pay bills. Terrance used to get picked on for not having those types of clothes. We have a vision of where my brand will be one of the top brands of the world but affordable to people who lack finance.GOALS AND ACCOMPLISHMENTS (RELAUNCH)Ripe Brand Clothing needs $1,800 to get funded for our first Kingdom shirts. This order will take 30 days to mass produce overseas and orders will be fulfilled as soon as we receive the shipments. If you make a donation, you will get a shirt as well as a coupon code for a future purchase that never expires.  (This is continuation from foreign pineapple shocker). ($377raised)MORE BENEFITS 
The Seed of Royalty is to sow a seed with us and we are going to bless you with a future coupon code that never expires and each supporter will receive a crowning shirt to say thank you.
Each supporter is going to have their picture taken and we are going to put them in our secret Google+ culture community to where people can share their testimonies about our product and communicate how special we made them feel. People may not remember what you have done for them, they will always remember how you made them feel.
We are going to crown our kings that supports and serves the community around them.    
MARKET CHALLENGES The biggest challenge is building a brand from scratch and selling apparel solely online. The problem is people aren't going to know if the product is quality if it's just sold online. We also face possible production and shipping delays since our products are coming from overseas. The solution is we are going to have fashion shows in the local areas and across the state to get our name established through word of month. We are going to be shipping through DHL for promptness for our supporters to get their product as well as return the product if it doesn't fit correctly or its the wrong size. All you pay is shipping for your shirt.WORD OF MOUTH GIFT Let's say that you're not able to donate any money. That is perfectly fine. We still will need your help. We need your help by spreading the word as well through social media. If someone donates money from your network we will give you a shirt as well to say thank you. Please like us on Tumblr, Instagram, Facebook, and our website is www.ripebrandclothing.com Please also use Indiegogo Share tools as well.

story:
Kind Cotton was brought to life by Kaitlin Johnstone, an elementary school teacher in Sarasota, Florida. As Teacher of the Year at her school in 2016, Kaitlin has dedicated herself to improving the lives of children she works with each and every day. Now, she’s taking this effort outside of the classroom.

At Kind Cotton we are committed to making a tangible impact on as many kids as possible. Rather than a simple book donation, we want to make a lasting impact on as many children as we can. This means not only getting books in children’s hands, but keeping them there. And keeping them in the households where they’re most needed. Starting with low-income children in Sarasota county, we have high aspirations of extending this impact nationwide.

 

Need help with sizing?

Check out our helpful Fit Guide 

 

*PLEASE NOTE*  

All items will ship 2-3 weeks after the campaign has ended. Thanks for your patience!

Your contributions will make all the difference in getting Kind Cotton off the ground. Upon achieving our goal we plan to:

  1. Build a solid inventory of various styles of ladies clothing and more!
  2. Market and grow our brand to reach as many people as possible - to make more of an impact!

With your contribution, not only are you committing to the amazing cause of Kind Cotton, but you're getting access to the first and only Kind Cotton products produced so far. Whether it's our clothing, a sticker, or a book donation we need you to help spread our message.

Competition: Obviously there is no shortage of ladies apparel in the marketplace. Everyday I am bombarded with Facebook ads myself on the next cool t-shirt to buy. At Kind Cotton, we strive to stand out from the clutter by focusing our mission just as much on the impact we are making in the community as the products we offer. We truly believe people will want to support our mission by wearing our brand.

Trends: Women's clothing trends seem to change at the drop of a hat. Staying current on trends in women's apparel is crucial to Kind Cotton's growth. Our clothing line is built on top notch quality and styles ladies will love. 

Inventory: The main reason we need your help. Building an inventory of various styles, colors, sizes, etc. is an overwhelming task that requires a good chunk of change. We are confident we'll have the support of the community to help us move our inventory and grow our brand, but the initial costs are a burden.

Hey, I get it, we're all strapped for cash. Looking to help without a monetary donation? Please share our campaign with as many people as possible - facebook, twitter, instagram, text message, email, old school U.S. postal service - whatever it takes, we appreciate all of your help and support in getting our message out there.

story:
We are family of 5 living in Berlin. Our 3 daughters: Pola, Ninel and Milla inspire us and give us strength to try and build new ideas. We believe that children, love and family are most important things in life.

Everyday we try to surround our children with love and help them to become happy carrying and strong people.

I'm a fashion and bag designer and my husband is a photographer.

Being parents for more then 12 years helped us to understand kids and their needs. 
Our clothes are easy to wear, easy to mix and easy to clean.

We need help to make next step and show Free Sisters SS18 collection in Paris at the one of most important fairs in kids fashion industry - KID SHOW

www.kid-shows.com

We use only natural materials like cotton, linen, wool that are good for kids.

Living in Berlin where slow life and "local" is important we produce all locally in our close neighborhood.
We design and make samples in our home studio. 

Fabrics are bought in Germany and production is made locally with help of local sewing shop.

In this way we can not only have everyday possibility to check quality and make changes and improvements if needed, but also we support our local community.

All textile wastes we donate to local kids club, where kids have free sewing classes.

Our kids are first testers. We make sure that quality of our clothes is best, that clothes can live long and can be passed to younger children, still looking good.

Thanks to my talented  husband our lookbook is shoot organically, on film. And our girls are the first testers and our patient models.

We have last minute chance to show collection for next SS18 in Paris thanks to invitation from KID Show.

Our good friends will take us to their home in Paris during that time. 

But we need some help.

Funding Breakdown:

Goal: €3000

​Indiegogo Fee + Transaction Fee  = 8% (€240)

€1200 cost of the stand at show. This is a price with big discount already

€500 for trip 

€300 for printing posters, flyers and catalogue

€500 for fabrics

€260 sewing

You can know more about us:

 www.instagram.com/freesistersberlin

www.facebook.com/FreeSistersBerlin

www.freesisters.co

Our first collection was futured in

Luna Lookbook

https://www.instagram.com/p/BSgAB87A3YZ/?taken-...

Magazine Kids

https://www.instagram.com/p/BRk3Z2vAG7V/?taken-...

Ladne Bebe

https://www.instagram.com/ladnebebe/

and Milk Magazine

https://www.instagram.com/p/BNjVSWKAP0O/?taken-...

Campaign schedule

24/07/2017 end of campaign

shipping starts from 15/08/2017

we do accept exchanges for different 

sizes in needed.

for size and color of clothes please write us a message at 

hello@freesisters.co

PERKS:

Available colors clothes :

light pink

raspbery pink

yellow

light grey

dark grey

blue

Sizes:

from 2 years -14

and adult size

thank you for all kinds of support, please share if you can

best from Berlin!

Free Sisters team

story:
What are we doing?

A place to discover new fashion

A platform to buy affordable emerging fashion and undiscovered labels

Changing perceptions in fashion

Stine Goya

How did we get here?

The Glass Pineapple was created because we wanted to buy exciting fashion from emerging and independent designers. But we couldn't find it.

Three years ago we started going to emerging designer catwalk shows, events and presentations to cover new talent for our Instagram and blog. We explored showrooms, design studios and communities and we found so many awesome designers. But finding them took a long time, shipping costs were high and there was often a lack of product info, no option to return and little customer service.

So, we decided to open an online store to house these awesome fashion talents and make it easier for new designers to reach people who want to buy emerging fashion – at prices that work.

The big obstacle we came up against was money – new designers are as bootstrapped as we are. They need up-front cash payments from retailers to go into production. Right now, the number of retailers offering this to new labels is very low. So nobody wins – not the designers who want to sell or fashion lovers who want more choice. And that’s why we’re here.

Kitty Joseph 

Why we're crowdfunding

What we've done so far is to open a window into the world of emerging fashion and undiscovered labels. Crowdfunding will enable us to do so much more, from increasing the numbers of designers we can cover, to shooting our own content using a more diverse range of models. Do you know how hard it is right now to find images of any fashion - especially new fashion - that features bigger models, for example? With your help we can make a difference to what's out there and maybe change some perceptions along the way.

We also want to create a simple, satisfying way to buy from new labels, with all the sophisticated customer service you'd expect from premium online fashion retailers. It will enable us to bring to life an online store with:

  • Lots of emerging and undiscovered designers in one place – no need to spend hours tracking them down online
  • Innovative, creative and exciting aesthetics – from modest and minimal, to outlandish and bold
  • New labels and undiscovered brands for all budgets – buying from emerging designers doesn’t have to break the bank
  • Free UK shipping and returns, great customer service – buy from unknown labels with peace of mind
  • The opportunity to invest in the brands whose values you believe in – ethical, sustainable, body positive, hand made, whatever you want to support you’ll find a label to love on our site
  • More insight into the size and style that’s right for you – online changing rooms, video, images, full info; fewer returns means less hassle and more labels to love

Agnes Nordenholz

We also believe that there’s a place in fashion for promoting a kinder and more collaborative approach that embraces diversity, inclusivity and openness without any compromise on aesthetics and style. You don’t have to be a certain age, skin colour or size to wear innovative pieces and look amazing –  we think it’s time to stop telling people that you do.

Ararose

Where will your money go?

We’re looking to raise £45,000 - it's a pretty ambitious target (eek) but the reality is that there's a lot we can do with whatever we are able to raise.

£0 - £5,000

- expand the coverage we provide of emerging fashion talent, geographically and in terms of the numbers of designers we can reach and the volume of coverage we can provide via the website and social media.

- invest in our own shoots, giving new designers exposure, creating images with a wider range of models of different body sizes (right now it's almost impossible to find images of 'normal' body sizes we can use) and using up and coming photographers.

- start developing our website to make it a better showcase for emerging and independent fashion with features that make it easier for fashion lovers to discover new finds.

£10,000 - £25,000

- create regular editorial featuring unknown designers and more diverse models and getting it out into the world where it can start broadening perceptions.

- work with a number of emerging designers, offering a fairer deal, helping them to overcome the obstacle of up-front production costs and giving them a platform through which to sell.

- vastly grow our emerging fashion coverage and begin to make a difference to how new fashion is presented and the bodies it is presented on.

- establish the foundations of a graduate competition that will give exposure to newly graduated fashion talent.

£25,000 - £40,000

- fully develop our online store to make buying more immersive and enjoyable, a way to discover new brands, make the right purchase and get inspired. This will include features such as integration of online changing room tech, video and images for every product and in-depth information to enable you to really engage with the brands.

- fully stock our store with the collections of emerging designers and independent labels who would otherwise be hard to find and buy (images on this page are just a few of the brands we plan to work with).

- fund the production of 1 x graduate collection per year.

- become a comprehensive creator, generating fashion content that drives our message of more ethical and sustainable choices, promoting unkown names, body positivity, diversity and inclusivity - without compromise on aesthetics or style.

£40,000 - £45,000

- begin the development of our app, which will connect those who want to make a difference in fashion and help bring fresh talent into the industry and give people a chance.

Iden Denim

New talent Katie Anne McGuigan shot by photographer Kerry Curl for us at Fashion Scout SS18

What’s in it for you?

Perks! From discounts on our store, to regular style inspiration, jewellery and fashion prints direct from the catwalk, there's plenty in it for you if you support our journey. Plus, our rewards feature awesome fashion experiences – including a trip to London Fashion Week – as well as some exclusively discounted products from some of our designers. And, of course, the opportunity to be part of helping to build an inclusive and supportive community of emerging fashion talent. When the campaign closes we'll contact you to confirm your perk, your address and any preferences you've made in terms of colour.

If you just want to support the project without buying a perk then select the 'Back It' button to the right of our video and you'll be able to choose how much you opt for.

Back us if you:

  • Want to be the first to know about emerging labels and up and coming brands from all over the world
  • Are keen to support growth at the early stages of the industry, from graduates, to stylists and photographers trying to get established
  • Love emerging fashion and want to buy more of it at prices you can afford and to fit your shape
  • Want to drive more positive messaging and embrace the kinder, more collaborative side of fashion
  • Want a better online buying experience that gives you all the information you need to find the right size and style

Clio Peppiatt

Risks and challenges

Our store has been three years in the making. That’s three years of travelling to showrooms around the world, fashion weeks, designer studios and graduate shows and being exposed to a very wide range of emerging talent. We believe we’re very well placed to be a channel between exciting labels and people who want to buy from them (take a look at our Instagram for the evidence). However, we recognise that every venture has risks and challenges. Perhaps the biggest challenge we face is ensuring that our website is fit to cope with demand and incorporates the new technology we are planning to use to make our buying experience better. We also face the usual challenges of any clothing retailer in terms of ensuring supply and delivery at the right time and buying seasonally six months ahead. 

At The Glass Pineapple community is really important to us – so if you can't support us financially, don't worry, you're still welcome. If you want to help spread the word about our campaign to your friends and family then we value that hugely too.

Coralie Marabelle

The brands in our video

These are just a few of the fantastic designers and brands we've found in recent years.

Iden Denim: great fitting jeans in premium denim fabrics that don't cost the earth. Iden use fabrics from pioneering mills, with an emphasis on natural, organic and recycled materials - their pieces are striking and thoughtful. All the denims in our video are Iden, plus the peach pussybow shirt. Find out more about Iden Denim.

Naya Rea: Naya designs for women who want to stand out for all the right reasons. Her designs are inspired by contemporary woman’s ability to maintain strength and poise, juxtaposed against sensuality and a woman’s sense of vulnerability. The brown velvet dress and gingham suit in our video are both hers. Find out more about Naya Rea.

Ararose: the printed playsuit, shorts and the slogan tees in our video belong to Ararose. These sibling designers  are committed to empowering and celebrating women with their designs, promoting sisterhood and encouraging women to be their most powerful, natural, greatest selves. Find out more about Ararose.

Quin Collection:  Royal College of Art alumna Queenie Chan founded Quin in 2015.  This London-based contemporary womenswear brand takes a subtle approach to design aesthetics, interweaving textures to create simple, clean refined silhouettes. Her navy dress and blue and white striped sundress both appear in our film. Find out more about Quin.

Hannah Brabon: Hannah is a gradate of Winchester School of Art and creates pioneering pieces that are texture rich and seriously bold. Her designs promote the concept of slow fashion and reducing the impact the industry has on the environment. Find out more about Hannah Brabon.

Our video was shot for us by the awesome Little Boffin.

Christopher Esber

Beggren Studio

Dawei

Naya Rea
