This is why we’ve invited international tattoo artists to join our project and design the patterns to our garments.You’ll find that each of our garments have a unique style and story to tell. At the same time, they all emphasize on the same powerful message : That you are all Queens and Kings, Goddesses and Gods. Sovereign. Free. Liberated. Belonging to the greater family of One Earth One Tribe and indissociable to the One Consciousness.What other causes will you be supporting with Bridging Worlds ?Bridging Worlds is openly and actively supporting :- Disenfranchised populations. In this case, we’re showing our support to the hilltribe people of Thailand with a job opportunity that is fairly paid and that also empowers them in their traditions.- Women’s Rights with a policy based on Equal Rights. In result, most of the key and strategic positions are being occupied by women, this came to be on the basis of their professional and human skills, regardless of their gender.- LGBTQ Rights. In effect, we are very happy to be collaborating with two talented members who are also actively engaged in the LGBTQ community.What is the SCOE Foundation ? And what’s the relationship with Bridging Worlds ? SCOE Foundation stands for Spiritual Court of Equity Foundation,It is an organization that upholds a gateway of spiritual ethics and truth to then support and facilitate the redistribution of land for projects and living structures that work in true alignment with Earth Mother, the Rights Of Nature and Universal Love. The SCOE foundation will facilitate alliances between the Earth and those communities who's projects and visions set a foundation for ancient and balanced living practices in true relationship with the Earth, relationships that support the earth, educate the people, enliven and enrapture all sentient beings through visionary art, music, plant medicines, permaculture, ecology and sustainable systems of living being, ascending and dying. Indeed, Bridging Worlds believes in the return of a Golden Age and is here to support The Event that will bring us back home, to ourselves. Bridging Wolrds will now work in Partnership with The SCOE foundation to raise funds, create partnerships and also Bridge communities who are driving the movement home in alignment with the true Rights of Nature. Bridging Worlds will be raising funds for the foundation through the sales of it’s garments. INVEST IN BRINGING CLOTHING TO THE HOLISTIC / HEALING DEPARTMENTThe main function of clothing todayThe primary use of clothing is to cover our bodies and to afford a protection from heat and cold. They have derived into a use to please the eye and express a lot about one’s status, personality and occupation.  Bridging Worlds’ end goal is to take clothing to a holistic level by infusing crystal into it’s fabric. But we need your help.This is probably Bridging Worlds most unique and exciting aspect.There exists a process that allows this alchemy to take place. For now, it is mostly used in Nano engineering for other purposes. But Bridging Worlds wants to experiment this for it’s own goal of bringing another form of healing to the people.Our experimentation is based on the knowledge gathered around the healing properties of crystals. Indeed, for thousands of years, ancient civilizations have utilized the power of crystals to release mental, physical and spiritual blockages, thus facilitating the free flow throughout the body. On a cellular level, our bodies are made up of mineral silicon-dioxide. Because of this, we are naturally receptive to the vibrations of crystals as they transmit, reflect, store light and receive energy. So, when crystals are placed directly on our body, they have a powerful vibratory effect that surges from the crystal to you. And according to the law of physics, thoughts direct energy and energy follows thought.We want our crystal energy garments to serve as a tool to help the thoughts of your consciousness connect with your body. This is an opportunity for you to invest in an exciting new venture, a way of wearing that will uplift and empower both the wearer and maker. Join us on this venture.  MORE DETAILS ON THE SOCIAL ENTERPRISEHow is Bridging Worlds setup ? Bridging Worlds is a social enterprise that is setup as an online business and that will start it’s  production in Thailand.Who is Bridging Worlds target audience ?Bridging Worlds' target audience is :- The 20 to 45 years old men, women and non binary.- People who identify with the New Age / Vegan / Conscious Movement- People with hobbies and passions for spiritual gatherings and festivals, eco travels, visionary art, holistic and alternative healing.- People politically engaged in human and animal rights,  in community projects and  environmental causes.What is Bridging Worlds marketing strategy? Bridging Worlds will sell mostly online (80%) through our website : www.oneearthonetribe.org  Facebook and Instagram.  Bridging Worlds will expand it’s market with :- Sales in markets and in festivals. Mostly in Australia where the most of our community resides and where the economy is strong. - Wholesale in key places known within the ‘conscious community’ as being spiritual destinations : Koh Phangan in Thailand, Ubud in Bali, San Marcos in Guatemala, etc- Wholesale in America in States like Colorado, California and Oregon where hemp is very popular and the economy quite strong due to the legalization of marijuana. At what stage is Bridging Worlds ? Bridging Worlds is at a stage between the prototype and production phase. We have a first prototype and first tribal design.Part of the funding will go to finish this prototype with the embroidery and in creating the rest of our collection to start the production. More details below.What has been done these past 3 months and what’s still unfolding at the moment ?- We have sourced the fabrics and accessories at the local market.- We have our first clothing prototype done and our first tribal design..- We have the designs for the next 4 garments. And one extra tribal design about to come in from our tattoo artist, Elu.- We have the association who is taking on the production under their name for legal purposes.- We have the working space to start the production, based outside of Chiang Mai.- We have a website setup as a landing page, featuring a number of things including an online shop : www.oneearthonetribe.org- We have Facebook pages and Instragram accounts setup and we are currently creating and programming relevant and interesting content. Who composes the team and what are their values ?We have an amazing and talented team in place that covers most of the key positions : * Robert is our online architect.  He has built the website and is heading the department of marketing. He has been doing this for a few years now. He is truly a passionate, always seeking for new ways of operating and building authentic relationship with his clients. * Jesse designed our first prototype. Jesse is from South Africa and now lives in Chiang Mai, Thailand. He is starting his own brand of clothing from upcycled fabric. His style is designed to fit those who identify as gender fluid. This is a cause dear to him. * Aoth is our pattern maker. He is Thai and well spoken in English. He has taught himself the skills of pattern making from his passion for Ladyboy Cabaret Shows in which he is very much involved. He is an artist and a creative that knows how to think ‘outside of the box’ and who is very much appreciated by his community. * Lrun is the the main qualified tailor who will also be training the rest of the team to our standards. She knows how to handweave hemp and dye naturally and has worked with a couple of international clothing companies. She has learned this knowledge from her mother and is now passing this knowledge onto her daughter.  * Jeab is our main agent of liaison. Born in Bangkok, she grew up in Central Africa and Germany, This allows Jeab to have have an understanding of both western and eastern ways. She genuinely is passionate in showing support to anyone in need and in building community. Her fluency in English and Thai have also proven to be a huge asset to the smooth running of our project. * Suzette is our operational manager in charge of quality control and exportation. She is Australian and has been living in Thailand since 2012. She has a company that provides ethically handmade products to multiple companies around the world. She has a passion for creating environmentally friendly products and making companies aware of where their products are coming from.* Polia is the first tattoo artist with whom we started collaborating. Part of her work is channeling cosmic portals, containers of energetic codes that she weaves in her creations. Over the last 4 years, she's been sharing her work at a larger scale within the conscious community of The Rainbow Serpent Festival; creating interactive installations, spaces for people to step into other worlds.

 
 ABOUT THE CROWDFUNDINGHow much funds are we raising ? And what will the funds be used for ? We are raising $ 20 000. This will be used accordingly :- $500 to get the last patterns and prototypes done and finish our first collection called Samsara.- $500 to experiment infusing crystals in fabrics.- $800 to pay for the design of our logo.- $700 to pay for the trademarks : business name and logo.- $3,000 to help us start with our online marketing strategy including Facebook ads.- $1,500 to purchase a camera that will allow us to put online our own / high quality photos and showcase our clothing line. - $1,000 to hire the services of a branding expert. - $200 to finish paying off the service of the videographer who created the promo video- $6,500 to purchase the bus that will transport our products from festival to festival in Australia.- $4,000 to pay for the material and labor to build our market stall.- $1,000 to pay upfront the first 3 festivals in Australia- $500 to pay for the Thai visasWhat is the main risk and challenge that Bridging Worlds could encounter ?The main challenge that I see for Bridging Worlds today, is keeping up with time frames and delays in the production and exportation. It’s true : Thailand has really a timing of its own. It is very much cultural and quite widely spread in the mentalities. Thai people have a popular saying describing this, which is ‘Sabai Sabai’ meaning : Relax, there’s no need to rush.The best way that I’ve found to overcome this challenge was to adopt a business model that is in alignment with the slow fashion industry. In this scenario, it is understood that the production is based on schedules that are more flexible. However, we will have at least 3 people on the mission of monitoring the most important deadlines. The main risk for Bridging Worlds, is to see new laws  voted by Thai government that would be this enterprise more difficult . We are operating legally in Thailand, in partnership with an association who comes in support to the hill tribe people by providing them with warm clothes for winter. This association has expanded their social and humanitarian mission by incorporating our production in their mission. Also, the best way that I’ve found to overcome this risk, is by keeping our production small in Thailand (with 4 tailors max) and expanding our production in Nepal where the culture and use of hemp is worldly known. Furthermore, Nepali people are also looking for opportunities to rebuild wealth and community after the 2015 Earthquake.  IN CONCLUSIONA LAST CONFESSION Before coming to the conclusion, I want to share with you that I feel very happy, proud, excited, humbled and in aw by the birthing and evolution of Bridging Worlds, One Earth One Tribe and SCOE Foundation. Looking back at the work that has been accomplished in less than three months, it’s quite impressive and really incredible ! Support came in very early, with for example, $1,500 of financial aid that came in before any prototype was  designed. Today, the community supporting these projects have spread to four continents. I can only link this phenomenon to the facts that these projects are coherent with an offer that is in alignment with our time and need for change. Also, these projects come from a place of Love. They all are about ‘giving back’ : giving back to the people, giving back to Mother Earth. I believe that these projects speak to peoples’ souls like it does to mine. Of course, there is space for progress and betterment. But this is where we are at today. I have trust in these projects like I have faith in us. We will succeed.  ALL KIND OF HELP WILL BE APPRECIATED INCLUDING TECH SUPPORT AND DONATION OF MATERIALYes, we want to raise $20,000 and we are very grateful for your contributions. Every dollar is important to us. THANK YOU. At the same, we invite everyone to join us on Facebook and Insragram to follow our progress. Sharing our work is also a great way to show your support.Finally, we would deeply appreciate any kind technical support, especially for our online presence : Branding, Marketing, …And material donations like a 2nd hand camera or laptops or crystals wou!d also be amazing !THANK YOU !!!!!

story:
When it’s time to hit the town, sporting your very best attire and new apparel, your belt is a defining part of the outfit. It makes or breaks the look, whether we want to admit it or not. Wearing the same old belt, every single time, gets boring, devaluing the time you put into your individual style. We all know this struggle. That’s why reversible belts are more enticing: they give you choices.

Unfortunately, reversible belts are far and few between, especially when you have those that need you to unhook the adapter from the strap to change your buckles. Those reversibles will mess up your leather straps, wearing down over time.

In order to look interesting every time you step out of the house, it’s necessary to own multiple belts at once. However, it's definitely costly.

A reversible leather belt with interchangeable designer buckles. Your styles will never be limited ever again. More choices, more styles. Your belt will always stand out from the crowd, no matter where you go!

 

The ARconnector is well designed and easy to use, holding the strap and buckle between the two like a bridge. The ARconnector adapts to all 35mm belt sizes. Made with PA6, one of the toughest plastic material in the industry, it is ultra-light in design, giving you the unique ability to go through security checkpoints without ever having to take off your belt. ARconnector comes standard with all straps.

 

The interchangeable buckles are made with Zinc-Alloy to safeguard the best quality. Our buckles come with clips on both sides, allowing you to switch back and forth among the buckles you have onto the strap, depending on your outfit.

We have varieties of options, from standard style buckles to designer buckles that complement whatever you’re wearing. The more buckles you own, the greater your fashion freedom.

 

All of our straps are made of leather with different designs and colors on both sides. The strap comes with ARconnectors designed to attach all ARbuckles, offering flippable styles to match your outfit every way you want it.

 

 

 

 

Team ARbelts is always looking for better solutions. We’re never content with the status quo, which is why we provide the most updated fashion forward belts. We’ve decided to create our own belt that isn’t like any other product on the market. We’ve created the belt of the future.

Roger Chen

Roger brings years of experience developing/designing products for golf brands. As a truly passionate designer and innovator, Roger created new products to improve the golfing experience.

Stehpen Chiou

With over 5-years of IT experience, Stephen is adept in marketing strategy and IT, understanding what the future market will need to offer. “The internet has grown bigger than we’ve ever imagined because people innovate. It is time for us to create something that will make men accessories fresh, with unlimited possibilities.”

Andy Liu

Andy brings 30-years of manufacturing experience to the forefront of ARbelts. Andy’s factory has manufactured belts and buckles for top brands around the world. With Andy’s help and supervising, we’ve amassed a team that is proficient in belt design and distribution.

Michael Lao

Originally from California, Mike had spent the past few years shooting project films between the US and Asia. He was able to present ARbelts the best way possible on film, allowing millions of people to see the true potential of our innovation.

It’s always frustrating for men to find a perfect belt, sifting through the thousands of options on the market today. We wanted to create a better solution, known as the ultimate belt, that can fulfill men’s needs to change their belt color/texture and buckle instantly without buying similar belts over and over again.

We knew we were onto something. At that point, we started to break down every single element of what a belt consists of and how to improve upon the design.

When Co-Founder Andy got a bracelet made out of different straps that could be put together in different colors one day, it piqued his interest. He instantaneously saw something bigger in this mechanism. The basic concept for ARconnectors was born. We have adjusted the mechanism and made significant improvements by designing the unique buckle clips and custom made connector.

Another great feature about ARconnector is that it’s made of plastic, complementary to the  men who travel as much as we do. We all know the same problem: remove your belts when passing through security checkpoints. Then, we decided to use PA6 plastic for the ARconnector. After rounds of prototype and testing, we had arrived at a plastic solution that can stand the test of travel.

From Bellez the Prototypes to ARbelts

After 3-years of hard work, research, and collaboration, we finally launched ARbelts. We started with a prototype and launched with a brand name Bellez. Bellez was using a similar mechanism, but with metal connector. Conducting our research and feedback from our customers, we upgraded the connector to make it lighter and smaller. For the most current version, ARbelts buckle clip had changed to PA6 plastic to reduce the weight and versatility. Most importantly, it’s more cost-effective.

Today, we are passionate about changing the men’s belt industry for the better, demonstrating that style and affordability don’t have to be mutually exclusive. We’re a team that never stops learning. We plan to continue developing new fashion tools for the future ahead.

After two years of developing and testing various prototypes we are confident that we have the best design possible made with the best materials. We realize there is always the possibility of setbacks when bringing a product to market and have planned accordingly. We've worked for years in the manufacturing industry to ensure that production standards are kept to the highest quality.

MANUFACTURING 
We have been working with our manufacturing team for the past few years in getting the design ready for mass production. We've also allotted enough of a cushion in our timeline so that any unforeseen setbacks will not delay the delivery date for our backers.

If, despite all of our planning, we are still delayed in our delivery, we will make communication with our backers a priority, and keep you informed of the progress every step of the way. Fortunately, we own the factory, delaying ARbelts delivery will not be an option.

We are committed to you, just as we are committed to bring an amazing new product to the market.

 


 

​

story:
Short Summary

Hey ya'll, I'm Max and I'm an Actor and teaching artist living in Los Angeles and I want to share with you what I've learned while traveling the world! I've had the honor to teach students from Costa Rica, to China, Brazil to NYC, Boston to Florida and even here in Los Angeles. The journey’s been amazing and I still learn every day! All this traveling, teaching and meeting new people has given me insight into how connected we are. And we truly are connected!! We all have the same fears, same struggles, same loves, same passions and I believe now, more than ever, is the time to reconnect, come together and change the world!  Made in Pangæa is a motivational, inspirational and lifestyle apparel brand in its infancy needing your help to get off the ground and on the streets!

What We Need & What You Get

To get Made in Pangæa up on its’ feet, we need $10,000 from our trusted friends and family. This will cover all legal, establishing, some marketing, and get our on-line presence up and running. Once we’ve achieved that step, we’ll be ready to take the next step with some momentum behind us! Also, with this step, we’ll be purchasing screen printing tools/machines/materials to ensure a quality product – which is the reason we’ve started this whole thing!

 

Then, almost like Oprah, YOU GET A SHIRT, YOU GET A SHIRT, YOU GET A HAT, YOU GET A HOODIE!!! Everyone who helped us reach our goal gets EVERYTHING!!!!

The Impact

It starts here. This is the ground floor. The overall goal is to change the world. Simple, right? Teach a man to fish, and he’ll never go hungry. MIP isnt’ just a clothing company. It’s a lifestyle. It’s connecting with other like-minded people all over the world to truly make a difference. To see beyond race, color, religion and to look into the eyes of your neighbor and see their character. It starts with fashion but hopefully the effects of MIP will reverberate through our country and ultimately our world when we stop looking at it as an us versus them, but merely just US!   

Step 1: Start a clothing line

  • Gather fellow Pangaeans
  • Get the word out within our community
  • Spread the message that we’re here to change the world!

Step 2: Partner with a not-for-profit organization who has the save views as MIP

Step 3: Growth

  • Social Media Influencers
  • Online media
  • Political campaigns

Step 4: regroup, restructure, revive!

  • This is when we’ll take time to asses our global position and effectiveness of our message, and make plans for the future

Other Ways You Can Help

Yes, we need money to put this plan in motion. But more importantly, we need Pangaean’s! We need you to spread the word to other like-minded people and help this world come together once and for all! Please send this Indiegogo to your friends and family on Facebook, Instagram (@madeinpangaea)  and LET'S CHANGE THE WORLD TOGETHER!!!

story:
- This revolutionary patent bikini was designed for each and every woman out there, to fit her unique body type and to ensure comfort.

- The broad straps allow various designs so that each woman can find the perfect fit for her body and mood.  The unique designs allows for a One Size Fits All, so you don't have to worry about your Jini not fitting perfectly. Twist, knot or wrap the straps around your body to create different styles as a Top or Bottom.

- You don't have to fit in a JINI, the JINI will fit your body perfectly.

                                        This makes it the ONLY bikini of its kind.

 

     

 

- JINI's design is special, because it works with your curves.  Instead of having normal straps, the JINI's straps are broad and specifically shaped to provide support and comfort while you soak up the sun and have fun. 

- The JINI bikini has two full pieces of fabric that are stitched together with a double sewing technique using spandex thread, which guarantees that the JINI will be able to stretch, twist and fold to your needs and desires.

- This means you are guaranteed to have a high-quality bikini that won't rip or tear.

- This Bikini also allows you to insert cups if needed.

 

- Jini is the perfect bikini while you are pregnant, seeing as your bikini will fit you every step of the way and your body will be changing.

 

- We recently launched JINI in South Africa, with our focus on helping all women find their perfect bikini, because we know women of all shapes and sizes love to wear bikinis.

 

And YES she is a Grandmother!!  ^^^^^^

- We would love to let everybody know about our JINI, and this is why we need your help.  Just imagine women all around the world being able to find and wear a bikini that really fits their body shape and mood!

 

If you cannot contribute to this, it is all right.  All we ask of you is to help us spread the word -

Please share our Indiegogo page with our friends using one of the Share bottons on this page.

Feel free to visit our facebook and Instagram page or website.

Facebook page:  www.facebook.com/jinibikini/

Instagram: @jinibikinis

 

Drop a Like and Share, or Tag a friend who would love this!

Website:  www.jinibikini.com 

We would love to hear from you.

 

We invite you to be part of our dream.  Let's get the word out, because every woman deserves a JINI.

 

What women from all over the world had to say:

 

Christia Visser﻿ - (32A) My bust is 32A and bottom 8, sometimes a 10... As you can imagine, I always have to buy different sizes for top and bottom when I buy a bikini... Except with Jini bikinis ❤ it does not matter how I twist it, the fabric always naturally falls to my body, so I get to wear it however I feel comfortable on any given day :) I love it!

 

Jessica Viljoen - (36A)  I have too many styles to have a favorite. Every time it's a new style! Hahaha! The top is a perfect it. I choose the style for my mood if I want a "little" cleavage I choose a V cut style, if I feel like embracing my obviously flat chest I choose a different style.  I have never been one to wear a Brazilian cut bikini because I have a bigger but and don't like showing it off! But I love my jini because it has not elastic so no butt fat roll. I feel more confident than ever and will wear my jini every beach holiday!

 

 

Melody Kiang - (36B) Jini bikini is a comfortable and versatile piece every girl should own in their closet. Growing up, I have always struggled with my weight and had to buy several different bikinis in different sizes. Now, I don’t have to worry about buying multiple bikinis as this one will adjust to my body shape. I feel sexy and confident in this bikini because it’s comfortable, easy to style and most of all, flatters any body size and shape!

 

 

Elizabeth Du Plessis - (36C) The Jini Bikini is absolutely amazing. I have always struggled with finding a bikini top that fits properly and that covers all the necessary areas because i am on the bigger side. They fit soooo well and make you feel super comfortable because of the great quality and PERFECT fit. The different styles make it so much fun to wear and you can find the proper style to fit your build super easily, depending on how much coverage you want. I would recommend Jini Bikini to anybody trying to find a great fit for ANY size. I will never buy any other bikini again. Thanks JiniB

 

 

 

Nicole Athanassiou - (34E)  Wow wow wow... E for Exceptional! I was very hesitant to order as I’ve struggled to find a bikini which fits and that is comfortable. My bra size is a 34E and it can be very challenging to find a bikini to fit my shape which always landed up being uncomfortable or popping out at the worst times?. When my Jini arrived in the most beautiful packaging,I began to get super excited. I put it on immediately and  Wow Wow Wow... it fitted perfectly and was super comfortable especially around my neck. I would recommend this versatile bikini to all woman with a struggle similar to mine.

 

 

 

Anna Kuiti - LOVE this product!!!! I'm a mum who struggles to find a comfortable bikini to fit me after having my babies and Jini is perfect! It's a genius idea! Get one!

 

- LOVE IT! I’m a 60 year old grandma who’s a size 14 and it’s so comfortable and I don’t feel like I’m going to fall out.           (Anna Kuiti's MOM)

 

Other Reviews

 

Nicola Kate Smith - Oh my word it covers so well and love the colours!

 

Andrea Wessels - I’ve seen tons of pictures of girls effortlessly looking amazing in this bikini, it had to of been the bikini that made them look amazing, right? It fit these girls like a glove and they rocked it. Me? Last year December I worried that with my huge 8 Months pregnant belly hitting the beach, I wouldn’t find a bikini that fitted my body. It was such a struggle finding something that will still fit at the end of my pregnancy. I fell inlove with Jini Bikini, it fitted like a glove. The bottoms fit perfectly and complimented my belly. The quality of the material is amazing and stretchy. Now more than 2 months later I still rock it on the beach, we live less than 15 minutes from the ocean and river, where I spend endless summer days till late in the afternoon with my Jini Bikini. I wrap it as I feel and as tight as I want. What a life saver! Will definitely recommend it to everyone!! Well done Nani!
story_txt:
- This revolutionary patent bikini was designed for each and every woman out there, to fit her unique body type and to ensure comfort.- The broad straps allow various designs so that each woman can find the perfect fit for her body and mood.  The unique designs allows for a One Size Fits All, so you don't have to worry about your Jini not fitting perfectly. Twist, knot or wrap the straps around your body to create different styles as a Top or Bottom.- You don't have to fit in a JINI, the JINI will fit your body perfectly.                                        This makes it the ONLY bikini of its kind.       - JINI's design is special, because it works with your curves.  Instead of having normal straps, the JINI's straps are broad and specifically shaped to provide support and comfort while you soak up the sun and have fun. - The JINI bikini has two full pieces of fabric that are stitched together with a double sewing technique using spandex thread, which guarantees that the JINI will be able to stretch, twist and fold to your needs and desires.- This means you are guaranteed to have a high-quality bikini that won't rip or tear.- This Bikini also allows you to insert cups if needed. - Jini is the perfect bikini while you are pregnant, seeing as your bikini will fit you every step of the way and your body will be changing. - We recently launched JINI in South Africa, with our focus on helping all women find their perfect bikini, because we know women of all shapes and sizes love to wear bikinis. And YES she is a Grandmother!!  ^^^^^^- We would love to let everybody know about our JINI, and this is why we need your help.  Just imagine women all around the world being able to find and wear a bikini that really fits their body shape and mood! If you cannot contribute to this, it is all right.  All we ask of you is to help us spread the word -Please share our Indiegogo page with our friends using one of the Share bottons on this page.Feel free to visit our facebook and Instagram page or website.Facebook page:  www.facebook.com/jinibikini/Instagram: @jinibikinis Drop a Like and Share, or Tag a friend who would love this!Website:  www.jinibikini.com We would love to hear from you. We invite you to be part of our dream.  Let's get the word out, because every woman deserves a JINI. What women story:
Dating back to a little innovation that made our lifes better during military service, we have developed a multifunctional, super durable and affordable gadget to guard and secure your personal items such as keys, wallets, badgets or mobile phones and prevent them from losing them, falling out of your bag, pockets or getting stolen!

 

 

Features of RASGY:

- Super durable buffalo leather for longevity

- Advanced and completely closing lock to keep your items secured

- Multifunctional usage of both, the lock and the band to attach your item

- Simple and unobtrusive mounting and removal of the product with 1 hand

- Affordable and fair prices as well ad quick delivery

 

 

....... so, why do you want to buy an overpriced Bluetooth or GPS tracker for your wallet or key which will only make you have to run after your belongings if you lose them or they get stolen? What if you could also just buy an affordable, functional, and stylish carrier for your belongings?

 

 

Perks:

Click on your preferred perk on the right side of this campaign for some more details.

- Do you need a gift for a friend who has recently lost her/his wallet?

- Have you got a sibling who never remember where they had put their keys?

- Does the bag of your girlfriend contain more stuff than Mary Poppins'?

- Do you simply need a functional gift for your clients instead of the typical chocolate? 

Let RASGY take away one worry from you and get yours now!

 

  

 

The Story behind RASGY:

A few years ago, I was in the military where we lodged in a 10 people dorm room. One of us fellows was responsible for carrying and guarding the room key for a day. Whenever someone lost the key, as a punishment he would have to carry around the next key with a big 1-kilogram wooden block attached for an entire day. In case he lost the key again, he would have to carry around an even heavier 3-kilogram bucket of sand attached to the key for an entire day. Obviously, nobody wanted to lose the key anymore and we needed to safely guard our key. That is where my friend and I came up with an idea and we decided to simply attach the key with a string directly to our belt or pants. By doing so, we made sure it did not fall out until we got back to the dorm room after our training. (Story continues below the images)

 

 

 

 

Second Part Story:

When we came back home from military service, we noticed several situations in our lifes where such an attached key, wallet or even phone would have been very useful. Therefore, we decided to fiddle around and start producing these strings in a bit more of a fashionable, but still affordable way. Soon after, RASGY was born.

story:
The Creator

J.o.a.n. Atelier was created by Vicky Adegbola, a Nigerian American who grew up in Columbus, Oh. Frustrated with the aesthetic of affordable womenswear options available in the fashion industry, she decided to create her own brand that would offer unique statement pieces and stylish essentials at a reasonable price. J.o.a.n. stands for jaunty, optimistic, audacious, and natural--the characteristics of our customer. 

One imperative aspect of our brand is that we have meticulously crafted imagery that increases the representation of women of color.  In general, the fashion industry has struggled with adequate representation of women of color in their ads, social media sites, and runway shows. We seek to make fashion accessible and approachable. Also, our garments will conform to the curvier body type to help alleviate the common frustrations they face in the dressing room.

In addition to providing bold contemporary garments, we are producing our garments in Nigeria to help create more job opportunities. Being a Nigerian American, it is important that we do not forget our roots and we do everything we can to help our community. 

With your help, we will be able to provide affordable fashion to women everywhere while increasing the opportunities for skilled artisans who deserve to be able to provide for their families.

Risks & Challenges

Our biggest challenge is completing production in Lagos, Nigeria from the United States. Although we are highly involved in every aspect, we also depend on our liaisons based in Lagos, Nigeria to oversee the manufacturing. Also, the high shipping costs to get our product from Nigeria to the United States creates an ongoing hurdle for our company. The best way to overcome these challenges is to make at least two trips per season to ensure the manufacturing process is going smoothly and that we deliver a quality product.

What We Need

We have started production, but we need more help to be able to complete the collection. We are seeking $20, 000 for the items below:

  • Production, fabrication and shipping costs
  • Transportation to and from Lagos, Nigeria to ensure quality standards are being met and we remain consistent with ethical manufacturing
  • Marketing campaigns
  • Adequate pay for local artisans in Nigeria

*If we do not reach our goal, the funds will still be used towards these items. Any amount helps!!

What You Get

  • For every gift up to $25, you will receive a personalized thank you letter.

  • For every gift from $26-$50, you will receive 10% off your first order.

  • For every gift over $50, you will receive 20% off your first order.

Other Ways You Can Help!

If you are unable to make a donation, that's ok! Please share this campaign with your family, friends, coworkers, or anyone you know and follow us on our social media pages listed below.

  • Instagram @j.o.a.n.atelier
  • Facebook @joanatelierofficial
  • Twitter @JOAN_ATELIER

Thank You!!

story:
INTRODUCING OUR PROJECT

Montenapoleone MCMX was born in Milan, the fashion capital of the world, and it bears the name of one of the most famous luxurious streets in the fashion district of Milan.  Our goal is to reinvent the Italian craftsmanship, renew it and project it into the New Millennium.

Montenapoleone MCMX is the quintessential Made in Italy: stylish, handcrafted and unique, created by young luxury fashion designers in collaboration with expert craftsmen. Their joint efforts have given birth to an entirely digital brand, which cuts the costs of fashion stores and mediators, and equally guarantees the quality, top-notch handmade materials and uniqueness of Italian fashion brands.

The Lady bag, Shoulder bag, Multifunctional, Fanny pack, Card holder and Mini wallet are the very first creations of the Montenapoleone MCMX collection. Our bags are now on pre-sale for the first time on Indiegogo! 

Become a backer of this project. Click on the Perk you want, enter your payment info and choose a single bag, or a set, and personalize it in every detail.


 

LUXURY BAGS WITHOUT LUXURY MARK UP

We are a new fully digital brand without retails or intermediaries that would significantly increase sales prices. For this reason, we can offer you the best possible quality at a reasonable price.

 

THE COLLECTION

LADY BAG

It’s a stylish and spacious day leather handbag designed to be adaptable to different looks, both for work and for leisure. 

Product details: calf leather,  removable shoulder strap,chain handle, zip closure,  double inside pocket, front metal logo, inner lining.

Customizazion:
Color: white, navy blue, beige, wine.
Metallic details, chain: silver, gold.
Size: 24 cm x 34 cm x 17 cm 

Choose your additional bag strap

 

SHOULDER BAG

The evening piece that combines elegance and practicality with a touch of glamour. A versatile bag that can be worn even during the day, thanks to the change of accessories. 

Product details: calf hammered leather, inside pocket, back pocket, lower closure with magnet, adjustable leather chain, front big metal logo, inner lining.
Customization:
Color: white, brown, grey, black.
Metallic details, chain: silver, gold, half leather chain, chanel chain, all metallic chain.
Size: 24 cm x 20 cm x 10 cm

Choose your additional bag strap

 

FANNY PACK

For him and her, to show off in those informal situations where practicality reigns supreme. It is the revenge of fanny pack that finally takes on a fashion connotation.

Product details: calf hammered leather, front and back pocket both with zip, inside pocket, adjustable leather shoulder strap, inner lining.
Customization:   
Color: white, black, camouflage, warm red.
Metallic details, chain: gold, cosmic black.
Logotype MCMX color: black, white, gold.
Size: 30 cm x 18 cm x 8 cm

Choose your additional bag strap

 

MULTIFUNCTIONAL

A bag designed to split into three! 
Tote, backpack and bucket for a multifunctional woman model suitable for those who love to change often and need to break the routine.

Product details: calf hammered leather, closure with zip, back pocket  with zip, inside pocket, adjustable leather shoulder strap, front mini chain and logo Montenapoleone MCMX.
Customizazion:
Color: navy blue, black, grey, warm red.
Metallic details, chain: gold, silver.
Size: 40 cm x 42 cm x 8 cm

 

MINI WALLET

Elegant and functional it can hold phone, cash, papers...
Perfect  when wearing an evening look with shoulder bag or if you don't want to carry the entire bag, but only the essential personal items.

Product details: calf hammered leather, front opening, back metallic logo.
Customization:
Color: cream&red, black&grey, wine&black, white&fucsia.
Metallic logo: gold, silver.
Size : 18 cm x 9 cm  x 0,8 cm

 

CARD HOLDER

The possibility of having all the cards you need with you, from credit cards to plastic documents. Elegant model with envelope closure, in textured leather and with visible stitching for a fashion touch.

Product details: calf hammered leather, letter envelope opening, back metallic logo.
Customizazion:
Color: cream&red, black&grey, wine&black, white&fucsia.
Metallic logo:  gold, silver.
Size: 11 cm x 9 cm x 0,5 cm

 

 

 

WHY MONTENAPOLEONE MCMX?

What distinguishes Montenapoleone MCMX from the big fashion brands? Craftsmanship, which makes each piece unique, one of a kind and unrepeatable.
Design, attention to details, quality materials, 100% genuine & certified leather… mixed in an Italian way!

A Montenapoleone MCMX bag, speaks for itself.

LIMITED EDITION

To make each model and, above all, each customer unique and special, we offer our collection in a limited series of 1,000 pieces each which will guarantee quality and authenticity

 

TRADITION & INNOVATION

The most important thing for us it's to create a luxury bag collection completely handcrafted, made with quality Italian leather that recalls tradition but, at the same time, eager to express a clear modern design without forgetting the value for money.

Our collection is created by young luxury fashion designer in collaboration with expert craftsmen up to find the perfect balance between innovation and tradition and give life to a new brand that does not make use of intermediaries or physical stores to reduce costs.

CRAFTMANSHIP & QUALITY

We want to give importance to Italian craftsmanship for which we are famous in the world and we have collaborated with the most important leather goods manufacturers in Italy who work for high-end fashion brands. The Montenapoleone MCMX bags are all made of high-quality leather that will give you that feeling of softness and luxury typical of Italian leather.

 

TIMELINE

 

TEAM

We are a team of young fashion designers, web designers and Italian creatives all with a great passion for beauty, whether it be in connection with fashion, architecture or art, and no better place other than Milan could be chosen to get inspiration and give life to our ideas.

…but we did more than that: we choose as Corso Venezia, one of the four main streets in Milan Fashion District, as our head quarter!

 

RISK AND CHALLENGES 

With full transparency we would like to inform you that in a craftsmanship, unlike the industrial one, there may be several factors that could affect the delay in delivery times. We have carefully selected professionals with many years of experience, but should you experience any delays, we will do anything possible to update you on the status of your order. Thank you in advance for your patience and for your understanding.

Craftsmanship, which makes each piece unique, one of a kind and unrepeatable.Design, attention to details, quality materials, 100% genuine & certified leather… mixed in an Italian way!A Montenapoleone MCMX bag, speaks for itself.LIMITED EDITIONTo make each model and, above all, each customer unique and special, we offer our collection in a limited series of 1,000 pieces each which will guarantee quality and authenticity TRADITION & INNOVATION The most important thing for us it's to create a luxury bag collection completely handcrafted, made with quality Italian leather that recalls tradition but, at the same time, eager to express a clear modern design without forgetting the value for money.Our collection is created by young luxury fashion designer in collaboration with expert craftsmen up to find the perfect balance between innovation and tradition and give life to a new brand that does not make use of intermediaries or physical stores to reduce costs.CRAFTMANSHIP & QUALITY We want to give importance to Italian craftsmanship for which we are famous in the world and we have collaborated with the most important leather goods manufacturers in Italy who work for high-end fashion brands. The Montenapoleone MCMX bags are all made of high-quality leather that will give you that feeling of softness and luxury typical of Italian leather. TIMELINE TEAMWe are a team of young fashion designers, web designers and Italian creatives all with a great passion for beauty, whether it be in connection with fashion, architecture or art, and no better place other than Milan could be chosen to get inspiration and give life to our ideas.…but we did more than that: we choose as Corso Venezia, one of the four main streets in Milan Fashion District, as our head quarter! 
RISK AND CHALLENGES With full transparency we would like to inform you that in a craftsmanship, unlike the industrial one, there may be several factors that could affect the delay in delivery times. We have carefully selected professionals with many years of experience, but should you experience any delays, we will do anything possible to update you on the status of your order. Thank you in advance for your patience and for your understanding.

story:
INTRODUCING MIHLONDON

 

The environmentally conscious and ethical long-lasting sneakers, that is versatile, wearable, comfortable to be worn all day and adaptable to any kind of style, for an affordable price.

 

 

 

We believe by creating our unisex sneakers focused on the aesthetic that inspire and connect people and cultures, we can contribute to the development of the conscious society, offering a new vision of modern and vintage sneakers inspired by a range of worldwide trends, using recycled and the finest certified Italian materials, without harmful chromium.

 

 

 

THE SNEAKERS

 

More than just a sneaker, our first Low Top model is called DB and comes in 5 colours and fits both men and women. A contemporary , versatile, trendy and wearable design where durability meets comfort , to be worn with your favourite pieces on your daily basis.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Our mission and responsibility, is to find the most ecological materials provided by ethical suppliers contributing towards our philosophy, to minimize the environmental and health impact of the shoe industry.

We don't use any chemicals that are banned by REACH. REACH is a European Union regulation on chemicals and their safe use. The MIHLONDON and its suppliers are obliged to follow REACH’s regulation and restrictions.

Our leather is sourced from Italy, an ethical tannery who uses an eco-tanning process, that maintains environmental protocols for leather and allows making chromium-free leathers. The shoelaces and our non-woven PP fabric are made with 100% post-consumer recycled plastic bottles.

Our B-light sole is made from 30% recycled rubber and from 70% traditional synthetic rubber maintaining the maximum performance and comfort, while we are slowly evolving to a completely recycled rubber sole. We aim constantly trying to improve our products focusing on durability and comfort.

 

 

 

  • Today, 844 million people – 1 in 9 – lack access to safe water, and 2.3 billion people – 1 in 3 – lack access to a toilet. 
  • Globally, 1/3 of all schools lack access to basic water and sanitation. 
  • Water and sanitation-related diseases kill nearly 1 million people each year. 

At MIHLONDON we are driven by "making a difference around us." and together, we can help put an end to the Global Water Crisis.

As part of our ethical commitment, we're supporting Water.org, an international nonprofit organisation that has positively transformed millions of lives around the world with access to safe water and sanitation.

For each pair of sneakers sold, MIHLONDON donates 5% to Water.org, helping to provide long-term access to safe water and sanitation for one person in the developing world.

Photo credits to Water.org.

 

 

By doing this, we will help end the Global Water Crisis and empower people in need around the world – giving families hope, children health, and communities bright futures.

Learn more about Water.org here.

 

 

Environmental responsibility and ethical conduct is a key commitment of MIHLONDON. 

We are conscious of our environmental impact and how a sustainable process can contribute to minimizing the environmental and health impact to the development of a better tomorrow, which is why we spent over a year researching and locating a factory that follows our environmental and ethical conduct.

Our factory in Felgueiras-Portugal guarantee safe working conditions, treat workers with dignity and respect, act fairly and ethically, and use environmentally responsible production process maintaining the highest manufacturing standards. Combined with great care and unique know-how of Portugal in craftsmanship using recycled materials sourced from Eco-suppliers, without harmful chemicals contributing towards our philosophy that allow us to produce a limited conscious premium high-quality handmade sneakers.

 

 

REWARDS

 

 

 

 

 

ANY DOUBTS ABOUT HOW TO PRE-ORDER?

Please follow the steps below

 

1. Click "GET THIS PERK": Select the available reward tier you would like to pledge on the right side of the page. Each backer may only make one pledge.

2. Payment: Enter your payment information. Your payment won't be effective until the very end of this campaign.

3. Size, Color & Shipping Information: Don’t worry about that yet! You will get to select your Size, Color choice and submit your Shipping at the very end of this campaign.

4. You will receive your MIHLONDON sneakers on February 2020 :)

 

For more information or questions, please feel free to contact us at info@mihlondon.com, we are more than happy to assist you :). We are available Monday to Saturday, 9 am - 6 pm CEST and a team member will be able to respond to you in English, French, Spanish, Italian or Portuguese  depending on your preferences within 48 hours, from Monday to Saturday.

 

 

 

TIMELINE

 

JOIN THE COMMUNITY

 

 

Risks and challenges

 

Throughout the past years we have been challenging ourselves to get here today. Because we were lead by our passion and our ambition to bring our sneakers to life, we did not hesitate to put all our eggs in one basket (risking savings, time spent but also dedication and fun). One of the biggest challenges we have had so far has been finding suppliers that will truthfully comply with our environmental and ethical conduct, able to produce a limited versatile, wearable and comfortable premium high-quality handmade sneakers using a conscious production process.

Today, we are proud to say that despite all the sacrifices made our project is on his way. To be more than a brand of shoes, we brought our mission linked with our ethical commitment “making a difference around us” by providing a better tomorrow for everyone in the developing world.

We are aware of the importance of carrying a big project like this one. We realise that the road ahead is still long plus challenging however despite all these, our team is fully trained, ready to carry on and deliver each sneakers on time. Although there are circumstances that can be out of our control unfortunately, but if we encounter any of these, we promise to communicate and keep you updated throughout the progress with full transparency.

Thank you for your support on our project! We are so excited to bring our MIHLONDON sneakers to you and make this project a reality.

The MIHLONDON Team.

story:
Short Summary

Hello! And thank you for visiting/supporting my campaign. My name is Roshonda Coleman and I'm a salon professional of 20+ years. When I first starting doing hair I had 2 goals attached to my career. The first was to own my own salon, of which the Lord has opened the door for me to accomplish. The second was to launch my own product line, which is why you're here, right?

During my time as a stylist, I've watched the hair industry transform. Client needs have change, thus the demand changed as well. One thing that is important to my customers is all around health; but specific to my arena, healthy hair. We are in a new era where clients are very educated on which products are good and bad for the hair, which is AWESOME!

One of the biggest changes within the last 10 years to the hair industry is embracing the natural hair that the Lord has given us. Which has transcended into changing the culture of our workplaces and day to day dealings. I would have to say that 95% of my clientele has shifted to natural hair, of that, approximately 80% prefer to still have a sleek "relaxed" look. Which is why I specialize in Silk-Presses. 

My product line is vistal in nature, giving you the sleekest, softest, shiniest Silk-Press and on the opposite end, the conditioner gives you a very defined Wash N Go that doesn't give in to shrinkage. 

Your support of this campaign is a very important part of the official launch of this product. Your pre-order will kickstart the mass production of this wonderful product line. With that said, I would like to say thank you in advance for all your help. I appreciate you! 

 

God Bless you

Roshonda Coleman

story:
A Quick Overview

  • Hi! I'm Lori Novis, Founder and CEO of Mango Fish Art™ and its new Proud of U.™ division. I've been playing with art since I was 3, and have been a librarian for almost 20 years. I learned how to make jewelry 10 years ago before moving to the tiny and beautiful island of Culebra, PR.
  • My husband and I relocated to western Massachusetts in 2016 and I discovered that the poverty rate is high in this region -- 40% of the students with whom I worked in northwestern MA are living at poverty level; 99% of our Holyoke Public School students are on free- and reduced-lunch; and 13% of residents in western MA are living at poverty. 
  • Helping others has been at my core since I was a child. More than 45 years ago, my second- grade teacher commented on my report card that I would assist other students who were struggling after I finished my work. She mentioned that I had deep compassion and empathy for students that were having problems. I was only 8 years old. 

  • I realized that through marketing my handcrafted gifts and jewelry to sororities and universities, we could scale up our jewelry production, hire women, and help to address the level of poverty in this area. 
  • Contributors like you can help us to scale-up dramatically by funding training for women artisans who are ready to learn and earn a paycheck with our newly established partner, Artesana https://artesana.co
  • Please take a moment to view some of Mango Fish Art™'s accomplishments and awards in the below timeline. 

What We Need & What You Get

  • We are seeking to raise $6,000 to train 10 women artisans for 40 hours. Additional funding of $2,000 is also required for essential supplies: beads, embroidery scissors, storage bins, needles, jeweler's thread, chairs, task lamps. ergonomic chair pads, and tables. 
  • We are offering some fun and unique perks depending on your level of giving ... Mango Fish Art™ magnets, coffee mugs, a postcard 10-pack highlighting photos of Culebra and Puerto Rico's beauty, taken by Mango Fish Art™ founder, Lori, a handcrafted Red, White & Blue Proud of U.™ bead, and some secret perks! Special perks will be available if you share our campaign and your referrals raise money. 
  • If we do not reach our entire goal, we will prioritize training as many women artisans as possible. 

The Impact

  • There is a curtain of hidden poverty in America's rural towns and cities, and women and their children are most subjected to financial stress. Mills in western MA have closed and have not been replaced with other employment options. Employment provides a paycheck, purpose and a forum for mentoring.  Mango Fish Art™ is deeply mission driven ... seeking to provide employment and supporting mentoring programs for women.
  • As a public librarian in a tough NJ city, I saw firsthand the positive affect of mentoring on our high school library pages ... a few of our young adult employees are now successful and happy adults in part because of the informal mentoring they received from librarians and library staff. 
  • We have the wonderful opportunity of positively contributing to not only individuals, but to Holyoke, MA, a city that faces economic development challenges and all of the toughness that accompanies it. Indiegogo is a beautiful example of how a community can change the trajectory for an individual, business, or non-profit ... it fits perfectly into the nature of our business.

Mentoring Carissa literally moved her to St. Petersburg, FL, when she was 18; she did not know anyone in the area, and managed to land a job at the University of South Florida in the library. She continues to live in St. Pete and is part of a beautiful family. This is the power of mentoring.

Risks & Challenges

Not reaching full funding goal and scaling down (temporarily).

  • Living on a tiny and isolated island for 8 years has taught me to be resourceful, creative, and persistent. Owning and managing a guesthouse, writing grants, earning 501(c)(3) status for 3 Culebra non-profits, rescuing and adopting dozen of animals, this was all accomplished by someone who can multitask, prioritize, and ask for help when warranted. I have done this. Time and again. Culebra has empowered me.
  • Fortunately, we have built a solid coalition of competent and knowledgeable volunteer advisors through WBOA, Women Business Owners Alliance, and I continue to work with 3 mentors, assigned to me by the Business Accelerator Program, Spark EforAll Holyoke. I will readily call upon these groups should I run across challenges I cannot solve alone. 

Women Business Owners Alliance (WBOA) Volunteer Advisory Board

 

Spark EforAll Mentors

 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • If a monetary donation is not possible at this time, please dust off your megaphone and make some noise about our campaign ... talk us up to your family, friends and colleagues!
  • Feel free to energetically use the Indiegogo share tools as well!

An exciting partnership is about to happen between Mango Fish Art™ and Artesana!

We are honored and deeply grateful for all of your support.

You are now a part of this inspiring story.

story:
German designer, Volker Eberle has spent his career making watches and accessories for fashion & luxury brands . His passion for detail and quality craftsmanship come together in WTIF.

 One day Volker asked himself "What if I could build a clear watch case?"

"What if it was made of sapphire crystal?"

"What if we could do it for less than $1,000?"

"What if?"And so, the WTIF brand was born. 

For the past 12 months, Volker has sought to design and invent a beautiful watch that is different and never before seen at a reasonable price point.

Finally, after dozens of iterations, Volker completed this extraordinary watch with a complete sapphire crystal watch case.

The design is stunning, contemporary and classy.

With each glimmering, moving, mechanical piece on display and enhanced by a perfectly clear sapphire crystal, it truly stands out from the crowd.

From his connection to the Swiss movement factory, Volker is using the of the most reliable Swiss made automatic mechanical movement in the watch.

Moreover, the case for this watch is waterproof to 50 meters.

The icing on the cake: we can manufacture this watch at a stunningly affordable price of $1000, and we're practically giving it away to some backers at a price less than $400.

On December 7, 2018

Our team has redesigned the logo for WTIF based on our backer's comments.  I need to thank you to all our supporters here.  We believe we have the right logo for WTIF now.

Most watch brands would not appreciate a unique design which might drive down their margins. We are passionate about designing a watch that will break through that glass ceiling.

We're also passionate to about making this watch affordable, so we chose to assemble the watch outside of Switzerland.

By using Kickstarter to launch the project, we can sell this product directly to you, which will eliminate all the high mark up prices from the middle men.

Most Swiss made automatic mechanical watches are extremely expensive. By using the Swiss STP 1-11 automatic mechanical movement, we have achieved the quality and the accuracy of a Swiss made watch.

Each watch comes with free shipping and a collectors wood box.

After the campaign ends, you’ll receive an email with instruction on how to choose your watch.

We promise to deliver within six months of our last day of our campaign. We know we have the people, partnerships, and manufacturing schedule to make this happen.

Due to the history products not delivering on Kickstarter, we understand your concern about backing projects and seeing your money disappear. Too many creators have over-promised and under-delivered, shipping products in poor packaging, with bad fits, that look and function nothing like the images.

We want to overcome all of your fears, objections and possible concerns with the Sapphire Crystal Watch. If you ever have a question, please email us at support@wtifwatches.com and we'll get back right away.

The years our R&D team spent developing and perfecting the Sapphire Crystal Watch have paid off. Not only is our manufacturer firmly committed to shipping these beginning May 2019, but we are offering free fast shipping on every order.

We are so confident in our product, we are backing it with a 2-year warranty. If you’re not satisfied for any reason, send it back to us, and we will supply a new one.

German designer, Volker Eberle has spent his career making watches and accessories for fashion & luxury brands . His passion for detail and quality craftsmanship come together in WTIF.  One day Volker asked himself "What if I could build a clear watch case?""What if it was made of sapphire crystal?""What if we could do it for less than $1,000?""What if?"And so, the WTIF brand was born. For the past 12 months, Volker has sought to design and invent a beautiful watch that is different and never before seen at a reasonable price point.Finally, after dozens of iterations, Volker completed this extraordinary watch with a complete sapphire crystal watch case.The design is stunning, contemporary and classy.With each glimmering, moving, mechanical piece on display and enhanced by a perfectly clear sapphire crystal, it truly stands out from the crowd.From his connection to the Swiss movement factory, Volker is using the of the most reliable Swiss made automatic mechanical movement in the watch.Moreover, the case for this watch is waterproof to 50 meters.The icing on the cake: we can manufacture this watch at a stunningly affordable price of $1000, and we're practically giving it away to some backers at a price less than $400.On December 7, 2018Our team has redesigned the logo for WTIF based on our backer's comments.  I need to thank you to all our supporters here.  We believe we have the right logo for WTIF now.Most watch brands would not appreciate a unique design which might drive down their margins. We are passionate about designing a watch that will break through that glass ceiling.We're also passionate to about making this watch affordable, so we chose to assemble the watch outside of Switzerland.By using Kickstarter to launch the project, we can sell this product directly to you, which will eliminate all the high mark up prices from the middle men.Most Swiss made automatic mechanical watches are extremely expensive. By using the Swiss STP 1-11 automatic mechanical movement, we have achieved the quality and the accuracy of a Swiss made watch.Each watch comes with free shipping and a collectors wood box.After the campaign ends, you’ll receive an email with instruction on how to choose your watch.  
We promise to deliver within six months of our last day of our campaign. We know we have the people, partnerships, and manufacturing schedule to make this happen.Due to the history products not delivering on Kickstarter, we understand your concern about backing projects and seeing your money disappear. Too many creators have over-promised and under-delivered, shipping products in poor packaging, with bad fits, that look and function nothing like the images.We want to overcome all of your fears, objections and possible concerns with the Sapphire Crystal Watch. If you ever have a question, please email us at support@wtifwatches.com and we'll get back right away.The years our R&D team spent developing and perfecting the Sapphire Crystal Watch have paid off. Not only is our manufacturer firmly committed to shipping these beginning May 2019, but we are offering free fast shipping on every order.We are so confident in our product, we are backing it with a 2-year warranty. If you’re not satisfied for any reason, send it back to us, and we will supply a new one.

story:
Are you still worrying about not being able to find a partner during outdoor activities or is it hard to find your pets? Meet MofinderX1 - track every important thing for you!

 

It helps find a friend, a lost pet, or anything else, in any direction, with accurate tracking technology.

 

 

And it's also a superior alternative to Apple’s AirTag. It can track short and long distances, and even has real-time tracking features. Unlike Airtag, which can only be used on iOS devices.

Not rely on phone signals or mobile phones to track a lost item. With one-press precise positioning, MoFinderX1 allows you to provide more reliable protection during outdoor activities.

The MoFinderX1 tracker can adapt to many kinds of pet needs. One controller can connect to up to 4 trackers; great for families with more than one pet.

 

By pressing the “location” button,you and your friends can get each other’s precise location and distance -- You’ll also receive GPS directions to meet up with them. The MoFinder X1 gives a strong sense of security and is always reliable.

*A controller can only be connected to one controller

There are many other trackers that require you to pay a small monthly fee to use their tracking function even after the initial purchase. But MofinderX1 does not require a SIM card, a monthly fee, a network, or a mobile phone signal to provide the tracking function that a tracker should have!

 

Whether you are out in the daytime or walking your pets at night, the LED light from the tracker will make tracking and seeing your pets at night much easier.

 

The MoFinderX1 tracker is totally waterproof so don’t worry about any risks of water damage, the tracker has IP67 waterproof and the controller can support life waterproof. Your dog can play in the water without any worry!

The easy-clip and snap design of the controller can attach to almost anything, safe and secure.

MofinderX1 also has a smart app that allows you to set up basic settings. You can bind the MoFinderX1 controller with the tracker through the app to monitor your pets' activities, record voices and set up the safe zone range, etc.

By tracking your pet’s daily activities, you can better manage your pet's shape, weight, and more.

You can set a safe zone of up to 3 km with the app. You will be notified as soon as the tracked device leaves the safe zone. This is also suitable as an emergency device for children or adults with special needs.

story:
Short Summary

  • To introduce myself, my name is Michael Hines I am a 29 year old military veteran and served in Operation Iraq Freedom.
  • My campaign is to bring a dream to life with the GlowBox. There are tons of products that glow in the dark but now here is a  convenient way to recharge any glow in the dark items. This product is near and dear to me because I have invested a lot of time into this and I will not stop until this dream is a reality.
  • Contributors will help me turn GlowBox into a worldwide brand by contributing and purchasing one of the perks.

What We Need & What You Get

  • I am trying to raise $100,000 by receiving contributions and by offering perks. The money will be used to purchase  products in turn will mark the beginning stages of GlowBox becoming a global brand.
  • The perks that are being offered on my campaign are unique designs that shows my creative side. 
  • If the goal is not reached the funds contributed will be used to purchase products as well.

The Impact

The impact you will make by contributing to my campaign is giving me the opportunity to start an amazing journey with the GlowBox brand.

Risks & Challenges

The only risk is to get enough orders and contributions to have this product introduced into the world. Since there virtually no major risks the perks will have a guaranteed 30 day turnaround after the campaign ends

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute financially you can always contribute by spreading the word using the indiegogo share tools.

story:
Hello and thank you for stopping by our Indiegogo crowdfunding campaign page.

My name is Tom Wayne and I am the founder of PRODIGYGOLFER®. 

PRODIGYGOLFER® is a progressive young adult golf and sports apparel brand.

This campaign is important because it aims to be a catalyst for change in an industry that is searching for ways to grow and connect to its younger generations. In addition to being a catalyst for change, this campaign looks to address a very common problem encountered by the younger players of the sport.  Our products fill a gap in the under-served teen/young adult golf apparel market which is critical to the future growth of the sport.  The concept of the company and inspiration of the products are based off of almost a decade of involvement with junior golf.  Over the years, the same conversation continued to come up among parents, “Where can I find performance based cost effective apparel for the younger modern golfer?” There just isn't anything for today's younger modern golfers to call their own.  Currently, the only option is to find one of "your parent’s" brands (assuming it fits correctly) and pay painfully high prices for those other major brands.  Let’s face it, those brands started out as adult apparel, continue to market to adults.  They have all forgotten about the younger generations.

With your help and contribution, you can have a direct impact on bringing a “NEW ALTERNATIVE” to the legacy adult brands but at affordable prices.  Together, we can bring a new younger look and attitude to the beautiful and storied sport of golf.Our mission is to inspire confidence, individuality and fun through an apparel brand that they can “call their own”.  We are looking to raise $30,000 to be put towards production costs (i.e. – promoting, fabric costs, cut and sew costs.  In addition to our current "Tee It Up" Collection", we are looking to produce 2 more shirt collections and 1 skort collection.  To give you an idea of just the factory costs associated with a single "collection", I have broken it down for you

8 styles (4 Male/4 Female) x Min Order Qty (MOQ) of 400 units x freight = Approx $30,000.

* This cost includes hang tags, care tags, bar coding and production man hours.

We are excited to offer unique and exciting perks for each level of contribution ranging from receiving apparel pieces and accessories to having the opportunity to become a designer and determine a color scheme for a single shirt design on a future production (We will provide available color options).

All funds collected through your contributions will go directly toward ongoing production costs, as well as, continued marketing efforts to create brand awareness.

With your help, PRODIGYGOLFER® can become a catalyst of change that is desperately needed in the golf industry.  By connecting the sport to its future players, we aim to become a trusted and recognizable golf and sports apparel brand.  The fact is, the game has been suffering from an aging baby boomer population coupled with years of limited support around attracting younger players. However, there are some very specific areas of growth that have emerged and currently injecting new life into the sport.  Those growth areas all align with PRODIGYGOLFER® apparel.  They include; younger generation players, female, and multi-cultural.  The timing is right for a fresh new generation to get introduced and grow with their style and their game.  The future of the game depends on the younger generation and I am passionate about making a contribution to the game.

Milestones:

2014: Soft launched at 2014 PGA Merchandise Show in Orlando, FL.

2014: Validated the need in the market and received feedback from both end-user customers and commercial customers that helped shape our latest designs and color stories.

2014: Started to make waves in the golf apparel industry by partnering with one of the U.S.'s strongest PGA sections, the Southern California PGA (SCPGA) section. Through that partnership, we were the title sponsor for 3 of their 2014 Junior Golf Tour tournaments.

2015: We have also had a successful 2015 PGA Merchandise Show in Orlando, FL this past January by landing the most awarded golf facility in the US as a new customer right next to some of the game’s major apparel brands.

We are currently filling orders for our current delivery called the “Tee It Up” collection as well as taking pre-orders for our upcoming releases called the “Pin Seeker”, “Medalist” shirt collections as well as our most recent release, our “Champ” skort collection.

Risks & Challenges:

Leveraging my experience and knowledge for solving complex problems, I foresee several critical hurdles that will need to be overcome. 

First, there is a barrier of entry into the golf industry which has traditionally been dominated by major "adult" apparel brands.  

-- Answer:  A major difference and advantage we have over them is that we are being born into this specific demographic.  This benefit allows us to remain closer to our customers and focus on a customer base that is loyal, independent and cost conscious.  The majority of brands in the golf industry began as adult brands and will always focus on that demographic in order to keep their market positioning among their peers.  For us, this leaves the door open for the opportunity to become the leader in the young adult/teen segment.

Second, the cost associated with creating brand awareness and educating the industry buyers requires various strategies.  These strategies include end users, pro shop managers, resorts, specialty and big box retailers merchandisers.  

-- Answer:  We were sought out by and eventually partnered with the same firm that brought both Softspikes® and SkyCaddie® to their mainstream market leadership positions. With their almost thirty years of selling to the golf industry, we are leveraging their expertise and relationships to open and educate the above mentioned customer sales channels for us.

Third, the cost of production requires a significant financial investment. 

-- Answer:  Up to this point, I have bootstrapped everything.  This is where your investment comes in.  In order for us to keep opening doors and offering unique new apparel to aspiring golfers and generating a new targeted revenue stream for retailers, we will need your support.

All of these hurdles can be addressed and overcome with your support and contribution.  If you cannot contribute, we ask that you help carry our message to your friends, family and colleagues.

FAQ

Where is the apparel and accessories made?
Our shirt and head-wear collections are both designed in Orlando, FL. Shirts are manufactured in Colombia.  Our head-wear is made primarily in China with the exception of our #GIMMIE (White/Black) hat which is made in Vietnam.

What is your apparel and accessories made of?

All of our products are all made from 100% polyester.  With the exception of our #GIMMIE hat, our hats are made of 100% polyester.  Our #GIMMIE (White/Black) hat is made in Vietnam and is made of a 50% Polyester / 50% Cotton blend.

When are the perks expected to ship?
We will fulfill perks in the order they are received. We are aiming to start fulfillment according to current and future delivery dates.  If a product is currently available, we will ship it right away to you.  If a product is not currently available, we will ship it to you once it becomes available.  All dates have been listed above – please refer to those for specific timelines.  In the meantime, we will be do our best to hit our future deadlines, but product development often has unexpected hiccups, so we cannot guarantee this. We will keep our backers apprised of our expected delivery time frames as we get more information. Delivery time frames will also depend in part on how many orders we receive. If we need to re-order to accommodate your perk, we will be sure to reach out to you individually to keep you up to date on the status of your perk. We will scale our production based on how many orders we receive.

What is the Warranty?
We provide a limited warranty guaranteeing you receive your PRODIGYGOLFER® apparel piece or accessory free of manufacturing defects.

Can I change or cancel my perk?
Indiegogo policy dictates that campaign owners have no ability to adjust your perk selection. That means we cannot upgrade your perk, we cannot change your perk and we cannot cancel your perk. Please note that contributions made on Indiegogo are also non-refundable. Sorry, no refunds or exchanges.

How is shipping handled?
We will be shipping via the United States Postal Service.

Contact

For press and bulk order inquires please contact us at sales@prodigygolfer.com. 

Last but not least... If you are unable to contribute, we understand completely.  If you believe in our vision and understand where we want take this brand, then please help get the word out and make some noise about our campaign. You can start by using the Indiegogo share tools!
   

Thanks for taking time to learn more about our PRODIGYGOLFER® apparel project.  We look forward to your support!
