It is expected to arrive before the campaign’s end on Dec 12.
Hence we will deliver for Christmas in the US, and we are also confident about Christmas delivery to the other countries where we ship.

 

Plain White Snow:

Plain Navy:

Plain Crimson Red:

White Snow Evolve:

Navy Contrast White:

Crimson Red Contrast:

 


 
Origamo flower embroidered on the chest:

 
100% Origanic Pima Cotton from Peru:

The Peruvian Pima is a luxury cotton, one of the softest in the world because of its Extra Long Staples, and being Organic it has a much a better environmental footprint than conventional cotton.

The cotton used by Origamo complies with the rules of the U.S. and European Organic standards:
 

 
Yarn colored with Eco-Friendly and Non-Harmful dyes:

Your skin and the environment are protected.
Eco-Friendly and Non-Harmful dyes, since the factory which colors the yarn for the Pacific Polo is GOTS certified and OEKOTEX class I certified for the dyeing operations.

GOTS: The Global Organic Textile Standard is one of the most demanding international processing standards for textiles made from certified organically produced raw materials.
OEKOTEX: The OEKO-TEX® Standard 100 is a worldwide consistent and independent test and certification system for the absence of harmful substances for raw, semi-finished, and finished textile products at all processing levels.

 
Australian Mother of Pearl collar buttons:

Origamo selected the Australian Mother of Pearl for its quality and for the sustainability of its production process.
Each of these buttons is unique and has its own iridescent shine, so on top of the distinction touch they add to any outfit, these Australian Mother of Pearl buttons make each Pacific Polo slightly different, and uniquely yours.
There's one extra Australian MoP button on the inside… for life accidents.

 
Double pique knitting:

Double pique knitting, a fabric structure with higher relief than traditional single pique, allowing for a better quality feel while preserving the garment flexibility and avoiding the boxy effect.
 
Reinforced Uneven side vent:

This American style side vent is made with the same color pique tape and very well finished, and it is reinforced with a bar tag to ensure long lasting quality.
 


 
Size information:

Origamo uses American sizes, which usually run larger than Universal sizes used in Europe.
You can use the size grid, to compare with some of your current Tee-shirts or Polos.
For Europe, you should consider taking the Origamo size one notch below your usual universal size.
E.g. Pick an Origamo M if you usually wear a universal L.

If the size does not fit, you can contact us during 15 days after the delivery and we will organize:

One size exchange in the US
One size exchange or refund elsewhere

We are happy to insure size exchange, because we really want you to be fully satisfied with your Origamo polo.
Please bear in mind anyway that returns have a real cost on our side, hence we would like to encourage you to use the size grid to try to pick your perfect size in the first place.
Thank you very much.
 


The proceeds of this campaign will be fully reinvested in Origamo's journey to change the Fashion industry for the better.
In practice it means that the funds gathered will be fully reinvested in the development of Origamo’s Organic and Fair Fashion concept.
Specifically, the campaign should help with the three following projects:
First, get Origamo certified under the Global Organic Textile Standard (GOTS) for trading operations and related products.

 
Then, add new colors to the Pacific Collection for the summer! We already have prototypes in Light Blue and Salmon, waiting for funding to be produced... and we would warmly welcome any color idea!

 
Finally, initiate the creation process for two new Organic and Fair designs:

Organic Pima Tee collection
Organic Cotton Sweatshirt Quarter-zip

 
And that’s it, we have a lot on the plate, but we have already started the change in the fashion industry, let’s keep up the good work.
Join us on this Journey to better Fashion, make Origamo your Organic and Fair clothing brand!


 

The polos proposed in the perks are produced and on their way to Origamo's warehouse in Cambridge MA.
Hence we believe that the main challenge at this stage is to be able to get the Polos delivered before Christmas outside of the USA.
We are confident that we will achieve this goal, since our founder has lived in three countries over the last ten years, he is used to shipping many things all over the place, and has many helpful relays in each country where the perks are delivered.
 

If you like this campaign please share it as much as you can!
If you like the concept Origamo Organic and Fair you can like our Facebook page
facebook.com/OrigamoApparel
If you like this campaign and like the concept Origamo... No problemo, share and like! 
You can send your feedback about the campaign, so that we can keep on improving.
Any other information about Origamo on our website: https://OrigamoApparel.com
THANK YOU VERY MUCH FOR ALL YOUR SUPPORT!
 
© 2016 Origamo

story:
Watch Trunk is your personally curated monthly watch subscription service designed to help you build a unique and stylish watch collection. Weather you are dressing up or dressing down, going out or playing sports or just passionate about watches like we are. Watch Trunk has all the styles to fit your life. Watch Trunk is the affordable way to build your beautiful and impressive watch collection.

Each month we will be delivering directly to your doorstep a personally curated Watch Trunk with the most beautiful, stylish and uniquely designed watches that will fit every aspect of your stylish life while offering our members a wide selection and choice.

Each Watch Trunk is personally curated just for you, offering you over 15 different watch styles and designs for you to choose from each month, assuring no surprises or disappointments.

We have watches for him and her as well as unisex designs that are for everyone.

For over a year now we here at Watch Trunk have been working with some of the most innovative and talented designers in the world of watchmaking to bring to you some of the most stylish and sought after designs.

We are also presently working with many up and coming boutique watch brands that have not yet hit the market and will be using Watch Trunk to debut their unique and innovative designs. As a Watch Trunk member you will be one of the very first to receive their watches before they are released to the public and some watches will be designed exclusively for Watch Trunk and can only be found thru your Watch Trunk membership.

For the past year we have been working directly with some of the worlds best watch manufactures so we are able to offer our members the highest quality watches possible without the retail markups that make watches so expansive today and we only work with watch manufactures who have the strictest quality control programs in place and only use the finest materials to fit our high standards. We are so confident about our designs and quality that we guaranty our watches with a two-year full replacement warranty.

We here at Watch Trunk know that you can cancel your Watch Trunk membership at any time. So each month we are committed to working hard to wow you with every Watch Trunk, Every Month. By providing excellent membership care, a personal trunk curator as well as a two-year full replacement warranty on all watches, we are confidant that your satisfaction is guaranteed.  To us you are not just a customer; you’re a valued member.

By being a member of Watch Trunk each trunk will have a minimum retail value of $80 providing Watch Trunk members with over $600 in savings throughout the life of your one-year membership.

Why are we here on INDIEGOGO? Its simple, Buying Power, the more members Watch Trunk has the more buying power we have to offer directly to you high quality fashionable watch with unique designs found nowhere else but thru Watch Trunk.

That is why your support for this campaign is so important and we want you to join and share in this very unique project.

story:
H2O Pack

Introducing the First EVER- Floating Paddle-Board “Everything Pack” specially designed and constructed BY SUP’rs FOR SUP’rs!!

The H2O SUP Pack started as labor of love by an avid Paddle-boarder.  When taking long “day trips” there was not a bag on the market to hold all of the gear needed for a day on the water.  Yes, there are waterproof sacks out there but not a bag that has compartments for different purposes.  That is where the idea turned into the design of a functional bag that is easy to access, has every compartment and pocket needed, and doesn't unbalance the Paddle-Board.  Oh- and it is SUPER COMFORTABLE when wearing it.

It took the testing of several hand sewn prototypes to finally get EXACTLY what was envisioned -an ultimate back pack with adequate storage for a day trip.  The pack contains a waterproof phone pouch, a cooler to keep snacks and drinks cold, an inner waterproof seam sealed bag that fits a wallet, towel, and change of clothes, front mesh pockets for quick grab essentials, bungee piping to attach the pack to the board when not wearing it- AND it’s still attractive and functional to be your “go-to” backpack for everyday use!

                                      

We didn’t skimp on the materials for the final version of this pack. We used ultra-strong, rip-stop fabric for the pack-proper, made the inner bag waterproof with seams heat sealed and impermeable, made the shoulder straps anatomically correct so that the pack’s actually comfortable AND we did it at a cost that the average mortal can afford.

                          

We intend for this to be our first product in an entire line of Liquid Athlete ™ products- focused on those of us who HAVE to live on the water.  This H20 Pack started as a labor of love, it’s still a labor of love- and if you love the water, you love the SUP, then you’re gonna love THIS up!!

H2O Pack- Love uSUP!

We took extra special care to create a bag from the best component materials perfect for a paddle boarding backpack including:

Separate, Waterproof, Durable Bag— Keeps all your gear dry, all day.

Front Panel  - zip-down center pocket, for easy access. Plus, two stretchy mesh pockets for easy access, that stretch to fit big and small items.

Interior — 100% Polyester with PU Coating

Inner Bag –It’s made from seam sealed PVC laminated fabric with a roll-down closure that is completely waterproof

 

Top Panel — Opens to an isolated cooler zone. You can keep food and cold drinks inside with three expandable bottle holders that fit any normal-sized bottles. Within the top panel you will find storage for a waterproof cell phone pouch and clip to attach it to the bag. There is also a clip to attach keys and a stretch mesh zip up storage zone. 

 

Back — 100% nylon mesh over perforated foam for comfort and to help the bag float

Waterproof Phone Pouch — All functions of the phone work in the pouch secure and waterproof

Expandable Main Compartment — Store more items by expanding the zipper of the H2O pack.

Contoured Shoulder Straps — Made from waffle foam at each contact point for extra comfort.

Added Comfort Chest Strap — adjusts to fit any size for all-day trips.

Added Comfort Waist Belt — adjusts to balance the weight for all-day trips.

Wondering why you should back us?

Producing a product that we’re confident will work for Paddle Boarders like you was not an easy feat. We’ve done all the leg work in prototyping, designing, redesigning and the most important part of all..testing. 

We’ve even pushed forward with a small scale production run to ensure that no unexpected issues occur as we kick off mass production of this invaluable pack.

            

Now we need your support to take that next step and drive this incredible product forward.

We need a small amount of startup funding to place our first big order with the manufacturer as we start to ship early next year. This has been a work of passion- the whole team has been working for free, and funding the early prototypes and test-manufacturing run.  Now we need help.

Our goal of $15,000 will give us enough capital to order from the manufacturer, ship them to our fulfillment center, and roll out a proper launch marketing campaign with some majorly talented product launch specialists.  More importantly- this will let us get them into YOUR HANDS as soon as possible!

Project Timeline

     

 

The Designer: Who Is Mindy Young?    

               

(and Liquid Athlete ™)

I am, above all, a StandUp Paddle-board enthusiast. But I also make a living by bringing cool products to life. From inspiration and dreams to the drawing board, to the prototype, and finally into the hands of real people around the world.

               

I’ve worked for years with household name brands (Nike, K-Swiss, Limited Express, and a few others). I started Paddle-Boarding as an escape from the pain I was feeling at losing my mom to cancer. The ocean was truly the only place where I felt like I could let it all go and just be embraced by the beautiful warm winds.  It let me feel closer to my mom, closer to myself, and connected to the life-energy that surrounds us.

I started Paddle-Boarding as an escape from the pain I was feeling at losing my mom to cancer. The Ocean was truly the only place where I felt like I could let it all go, cry if I wanted, and just be embraced by the beautiful warm winds.  It let me feel closer to my mom, closer to myself, and connected to the life-energy that surrounds us.

Like you, I find peace and freedom on the water. Paddle boarding has been my escape and my place of peace and it’s where I reclaim my center.  Today I don’t paddle to escape.  I paddle to embrace all that life is and can be.  And with my H2O pack- I’ve got everything I need! 

Risks and Challenges

We are a team of professionals committed to seeing this H20 Pack on every paddle-board in the world! We’ve got “day jobs” but this is our passion.  Liquid Athlete is going to rock the water world some day (we hope) and this is our first foray into Indiegogo. We’re confident that we will meet or exceed our product-backers expectations in regards to top quality, great design and ultimate functionality.

We plan to send regular updates to all our backers.

For some Indiegogo campaigns, there are challenges in manufacturing followed by shipping delays. This is not an issue with the H2O pack because all the units are earmarked for final manufacturing and shipping within the next 90 days! We’ve had professional experience getting products made and shipped on time before- so you’re not going to see any of the challenges that a lot of newbies would face!

Our #1 Goal is to deliver a GREAT design, the highest-quality product ever made for the Paddle-Board enthusiast – and one that exceeds ALL our Backers expectations. You’re going to love it.  We do. We’ve already seen and held a test run of finished, final, manufactured product in our hands.  We’ve tested them ON THE WATER- for weeks! You can be 100% confident in this H2O SUP Pack.  So- help fund our campaign and get a great product.

FAQ

Question 1.     Are the H2O Packs really waterproof?

Answer 1.     Yes >> You put any of your valuables and your phone in the waterproof compartments and be assured they’ll be safe and dry.

                    

Question 2.     How do you know my shipping address?

Answer 2.     After the campaign ends, we’ll email a one-time survey that will collect your shipping address. We will also ask for your email address for tracking.  We ship via[USPS/UPS/FedEx] and you will get a Tracking Number when your reward ships. International orders need to provide a Phone number for customs. Every other week we will email you an UPDATE that will tell you where the process is and when to expect your reward. Please READ the UPDATES. We don't have time to answer individual requests for updates. You can CHANGE YOUR SHIPPING ADDRESS anytime (up to 48 hours before it ships) by going to the project page and hovering over your chosen reward. Thanks for supporting!

                    

Question 3.     What are the dimensions of the bag?

Answer 3.    The length is 21". The width at the top is 13” and the bottom is 11”

Question 4.     What is the maximum load (weight) for the bag?

Answer 4.     10 lbs

story:
Introduction:

Hello and welcome to GTH! It is an abbreviation of Gr83r Th@n H@t3r5, or Greater Than Haters. We are a brand new designer brand. Every season we will launch brand new products, at limited stock. We have an early subscription plan at $25 a month. We will send you a brand new product every month or two until we launch in early june. Each pledger will have their name on the donor list. And if you donate more than $20, you will also receive one or more products. At the end of the 60 days we will put all the usernames of the pledgers on a shirt, and give one to each of them for free.

Mission Statement:

Our goal is to strive for greatness in the world of modern fashion. We will have all articles of clothing, mostly with hoodies and t-shirts. As we grow, we will add backpacks, shoes, hats, and much more! We will explore the wonders of fashion as we create clothing that has never been seen before. If you pledge money, you will be recognized and will receive merchandise for free.

The Idea:

This Idea was the brainchild of three remarkable people. This designer brand was created when we were watching a National Geographic documentary on Elephant Seals. Then we started whispering frantically to each other. This is a passion project that has dominated all three of our founders brains and we can’t stop coming up with ideas.

story:
From household or automobile accidents to acts of violence, the world presents a multitude of potential threats to your person.  Most clothes are not designed to protect you against the kinds of injuries that may result from a collision with a sharp object or an attack with a bladed weapon, but the new YOURLOOK Jacket is. The YOURLOOK Jacket is specially designed and manufactured using an Ultra High Molecular Weight Polyethylene that is cut and puncture resistant, making it ideal for wearers in high risk activities as well as those who fear bodily injury.

In addition to enhanced cut and slash resistance, YOURLOOK Jackets have an appealing micro fiber outer shell that is visually appealing as well as waterproof and wind resistant.  The inner lining is a polyester taffeta that is comfortable and retains body heat. Furthermore, the YOURLOOK Jacket looks and feels like other clothing, so you can wear it on a daily basis. The tough, durable materials are also machine washable, so there is no worry about maintaining it. This initial jacket comes in a variety of colors and sizes.

Summary

In Thailand and other countries around the world, Every houses have sharp weapons like knife, scissors and other things which can make harmful to yourself.

People always said "Take care of yourself". For how and which way to take care of yourself, please allow YOURLOOK to be a part of those way to actually enhance the physical safety in your daily life;

Our YOURLOOK jacket have useful properties as 

  • Cut & Slash resistant (Please see Testing result)
  • Waterproof & Wind protection
  • Soft Touch
  • Cushioning
  • Wash machine acceptance

YOURLOOK is a jacket made from special fiber fabric (Ultra High Molecular Weight Polyethylene), which is qualified by international standard test from Thailand Textile Institute. The fabric used has sufficient strength to resist high intensity of cuts and slits from sharp weapons. This could directly help preventing and alleviating physical injuries as well as life loss.

Prototype

    Now our process is on Prototype period already and we would like to let you know about our YOURLOOK jackets:

    • Testing by Thailand Textile Institute
    • 3 fabrics in jackets with less weight

    • Prototype jacket

    • Standard Size

    • 5 colors 

    Campaign Initiation

    • We have human resources whose expertise and proficiency.
    • We have sufficient quantity of raw materials.
    • We have a manufacturer whose capacity to produce YOURLOOK jackets and deliver them right to your place.
    • For our backers, even finally our campaign couldn't reach goal target but we are so pleasure for your funding which you give us. We still going on with our project and sending our jacket and souvenir on your pick perk to you on time. :)

     

    Other Ways You Can Also Receive

    • $199 ; For Early Bird, Get 1 Jacket (Black Classic) with Thai souvenir box (100 Sets).

     

    • $229; Get 1 Jacket with colors you could choose (Black Classic , Wood Brown or Peach Pink) with Thai souvenir box and key chain.

    We are the new generation of the coming up. We would like to change our society to be safety as much as possible and we ask ourselves WHAT WE COULD DO?

    We hope our product could change a little bit thing in this world. Just a little bit safety for your next generation.

    Youface168 Co.,Ltd is technology startup from Thailand. Our team was start each other job around 6-10 years. We work together as freelancers around 3 years and finally we decide to establish company in 2015 for support project from governments' department as "CATS" who is Thailand's communication departments.

    Yes, Our company is start-up and new for branding but we have knowledge and support team which have strong communication to develop team and any of our products.

    Please visite our website to know more about us : www.youface.me 

     

    Remember , YOUR SAFETY IS OUR PRIORITY :)
story_txt:
From household or automobile accidents to acts of violence, the world presents a multitude of potential threats to your person.  Most clothes are not designed to protect you against the kinds of injuries that may result from a collision with a sharp object or an attack with a bladed weapon, but the new YOURLOOK Jacket is. The YOURLOOK Jacket is specially designed and manufactured using an Ultra High Molecular Weight Polyethylene that is cut and puncture resistant, making it ideal for wearers in high risk activities as well as those who fear bodily injury.
In addition to enhanced cut and slash resistance, YOURLOOK Jackets have an appealing micro fiber outer shell that is visually appealing as well as waterproof and wind resistant.  The inner lining is a polyester taffeta that is comfortable and retains body heat. Furthermore, the YOURLOOK Jacket looks and feels like other clothing, so you can wear it on a daily basis. The tough, durable materials are also machine washable, so there is no worry about maintaining it. This initial jacket comes in a variety of colors and sizes.
Summary
In Thailand and other countries around the world, Every houses have sharp weapons like knife, scissors and other things which can make harmful to yourself.
People always said "Take care of yourself". For how and which way to take care of yourself, please allow YOURLOOK to be a part of those way to actually enhance the physical safety in your daily life;
Our YOURLOOK jacket have useful properties as 

Cut & Slash resistant (Please see Testing result)
Waterproof & Wind protection
Soft Touch
Cushioning
Wash machine acceptance


YOURLOOK is a jacket made from special fiber fabric (Ultra High Molecular Weight Polyethylene), which is qualified by international standard test from Thailand Textile Institute. The fabric used has sufficient strength to resist high intensity of cuts and slits from sharp weapons. This could directly help preventing and alleviating physical injuries as well as life loss.

Prototype

Now our process is on Prototype period already and we would like to let you know about our YOURLOOK jackets:

Testing by Thailand Textile Institute
3 fabrics in jackets with less weight



Prototype jacket

Standard Size

5 colors 

Campaign Initiation

We have human resources whose expertise and proficiency.
We have sufficient quantity of raw materials.
We have a manufacturer whose capacity to produce YOURLOOK jackets and deliver them right to your place.
For our backers, even finally our campaign couldn't reach goal target but we are so pleasure for your funding which you give us. We still going on with our project and sending our jacket and souvenir on your pick perk to you on time. :)

story:
3D Papillon

 

 

           

                          

Me and my girlfriend <3

 

Me and my sister :')

 

Who I am

Hi, I'm 22 years old, I'm from Melfi, a small town in the Basilicata region, Italy. I'm a Mechanical Engineering student at "Università degli Studi della Basilicata", a small athenaeum located in Potenza, near my town. I love technology, design and all the beautiful things, so I try every day to create something that everybody likes it.  My girlfriend support me in this project, and help me with the English language, (so if there is something wrong is her fault ahahah...)

What I need

I need to buy a professional 3D printer because now when bow tie leaves the 3d Printer, sanding is very difficult. And if I can not buy a new one, I will work very slowly to complete each shipment!

Why you must buy it?

All hard bow ties that until now I've seen marketed, are without the forms of real bow tie or they have them but are fragile because are made of ceramic material and these ones cost very much! In one of my country store cost 250,00 € each!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can not help me with fundraiser, you can still help me publicizing this project, I would be very grateful! Remind to use the Indiegogo share tools!

 

Thank you for your support!

Other Ways You Can Help
If you can not help me with fundraiser, you can still help me publicizing this project, I would be very grateful! Remind to use the Indiegogo share tools!
 
Thank you for your support!

story:
AS REVIEWED BY BestLeather.Org                                                 http://bestleather.org/j-ryan-co-legacy-horsehide-key-fob/

 

In a time of cheap and disposable products, we all yearn for those traditional keepsake pieces. Every item crafted at J.Ryan & Company, LLC is built to not only last a lifetime, but to be handed down through the generations. Using only the finest leathers and finishing, you will receive a piece that you will be proud to call your own.

There are good leather craftsman out there, many specializing in rustic pieces. At J. Ryan & Company, LLC we wanted to set ourselves apart, by offering timeless pieces that ring of true quality and are finished to a higher standard for the discerning individual.

After working for years, crafting fine custom holsters, I had many customers asking me if I could make bespoke leather items for them with the same attention to detail I provided in my holsters. Henceforth, this is how ideas are born. It seemed like a natural transition to add fine leather goods to my repertoire.

While I have seen many neat folding key fobs out there, they all seem to try to appeal to a modern tech look and hold as much as possible. I wanted to offer my clients a slim and stylish leather fob that is appealing to the eye and easy to carry. While modern and high-tech looking items have a place, nothing can replace the look and feel of fine leather.

We use thin and tough hard rolled Horween Horsehide that has been vegetable tanned.

From this......

To this

 

Thin and Classy!

                                                                   Custom made brass hardware and spring washers. They stay tight without the need to over tighten the screws. The spring washers keep even tension on your keys, so they don't flop around. I will also include a metal component that will allow you to attach your car remote to hang from the Legacy Fob.

Exotic hides like American Alligator(pictured), Shark and Horween Shell Cordovan are available to those wanting a more exotic leather piece. These hides are laminated to the stiffer Horsehide.

 

We are also offering combo perks that come with the Legacy Key Fob with the J. Ryan & Co. Mini-Billfold. This wallet measures 4.25" x 6.75" open and a nominal 4.25" x 3.375" closed. The credit card/license slots sit vertically, making for a slimmer wallet when folded. The cards stack on top of each other, without layers of leather between each card. Each side has a thin pigskin divider pocket for receipts and such. The deep cash pocket works great for different size currency's while abroad. All stitching is back-stitched to ensure durability. It can hold 8-12 cards and is made from Wickett & Craig Bridle leather and pigskin Liner(standard), Shark w/Kidskin Liner, Full Horween Shell Cordovan and American Alligator w/Pigskin Liner.

Shark

                                  American Alligator

Horween Shell Cordovan

 

                                                                                If we over-fund, we can offer 32G USB drives as an add on feature.

By funding my project, it will help me produce the Fob in higher volumes, yet maintain a level of quality that my clients have come to expect. While it is possible to one-off this item, it takes more time than it should for what I would consider a quality item at a reasonable price.

I know there are a lot of people out there who enjoy fine finished leather goods. Nothing is as nice as a refined piece of leather. I strive to produce items that are reminiscent of old English craftsmanship from a bygone era. I know in a time of rustic looking leather pieces or high-tech materials, there are customers yearning for something better.

What we will do with the funds raised.

I am asking for $5000 to invest in clicker dies, leather, hardware and packaging. If I reach my full goal, I would purchase another compact clicker press to expand my production capability.

Some unique perks offered can be Monogramming for early contributors of various levels offered.

Even if I don't reach my full goal, I would still produce the Fob in smaller quantities. I may have to forgo multi cavity clicker dies and keep production limited to custom quantities.

The Impact your contribution will make.

I know from my business that there are so many people out there like myself that want classy and quality leather goods. I see the key fob as one of these items. Refined yet simple. An extra touch of class that sets you apart by your taste. Every leather item I make in my shop has my passion poured into it. I look at a piece of leather as a canvas, imagining what amazing piece of artwork I can craft with it. This is something I want to be able to share with you.

While I have never ran a campaign before, I have a long history of providing my clients with not only quality leather, be it a Fob, Wallet, belt or even holster, I also provide SERVICE. This is something that really seems to be missing in commerce today. I truly appreciate every single client and treat them like  family, for that is what they are. I know without them, my business would not exist. I would like you, as a contributor to become part of that family.

Risks & Challenges

Probably one of the biggest challenges in leather work can be getting the quantities of raw material needed. I buy my Horsehide leather direct from the Horween Tannery, which is one of the oldest tanneries in the country. While it can take as long as 8-12 weeks to receive a batch of leather, I keep a steady order history of leather coming into the shop.

The other issue can be quality hardware. I am sourcing my custom screws and posts from a US based company with a long history manufacturing brass screw hardware. They tend to be a bit more expensive than other foreign based companies, but the fit and finish of their products is outstanding. I feel that it is best to buy quality upfront. 

On Exotic hide perks, I have put delivery dates out further to cover delays in getting hides delivered and based on complexity of working with those hides. Obviously I would deliver early if possible.

Please share this campaign and help me spread the word. I will appreciate it immensly.

story: Ultra-slim wallet made by a young team that makes products, which combine functionality with an attractive design. The Ziggie wallet features a coin pocket  and can hold up to 15 cards, as well as store your banknotes. You can either put it in your pocket or place it around your belt.  It is made from vegetable tanned leather or real leather in combination with webbing (strong and thin black fabric).

The Ziggie wallet features a coin pocket  and can hold up to 15 cards, as well as store your banknotes. You can either put it in your pocket or place it around your belt.  It is made from vegetable tanned leather or real leather in combination with webbing (strong and thin black fabric).

story: Nous sommes des étudiants au HEC (Hautes Études Commerciales) au Baccalauréat en Administration et nous élaborons un projet visant à offrir un service de nettoyage accessible aux 18 000 membres du HEC. Notre concept est simple et efficace ; vous venez déposer votre habit, et quelques jours plus tard, il se retrouve comme neuf! Un nettoyeur avec qui nous avons établi un partenariat viendra chercher les vêtements au HEC, et nous nous occuperons de toute la logistique. Notre service est conçu pour tous, incluant le personnel de notre école et les étudiants des cycles supérieurs. Nous avons la clientèle parfaite, soit une relève motivée à conquérir le monde des affaires où habits et complets sont de mise!

story:
Footwear Protections BOOTLOONs

My name is Debbie Flowers. I am a widowed mother of three with one still at home. I am a hard working and smart  woman. I've worked hard all my life. I had this idea for years and am just now putting my ideas on paper and took the first step to getting a 20 year patent. I hired a patent attorney firm which made promises, and they did just that, made promises. A year has passed and no further than just a lot of paperwork.

I have reached a point of needing help, after spending $5000 for the patent and being informed in 0ctober23rd of this year that I owed them a balance of $6500  and it needed to be paid in full before they could go any further. I can't  work enough hours at the job I have to earn enough to pay them off in the time allotted  and find I need help. So this is the reason I have enlisted Indiegogo's help in funding my project.

In my past I needed footwear protection like BootLoons to give some protections and found none available, except newspaper and wine bottles which provided an invitation to insects and varmints to set up housekeeping. So please help me get to market to give another solution to storing footwear in the closet between wearing them.

Footwear Fashions

Clothing fashions addresses a person’s personal statement of fashionable dress in appearance, which includes footwear. Quality brands to create your personalized style demand your upkeep attention. Footwear needs your personal care to get the most use from your investment. BootLoons are designed to give your footwear that protection.

For years the inventor of this technology (Deborah Flowers) has wanted to keep her footwear in good shape after cleaning and waxing for storage in her closet. … Until the next time for wearing. Usually they sagged and folded to show fold seams and with use , cracked…. BootLoons was invented to stop “storage wear”.

For years Deborah Flowers worked in a field that demanded a lot standing and walking.  Hard on your feet and legs but harder on your footwear. BootLoons is designed to give your footwear assistance while in your closet, but allow good looks and better wear the next time when worn.

BootLoons  is an inflatable devise that supports and holds your footwear in an up-right position and keeps them up-right so that they wont fold over or sag when in storage, see photo and drawings.  Check out the gallery section in campaign headings.

Your support through this campaign with funding will assist in funds spent towards final 20 year patent, proto-type molds used towards production of finished BootLoons.

BootLoons can also be used as display devises to properly display sandals and boots as it is tan in color, which will not take away from the footwear being displayed.

 

* Deborah Flowers: CEO  Inventor of BootLoons and will be responsible as Spokesperson.

* Wallace Johnson: CAO Father of Deborah, Margie, Carl and Dewayne and Advisor Coordinator of Business Operations.  Was owner and manager of two businesses from 1962 to 1997. Familiar with all the needs and filing of documents of start-ups and operations of business operations. 

  * Margie Johnson: CFO Worked in State Banks and Federal Banks for 35 years in all phases of bank operations.  Will be Financial Manager and Electronic Transaction’s Manager for Bootloons.

  * Dewayne Johnson: Worked as Shipping Manager and Shipping Coordinator for 2 Companies for a total of 12 years and will be responsible for shipping all BootLoons  products.

     * Josie Watson: Worked in marketing and corporate financial advisement and corporate account sales and will assist in Marketing and Marketing Financial.

What We Need & What You Get

Small donations earn you my love and affection. Larger dollar amounts help fund BootLoons and get a set of BootLoons after we go into productioin.

We need the funding through Indiegogo to take us to production

       *6500.00 to pay off the patent attorneys.

        *We have 5 team members with financial and decision experience but will have to rely upon community experience to guide us in packaging design, point of purchase designs, and to help qualify us and establish retail and internet store fronts.

          *A Marketing and Distribution specialist from the community to help spread the word about BootLoons. We want to keep the cost down to allow everyone  to benefit from the extended life BootLoons will give to footwear.

            *The unique perks will allow those to contribute to there favorite charity or person while not ready to support our campaign but will be on our email list to receive our campaign updates.

              *We will be using Flexible Funding as we intend on going into production

to provide the community with BootLoons to provide footwear longevity protection.

WHY INDIEGOGO

The Indiegogo community gives us the opportunity to gain valuable feedback to make our product better based on the advice and commentary from people like you than paid patent attorneys that take your money and promise access to production companies, which is just that, a promise. We think it's a smarter way to innovate and we'd like your help.

FIND THIS CAMPAIGN ON

Facebook                        Twitter                   You Tube              Website

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

If you love the BootLoons product, but aren't ready to back us yet, please help by spreading the word.

All donations will be paid to appropriate charities and you will be updated.

BootLoons is based in the US and we are focused on sustainabilty. Each BootLoon will be made in the USA of DOMESTIC, ORGANIC, CHEMICAL FREE  and CRUELTY FREE MATERIALS, eco-pure materials.

INDIEGOGO has share tools that you can use.

1962 to 1997. Familiar with all the needs and filing of documents of start-ups
and operations of business operations.  


 
* Margie Johnson: CFO
Worked in State Banks and Federal Banks for 35 years in all phases of bank
operations.  Will be Financial Manager
and Electronic Transaction’s Manager for Bootloons. 


  * Dewayne Johnson: Worked as Shipping
Manager and Shipping Coordinator for 2 Companies for a total of 12 years and
will be responsible for shipping all BootLoons 
products.
     * Josie Watson: Worked in marketing and corporate financial advisement and corporate account sales and will assist in Marketing and Marketing Financial.

  What We Need & What You Get Small donations earn you my love and affection. Larger dollar amounts help fund BootLoons and get a set of BootLoons after we go into productioin.
We need the funding through Indiegogo to take us to production
       *6500.00 to pay off the patent attorneys.
        *We have 5 team members with financial and decision experience but will have to rely upon community experience to guide us in packaging design, point of purchase designs, and to help qualify us and establish retail and internet store fronts.
          *A Marketing and Distribution specialist from the community to help spread the word about BootLoons. We want to keep the cost down to allow everyone  to benefit from the extended life BootLoons will give to footwear.
            *The unique perks will allow those to contribute to there favorite charity or person while not ready to support our campaign but will be on our email list to receive our campaign updates.
              *We will be using Flexible Funding as we intend on going into production
to provide the community with BootLoons to provide footwear longevity protection. 
  WHY INDIEGOGO
 The Indiegogo community gives us the opportunity to gain valuable feedback to make our product better based on the advice and commentary from people like you than paid patent attorneys that take your money and promise access to production companies, which is just that, a promise. We think it's a smarter way to innovate and we'd like your help.   FIND THIS CAMPAIGN ON
Facebook                        Twitter                   You Tube              Website
OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP
If you love the BootLoons product, but aren't ready to back us yet, please help by spreading the word.
All donations will be paid to appropriate charities and you will be updated.
BootLoons is based in the US and we are focused on sustainabilty. Each BootLoon will be made in the USA of DOMESTIC, ORGANIC, CHEMICAL FREE  and CRUELTY FREE MATERIALS, eco-pure materials. INDIEGOGO has share tools that you can use.

story:
Click here to see the English Version of the crowdfunding page



C'est l'ambition de rendre au football ses lettres de noblesse, d'apporter une nouvelle approche, de favoriser son apprentissage par les nouvelles générations et de leur donner un réel plaisir à le pratiquer (rien que ça!). Plus qu’un but c’est une philosophie, celle du plaisir simple de jouer et progresser ensemble. Bestfootball s'est ainsi construit autour du concept de gamification, l'alliance magique de l'apprentissage et du jeu. Pour plus d'infos, regarde la vidéo (juste au dessus), ou descends un peu plus en bas (si lecture tu préfères) !!


                                           


Oui! On a un super codeur (il aime être flatté) et le site Bestfootball existe déjà!

Voici le lien : Bestfootball

N'hésite pas à le visiter, à t'y inscrire et même à le partager !



Ça y est, déjà revenu? Comme t'as pu le voir le site fonctionne et propose déjà les principales fonctionnalités! 

Et c'est pas tout! On a aussi une application mobile!!


                                                 

Si tu as envie de profiter pleinement de Bestfootball, on te conseille fortement de la télécharger :

Je sens qu'il va y avoir des jaloux désormais... Oui, il s'agit uniquement de versions Android et iOS. Mais les autres on vous aime aussi et on ne vous laisse pas tomber! On travaille pour la développer pour vous tous :))

D'ailleurs puisqu'on parle de l'avancée du projet, regarde par toi même, on t'a concocté une petite vidéo :


A beaucoup de choses pardi!

Grâce à toi on pourra peut-être atteindre le montant fixé pour notre campagne de crowdfuning (20 000 euros) et ainsi :

1.  Finaliser l'application mobile versions Android/iOS :

·  Plus de langues

·  Ajout de fonctionnalités (découpage de la vidéo, fonctionnalité "Duel" intégrée...)

2.  Améliorer l'interface web (ergonomie, design, fluidité)

3.  Disposer des premiers packs de récompenses pour nos utilisateurs

4.  Démarrer le développement de l'application sur les autres principaux systèmes d'exploitation

Si tu t'es levé du bon pied ce matin, peut-être même qu'on dépassera notre cagnotte et là on pourra : 
  • Aller sur la lune! (arrête Jérémie, tu t'évades là!!)
  • non plus sérieusement, développer toutes les autres fonctionnalités que l'on espère mettre en place sur notre duo site/application
  • Rendre l'application totalement utilisable indépendamment du site web
  • Obtenir le nom de domaine Bestfootball.com
  • Travailler sur la communication/publicité afin de développer le concept à l'international.


Et puis, grâce à toi encore (décidément tu as un grand rôle aujourd'hui!), on aura un vrai aperçu de l'engouement que peut susciter notre projet et donc de son réel potentiel! 
Alors, si tu partages notre amour du football, notre envie de le transmettre, notre ambition de mettre le plaisir au coeur de sa pratique, et que tu as envie d'accompagner ce projet, n'hésite pas à nous aider !!

C'est vrai on ne vous a pas complètement expliqué. Allez c'est parti !
Les personnes ont deux leviers de motivations quand il s’agit d’apprendre : le sentiment de bien progresser, et la possibilité de montrer aux autres cette progression afin de se comparer.

Challenges
BestFootball satisfait le premier point en proposant de nombreux challenges footballistiques. Il y a par exemple des exercices techniques (tours du monde, jongles assis) ou encore des exercices de précision (viser la barre transversale). Pour chacun des challenges sont définis des paliers accordant des points. Par exemple, pour le challenge "tour du monde" il faut en faire 1 pour atteindre le premier palier, et 3 pour atteindre le second palier. Ce système de palier est aussi couplé à un système de grades (oulà ça devient compliqué, restez concentrés!!). En effet, en fonction du nombre de points obtenu sur l'ensemble des challenges, des grades (unknown player, rising star...) sont attribués au joueur.  Tout en s'amusant sur les divers challenges, les joueurs identifient ainsi leur niveau et ce qui leur reste à réussir pour atteindre le grade ultime : Legend!


 Duels et classements
Vous attendez notre réponse au deuxième point? Elle est ici :)
Premièrement, Bestfootball permet aux joueurs de se défier entre eux sur le challenge qu'ils veulent!  Voilà, place aux 1 vs 1! 
Ensuite, on a établi plusieurs classements pour que les joueurs puissent se situer quant à leur niveau! Les joueurs pourront se comparer ainsi à leurs amis, ou aux joueurs à l'autre bout de la terre.
J'espère cette partie t'a pas trop fatigué! Il te reste encore quelques lignes si tu veux découvrir les trois personnages derrière Bestfootball :)





A l’origine du projet, il y a trois entrepreneurs formant un des trios les plus prolifiques d’Europe. Après MSN ( Messi, Suarez, Neymar) BBC ( Benzema, Bale, Cristiano) il faudra compter sur JNJ ( Jérémie, Nassim, Joris). 

Nassim, numéro 10

Nassim EZZAKRAOUI, dans la vie c'est un actuaire. Vous connaissez sûrement pas ce métier et on s'en fiche. Car plus qu'analyser les risques, c'est chausser ses crampons et dribbler qu'il aime par dessous tout. Joueur au sport-études de Besançon, il fait le constat qu'il ne progresse pas autant que prévu en club (et oui on a pas toujours ce à quoi on s'attend Nassim!!), mais qu'il apprend au contraire énormément en jouant seul ou avec des amis dans la rue. En 2013, alors qu’il essaie d’être recruté par une université américaine, il prend aussi grandement conscience du manque de visibilité qu’ont les jeunes joueurs de football amateur : Bestfootball vient de naître. 

Atouts : Vision du jeu, accélération du jeu

Fonction : CEO

Jérémie, numéro 9

Jérémie Karege travaille en tant que Business Manager dans le cabinet de conseil Capgemini. C'est aux Etats-Unis qu'il rencontre Nassim et s'intéresse au projet.Sa passion : le foot. Il a pu jouer aux 4 coins du monde et, à défaut d’être un numéro 9 sur le terrain, Jérémie est avant tout un numéro 9 dans la vie! Et comme tout numéro 9 qui se respecte il n’a qu’une obsession, le but ! A travers son sang-froid qui le caractérise, Jérémie espère marquer ce qui serait son plus beau but : faire de Bestfootball une interface mondialement reconnue. 

Atouts : Placements, Intuition, Vitesse
Fonction : COO

Joris, numéro 3

Joris HART est étudiant en master d'ergonomie et ingénierie des activités sportives à l'université de Savoie. Ses grandes passions sont le parapente, le foot et... et la programmation web (Et oui entre un saut dans le vide et un match de foot, il a le temps de nous faire quelques lignes de codes)! Après une première tentative de start up dans le football (localisation et création de matchs entre amis), il crée sa plateforme de services (création de sites web pour particuliers). Séduit par le projet Bestfootball et la vision qui l'accompagne, Il s'associe à Jérémie et Nassim en Octobre 2015.
Atouts : Collectif, Précis, Travailleur
Fonction : CTO

Ok une bonne question! Alors on va y répondre avec le sérieux qu'elle exige :)

Ce projet est le fruit de notre observation du football, et de notre propre expérience dans ce milieu. On adore notre sport. C'est notre passion. On veut œuvrer à améliorer ce qui peut l'être.

Aujourd'hui, les résultats priment avant tout, même dans les catégories de jeunes. En club, les qualités physiques sont ainsi recherchées au détriment des qualités techniques afin de satisfaire l'objectif de résultats immédiats ; ayant pour effet de délaisser énormément de joueurs à fort potentiel mais dont le physique ne permet pas encore d'être assez efficaces. S'ajoute à ceci le conformisme des entraînements. Cela a pour effet de "brider" les jeunes joueurs, qui ressentent cette pression, et tentent donc moins de choses à l'entrainement. Les grandes stars telles que Zidane ont souvent confié elles-même avoir développé leur potentiel technique grâce aux heures de football avec leurs amis. C'est pendant ces heures que le joueur peut s'amuser, laisser libre cours à sa créativité, à la prise de risque et ainsi réellement progresser. Or aujourd'hui les jeunes jouent de moins en moins entre eux (la faute à fifa 16? peut-être ^^) et c'est pourquoi Bestfootball tente de ramener cet état d'esprit, cette envie d'apprendre et de progresser chez les jeunes joueurs.

De plus, les jeunes joueurs amateurs manquent de visibilité et n'ont pas toujours la possibilité de se faire remarquer. En effet, les recruteurs aussi bons soient-ils, ne peuvent pas couvrir tout le territoire facilement. Un très bon joueur peut ainsi louper son match lors de l'unique passage du recruteur... Bestfootball permet à chacun de montrer ce qu'il sait faire et donne la chance aux talents de faire parler d'eux et de se faire repérer.


Ok, parfait c'est ce qu'on espère pour tous ceux qui arrivent jusqu'ici! :)
N'oubliez pas, l'aide financière n'est pas la seule aide possible! Si vous pouvez parler de ce projet et de cette campagne autour de vous (vos amis, les outils de partage Indiegogo, réseaux sociaux ect...) on vous sera ultra reconnaissant! Rien de mieux qu'une bonne publicité par vous ! 
L'équipe Bestfootball vous remercie pour votre attention, et surtout vous tiendra au courant des avancées! à bientôt donc!!
Nassim, Jérémie et Joris 


Sauf l'équipe Bestfootball bien sûr! Regarde à droite de cette page, il y a une liste de cadeaux qui t'attendent! Des photos sont aussi mises juste en dessous:

story:
Welcome to Everlasting Wardrobe

Everlasting Wardrobe is a discovery commerce subscription, focused on children’s clothing. Save hours of your week while subsidizing the ever-growing expense of outfitting your rapidly growing children, in style! Subscribers receive 4+ outfits in each Wardrobe. Recipients have the option to buy any and all items within their wardrobe at a reduced price. Return the clothing you don't wish to keep, and your new wardrobe is on its way! Outfits are chosen by customers with the help of our team of stylists. Together, make use of our sizing algorithm to know exactly which brands fit your child best! All apparel is professionally dry-cleaned and/or laundered. We are currently outfitting toddler to preteen sizes.

Along with subscription, community members will have the option to Borrow formal and other niche items for shorter rental periods. Alas, an alternative to exorbitant prices for fancy and infrequently worn clothing.

Everlasting Wardrobe was founded on the mission to spread confidence and comfort through the gift of clothing. We hope to instill a sense of community and philanthropy in our younger generations. We are fortunate to work with social influencers, clothing brands, as well as our wonderful community of donating subscribers to Give Back, and provide our Refurbished Wardrobes to families all over the country, and eventually the world.


What We Need & What You Get

REWARDS

  • All backers will receive email alerts on progress, events, and social mission activations. Receive an invite to join our PWC (Parent Wardrobe Collective) where you will be the first to gain access to all of EW’s newest features and services.  

  • $40- Receive one (1) Wardrobe subscription box (4 outfits/box max covered) ALL BACKERS will receive FREE SHIPPING, throughout their time as a member!!

  • $75-Receive one (1) Premium Wardrobe subscription box (Never Worn; 4 outfits/box max covered)

  • $100-Receive three (3) Wardrobe subscription boxes; Regular Value: $120  

  • $215-Receive three Premium Wardrobe subscription boxes; Regular Value: $240

  • $899-Receive unlimited Wardrobe subscription boxes for one (1) child for (1) year; Regular Value: $1,249  

  • $1,799-Unlimited Premium Wardrobe subscription boxes for one (1) child for one (1) year; Regular Value: $2,249

  • $4,999- NEVER BUY CLOTHES AGAIN, Unless you want to…Unlimited Wardrobe subscription boxes from age 0-10 for any one child (NON TRANSFERABLE); Regular Value: Priceless


The Impact

Incredible Value: Our $40 Wardrobes and $80 Premium Wardrobes contain on average $400 worth of clothing.

Make Some Space: Borrow clothes that fit your child today; Give them back when they don’t. Stop buying for future seasons and sizes. Eliminate the clutter from your life!

Save Time, Stress, & Money: Add hours to your week and alleviate the stresses of shopping with and for kids. The perfect way to clothe your child!

Community: Help us get our younger generations excited about philanthropy and community with our Clothe the World initiative.


Risks & Challenges

An issue we may encounter is finding enough high-quality children’s clothing providers to participate in the rental subscription and one-off rental programs from inception. We will do our best to give your stylish children the variety they deserve. In the first few months there may be multiple items from one label, or products of similar style type within a Wardrobe. We will not fill your EW’s with products below our standards of style and quality.


The Everlasting Wardrobe team wants to make sure that the site is tested and functioning to the caliber necessary to process and fulfill the expected demand. Potentially, this could mean a 30-60 day lead-time between the campaign’s end and our first deliveries-out date. If demand is excessive, we will have to stagger shipments in order of geographic demand. Response depending, we plan to activate our formal one-off rentals 60-90 days after our subscription service goes live.


We will alert our community immediately with any news and/or updates. We believe customer service is paramount! Our motto: All concerns will be individually answered and alleviated. Please feel free to email us anytime: Edison@EverlastingWardrobe.com  to get any additional questions answered. We have created a fairly extensive FAQ section to help answer questions you might have.


Not a parent? No Worries

We at Everlasting Wardrobe appreciate any and all help! If you could take the time to share the campaign, we would be eternally thankful! Don't forget, Everlasting Wardrobe makes a great gift!

What We Need & What You Get

REWARDS

All backers will receive email alerts on progress, events, and social mission activations. Receive an invite to join our PWC (Parent Wardrobe Collective) where you will be the first to gain access to all of EW’s newest features and services.  
$40- Receive one (1) Wardrobe subscription box (4 outfits/box max covered) ALL BACKERS will receive FREE SHIPPING, throughout their time as a member!!
$75-Receive one (1) Premium Wardrobe subscription box (Never Worn; 4 outfits/box max covered)
$100-Receive three (3) Wardrobe subscription boxes; Regular Value: $120  
$215-Receive three Premium Wardrobe subscription boxes; Regular Value: $240
$899-Receive unlimited Wardrobe subscription boxes for one (1) child for (1) year; Regular Value: $1,249  
$1,799-Unlimited Premium Wardrobe subscription boxes for one (1) child for one (1) year; Regular Value: $2,249
$4,999- NEVER BUY CLOTHES AGAIN, Unless you want to…Unlimited Wardrobe subscription boxes from age 0-10 for any one child (NON TRANSFERABLE); Regular Value: Priceless


The Impact
Incredible Value: Our $40 Wardrobes and $80 Premium Wardrobes contain on average $400 worth of clothing.
Make Some Space: Borrow clothes that fit your child today; Give them back when they don’t. Stop buying for future seasons and sizes. Eliminate the clutter from your life!
Save Time, Stress, & Money: Add hours to your week and alleviate the stresses of shopping with and for kids. The perfect way to clothe your child!
Community: Help us get our younger generations excited about philanthropy and community with our Clothe the World initiative.

Risks & Challenges
An issue we may encounter is finding enough high-quality children’s clothing providers to participate in the rental subscription and one-off rental programs from inception. We will do our best to give your stylish children the variety they deserve. In the first few months there may be multiple items from one label, or products of similar style type within a Wardrobe. We will not fill your EW’s with products below our standards of style and quality.
The Everlasting Wardrobe team wants to make sure that the site is tested and functioning to the caliber necessary to process and fulfill the expected demand. Potentially, this could mean a 30-60 day lead-time between the campaign’s end and our first deliveries-out date. If demand is excessive, we will have to stagger shipments in order of geographic demand. Response depending, we plan to activate our formal one-off rentals 60-90 days after our subscription service goes live.
We will alert our community immediately with any news and/or updates. We believe customer service is paramount! Our motto: All concerns will be individually answered and alleviated. Please feel free to email us anytime: Edison@EverlastingWardrobe.com  to get any additional questions answered. We have created a fairly extensive FAQ section to help answer questions you might have.

Not a parent? No WorriesWe at Everlasting Wardrobe appreciate any and all help! If you could take the time to share the campaign, we would be eternally thankful! Don't forget, Everlasting Wardrobe makes a great gift!

story:
From being a child that made clothes for her dolls to being a young adult that that makes industry standard clothes for people. Please help me in funding my journey to Charleston as I take on Fashion Week as a competitor. 

“I like the idea that couture is an art form that people can wear.”

Lisa N. Hoang is a designer based in Raleigh, North Carolina. She has successfully competed in over 10 fashion shows, and all of her pieces and collections have been recognized by the press and received awards for their innovation. Just recently she was selected as the People’s Choice winner for FashionSpark.  In addition to the shows, she happily works with her clients to design custom garments for events. Word of mouth has helped her client base grow. When she is not involved in developing herself as a reputable brand, she is a student at North Carolina State University studying Fashion Textile Design.

 This season she was selected as one of 16 semifinalists to compete in the East Coast Emerging Designer competition that takes place within Charleston Fashion Week.  It is a platform for emerging designers that fosters the growth of local talent. 

The collection that will be presented on Friday, March 18,2016 is Nguyen Dynasty. The name of the collection pays homage to her mother, who was the first to teach her to sew. The collection is a fusion between the cultures of the East and the West, a reflection of her background. Materials such as denim and silk will be used alongside each other to create beautiful juxtapositions. Each look will be hand embellished.  “The garments are a showstopper, and the details are what keep you looking.”

See more of Lisa's work!

and follow her journey to Charleston:

Twitter

Instagram

Facebook


What the funds go to:
  • Travel expenses (hotel for 8 days and 7 nights in Charleston, SC)
  • Materials (fabric, zippers, pearls, filigrees, ribbon, grommets..etc)
  • Photography and videography
  • Support of an emerging designer and her dream of becoming established :)
In exchange for your contribution I will be giving you a variety of perks that range from thank you cards to custom made garments. A photoshoot with Lisa N. Hoang's preferred fashion photographer will also be offered. Get some editorial shots in your photo album that will have people wondering if they had seen you in Vogue.


The Impact

Your contributions will encourage and foster the talent of an emerging designer. It will give her the unforgettable experience of participating in her first fashion week. In addition to that, you will be providing her with the means to successfully compete in the competition. You will be able to say you contributed to the start of her career.


Risks & Challenges

This is a competition and winning is not guaranteed, but exposure is. Lisa is taking full advantage of this opportunity by opening up to the media and getting her brand recognized.

See the full details of the competition


Other Ways You Can Help

Thank you so much for taking the time to look at the campaign. Even if you are unable to make a monetary contribution please spread the word! You can also take the time to text in your vote to help me win the People's Choice Award on March 18,2016.

story:
Heels for a Happier World

I'm guilty.  You're guilty.  So many of us are guilty. Of buying shoes which we only end up wearing once or twice.  But ........ "shoe guilt" can now be a thing of the past.

My name is Shaherazad and I've worked in senior management roles for British retailers for the last 20 years.  Tired of aching feet due to poorly constructed heels I decided to invent a heel which would take me (and women just like you) from the boardroom to the bar with poise, grace and elegance.

100% of the operating profits (the money I make after costs) are invested in to my partnership with GlobalGiving UK who are based in London.  This means that women and girls living in poverty can gain an education thanks to women who are able to buy themselves my luxury heels.  That means when you support Shoes by Shaherazad you are not only rewarding yourself but you are also helping women around the world to find ways to lift themselves out of poverty.

I do not take a salary from the business.  I only take out costs to buy more shoes and market the products.  Your contribution will help me to develop my range further so that together we can help even more women and girls to go to school.

This is truly a shopping opportunity without any guilt.  You will love the product and you will love the good deeds you do as a result of buying in to Shoes by Shaherazad.  

Ditch the guilt and say "Hello" to your new heels which you will wear time and time again.  You only have to Google my brand to see how many brilliant independent reviews there are.

What We Need & What You Get

  • This is my first Indiegogo campaign and I'd love to raise £1000 to develop more designs
  • For backing the project, you can get 18 hour heels, jewellery and crystal clutch purses.
  • 50% of every supporter's pledge will go to educate a woman or girl in need (So, £500 to develop new designs and £500 to GlobalGiving UK when I hit my £1000 target).
  • Should the £1000 target not be met I will top up the gap in funds with a loan.

The Impact

  • These shoes will truly change how you feel about long days and wearing heels.
  • Imagine.  One shoe, many looks through the interchangeable shoellery straps.
  • And just look at the happy faces of women and girls who have benefitted from an education due to the profits.  Here's a photo from one of the schools which benefitted in Kenya.  You can read about the many other girls who have been helped around the world at http://www.shaherazad.com and at https://www.shaherazad.com/pages/heels-with-purpose

Risks & Challenges

All of my product is made in Britain to maintain luxurious standards.  This creates a high cost base but it's important to my brand to be manufactured ethically.  I need to maintain a strong rate of orders to continue British supply and am managing this challenge by raising funds across a number of channels.  Every backer helps.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • If you can't help fund us but like what we're doing please do help spread the word.  
  • We do not need miracles to change the world, we only need each other.

Thank you so much for your support.

Good Deed Hugs,

Shaherazad x

story:
SHORT SUMMARY

In 2009, we made the sacrifice to join our father's business to ensure its survival. For decades, our father has been sourcing and developing products for other people. We had the burning desire to innovate and create something of our own.

 

Interview filmed 7-15-15 by local Torrance show "Common Cents" featured on CitiCABLE. Host  Laura Fong

 

Since 2014 we've been gaining valuable customer feedback by demonstrating our product while educating the market and have been building a following on social media.

In April of 2015 awarded U.S. and China utility patent. We also have added protection and Worldwide patents pending.

Currently have one collegiate license with the University of California Berkeley.

 

LOCAL NEWS

Article published 1/31/15 by Jordan England-Nelson 

Daily Breeze FULL ARTICLE

 

CELEBRITIES LOVE RALLY FLIP CAPS

Daymond John | Founder & CEO of FUBU

 

Debby Ryan | Disney's JESSIE | Actress-Singer

 

Patrick Monahan | Singer-Songwriter of TRAIN

 

Aubrey Miller | Actress-Dancer-Singer | Young Flo, the Progressive Girl

 

Aubrey Miller - Actress-Dancer-Singer | Olivia Sanabia - Actress-Singer

 

Fidget360 Founders | Allan Maman | Cooper Weiss

 

Mark Dohner | Actor-Influencer-Youtuber

 

Jason Acuña | Professional Skateboarder-Stunt Performer-Jackass

 

DJ Diego - DJ/Producer | Dana White - President of UFC

 

2 Broke Girls Cast | Kat Dennings | Berth Behrs | Ed Quinn | Matthew Moy | Jonathan Kite | Garrett Morris

 

Billy Meistrell | CEO of Body Glove International

 

Aiden James | Singer-Songwriter 

WHAT WE NEED & WHAT YOU GET

Our goal is to raise $27,000. Your funding will be going towards:

  • Helping make Flip Caps available to various sports teams, Marvel and Disney licenses, and other brands and organizations.
  • Helping integrate our product into the headwear industry by licensing in or out our patents.
  • Setting up fulfillment and international distribution (currently pack and ship via USPS and drive packages to the local post office for orders received from RallyFlipCap.com).
  • Acquire more NCAA licenses to make flip caps available for other colleges.
  • Ordering fabrics and material components for production.
  • If we do not reach our goal the funds will be used to continue operations while setting up strategic partnerships.
  • We have five perks.

 

EMPOWERING PEOPLE TO EXPRESS THEMSELVES

  • We embrace being different because normal is boring.
  • Stand out from the crowd.

 

THE IMPACT

Ball caps have evolved beyond baseball and sports. They have spread to cultures and countries that aren’t even familiar with the game. Hats have always been a fashion statement. An open mind creates endless opportunities followed by fun experiences.

  • Expresses the person's sense of style and humor.
  • Transforms an average fan into a super fan.
  • Great ice breaker and conversation pieces. 
  • Creates fun and memorable experiences.
  • Enables a user to sport a dynamic look.
  • Promotes entertainment and buzz.
  • Versatile and easy to use. 
  • Has the wow factor.

 

WHO'S THE INVENTOR?

Inventor - Jordan Kay former Cal placekicker UC Berkeley 09' Alumni. 

Interview filmed 8-18-16  Host Ryan Gorcey of Scout.com

FULL ARTICLE - "Former Cal Kicker Scores With Invention."

 

CHEER ON YOUR TEAM WITH RALLY FLIP CAP

News Segment filmed 10-21-16  Host Martina Del Bonta of FOX 40 News

FULL ARTICLE - "Cheer on your team with rally flip cap."

 

RISKS & CHALLENGES

Our main struggles are manpower, distribution and financing.

  • Even with our background in manufacturing and product development we've hit many walls throughout research and development and we will continue to persevere.
  • We've covered the tooling costs and managed through production issues.
  • We plan on solving these challenges by integrating our product into various headwear companies who already have supply chain, retail distribution, and licensing in place.
  • We also plan on solving these challenges by building strategic partnerships throughout multiple industries.
  • Our main competitors includes New Era, 47 Brand, Mitchell & Ness, and Top of the World (TOW).

 

MEET THE BROTHERS CHANGING UP THE HAT GAME

Filmed 12-5-16 

 

ABOUT US

We ‘re all about working hard while still having fun. We're professional but don’t take ourselves too seriously. Our hats are the perfect embodiment of both. Feeling down? Wear it down. Feeling up? Have it up! The beauty is having the choice.

One of our all-time favorite movies is Happy Gilmore. Chubbs Peterson coached Happy and he always sang, “It’s all in the hips.” We like to say, “It’s all in the flips.”

Jordan Kay - Berkeley Alumni class of 2009. Placekicker for the California Golden Bears in 2007. Studied American Studies with an emphasis on International Business and work in the Global Economy. Key Roles - Inventor, Business Development, Product Manager, Quality Control, Sales, Trade Show/Events Coordinator, Customer Service, and Shipping.

Ian Kay - LMU Alumni class of 2012. Studied Studio Arts with an emphasis on Branding and Visual Communication. Key Roles - Content Creator, Visual Designer, Webmaster, Branding, Marketing, Sales, Customer Service, and Shipping.

 

 

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

Stay connected by following us as we continue to document our journey :

  • We'd appreciate you sharing our campaign on Social media @RallyFlipCap
  • Instagram
  • Facebook
  • Twitter

 

TIMELINE

October 11th 2017 - Elevator Pitch Episode 4 & INDIEGOGO campaign launch.

November 25th  2017 - Complete INDIEGOGO campaign.

December 1st 2017 - Place INDIEGOGO PERK flip cap orders to our factory.

December 2017 - Re-strategize business plan.

January 2018 - Explore new headwear partnerships.

February 2018 - Chinese New Year (all of China on Holiday).

December 2017 - March 2018 - You'll receive updates and photos to have the full experience involved with the manufacturing process.

 

FAQ

Warranty - We offer a 30 day warranty. The customer may return the hat within 30 days of the delivery date. The hat must not be worn, damaged, or washed. Please include your receipt upon shipping your returned item. If there is a defect please call our office in Torrance California (310) 326-9300 to report and we will provide you with customer service. 

Refund Returns Policy - You may return items that have manufacture defects within 30 days of delivery date for a full refund. The hat must not be damaged, worn, or washed. Please include your receipt upon shipping your returned item.

Send your Rally Flip Cap to: 23520 Telo Ave #7 Torrance, California 90505. You will be eligible for a repair or a replacement.

You should expect to receive your refund within 4 weeks of recieving your package to the return shipper, however, in many cases you will receive a refund more quickly. This time period includes the transit time for us to receive your return from the shipper (5 to 10 business days), the time it takes us to process your return once we receive it (3 to 5 business days), and the time it takes your bank to process our refund request (5 to 10 business days).

Have a Random Question - Fill out our contact form  or email info@rallyflipcap.com and we will be happy to answer it. No questions are stupid questions.

 

SHIPPING

We ship United States Postal Service inside the continental U.S.

  • USPS first class mail (2 to 5 days)
  • USPS priority mail (2 to 3 days)
  • We will email a tracking number

 

 

"Entrepreneur® Elevator Pitch" | Season 1 - Episode 4 | Rally Flip Cap®

story:
HELLO! My name is Nicole (also known as Friday) and I'm the owner of Magic Society, an independent clothing and accessories brand inspired by pop culture, surrealism, and childlike wonder! We create comfortable and colorful clothing for people of all sizes with a focus on bold and bright fashion. All of Magic Society's products are made with love, great attention to detail and, of course, magic! 

 Designing apparel has been a dream of mine since I was a teenager, but budget only allowed Magic Society to be a pin and patch company when I first started out. When print on demand became available, I jumped at the chance to expand into t-shirts and totes. Now the time has come for me to dive into the world of custom apparel starting with MAGIC SOCIETY SOCKS! 

MAGIC SOCIETY SOCKS are inspired by vintage roller rinks, arcades, and bowling alleys. Their bright and bold patterns are reminiscent of the iconic carpeting that's found at these places. These socks are sure to add an eye catching pop to any outfit! They're also super soft and durable, so you can wear them every day if you want. 

MAGIC SOCIETY SOCKS have been meticulously designed to be the most jaw-dropping, easy to care for, feel-good socks in the universe! They're also unisex so everyone can wear them!

Getting a clothing brand off the ground can be an expensive endeavor that requires upfront costs to manufacture with high minimum quantity requirements. I want the world to be able to wear these socks, but in order to do that without waiting forever for me to save up my pennies, I've decided to bring these socks to Kickstarter! 

I'm here to bring these amazing socks to you directly! Reaching this campaign's goal means these socks can exist, so please share it with your sock loving friends!

 

MAGIC SOCIETY SOCKS 

Pick from your choice of five different jaw dropping patterns! Collect them all!

ALIEN PIN

The perfect addition to any jacket or collar! 

WIENER MUG

Honestly, the only mug you'll ever need.


 

KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE MAGIC SOCIETY TEE 

A beautiful, limited edition tee available only on Kickstarter!

Risks & Challenges

I've put a lot of time into make sure that the production and delivery of this jumpsuit will go smoothly. As with anything, things can go wrong. There could be delays with shipping times or packages could go missing. I am coming into this campaign with positivity and preparation, so my hope is that once the campaign is successful your jumpsuit will arrive on time and make you smile from ear to ear every time you wear it.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Share this campaign with your nostalgia-loving friends through Indiegogo's share tools!
  • Share this campaign on your Instagram and Twitter!
