story:
Story

We are PITOT Watches, developing watches inspired by fighter jets.

I'm Thomas, a former RDAF aircraft mechanic, served on F-16 and S-61 rescue helicopters. Later I worked in SAS and Monarch(UK) on Airbus, Boeing, and Gulfstream.

We have run 5 crowdfunding campaigns before to fund the development and production of our first 300 pieces of the F-14 Tomcat inspired watches, and based on these results we managed to attract an investor to help us grow our company and now we can move forward to focus on a new model inspired by the F/A-18 Hornet fighter jet.

 

DANISH DESIGN - MADE IN GERMANY

 

PITOT watches introducing fighter jet-inspired watch

This campaign will help with the production of the prototype of the F/A-18 Hornet inspired watch with swiss mechanical or quartz movement and made in Titanium aircraft quality with a titanium bracelet/black leather strap or titanium bracelet/blue rubber strap for the blue carbon dial.

Our watches are designed in Denmark by a former aircraft mechanic from the Royal Danish Air Force with the help of a swiss watch designer and assembled in Germany.

We work together with a pilot in the US who test-fly our prototype watches in an F5 Tiger jet. We will show cockpit videos later when we have the prototype ready.

With your help, we can grow our company and help us make good quality watches inspired by fighter jets and made for the people who loves fighter jets as we do.

We offer a 50% discount on the expected retail price because we are in the early concept stage, and with your help, we can start the prototype production and also offer you a great deal.

Only 10 of each model with 50% on this early stage


PW18 with black carbon fiber dial


Manual wind with the Swiss Sellita SW510 M movement

Inspired by the Hornet and the US Navy demo team Blue Angels, we made a blue carbon fiber dial version with yellow buttons.

Blue Angels Gallery
 

 

Limited to 918 pieces of each model

 

Inspiration

The inspiration for our new aviator watch comes from one of my favorites, the F/A-18 Hornet which first flight was in 1978. It is in service in 8 countries nowadays and the picture below shows a Canadian version called the CF-18. The F/A-18 Hornet is built for navy carrierships and operate as such in the US Navy, other countries like Finland, Spain, and Schweiz use them in the Air Force. The hook and the towbar are disabled via the circuit breakers when not operation on carrier ships.

This watch design is inspired by key features from the F/A-18 Hornet as shown below.


Here shown a Canadian CF-18 Hornet.

  • Subdials shape inspired by the oval air intakes on the F/A-18 Hornet.
  • Hour/Min hand inspired by the front wings close to the cockpit
  • The second hand inspired by the pattern on the ejection seat handle.
  • Carbon fiber dial because F/A-18 Hornet was the first fighter-jet to have carbon-fiber wings.
  • Black/Yellow colors on dial inspired from the cockpit buttons and instruments.
  • Watch case inspired by the round shape in general of the airplane.

 

  • Titanium case and bracelet, because titanium is strong and lightweight and used for airplane manufacturing. The pattern on the bracelet with a 20-degree angle on the links like the tail fins outward angle.

 

  • Crown inspired by the engine compressor blades and spinner cone.

 

 

Movement

We are offering both a high-end Swiss mechanical movement with manual winding and also a Swiss Ronda Quartz model. With these 2 solutions, everybody can get hold of this unique fighter jet-inspired design and enjoy the benefit of swiss movements.

Swiss Sellita SW 510 M BH a (manual winding)

Bracelet

We offer a titanium 22 mm bracelet with pattern references from the tail fins with a 20-degree angle to each side. If you prefer a nice black leather strap for the black dial or blue rubber for the blue dial, we can offer that instead.

Finish

Watchcase and bracelet come with a fine brush with polished edges.

Dimensions

Width: 43 mm
Height: 13.5 mm
Bracelet: 22 mm
ATM: 10

Rear case:

The manual wind with the Sellita SW510 M comes with a see-through case.

The Quartz battery comes with a closed case, we will come up with a nice engraving that is inspired by the fighter jet.

 

Materials

Both the case and the bracelet are made in Titanium. We want to use the EcoTitanium material from the French factory that recycles titanium from leftovers from airplane production, if that is not possible we use the titanium grade 5 airplane quality.


picture credit to EcoTitanium factory

What We Need & What You Get

We need funding for prototype production and offer a good discount compared to the expected retail price.

You get a low price on the F/A-18 Hornet inspired watch made in a titanium case with a titanium bracelet or black leather strap.

The watch comes with a Swiss Sellita SW510 M manual wind movement or a Swiss Ronda Quartz and is assembled in a German factory with high-quality control to reflect the high quality of the fighter jets.

We run this campaign as flexible funding and use all the funding raised for the prototype and development of the watch.

Later in 2021 when the prototype is ready, we gonna run a big crowdfunding campaign on Kickstarter together with an agency to fund the production.

 

Design and research

The F/A-18 Hornet replaced the F-14 Tomcat in the US Navy and later sold to the airforce and Navy in other countries and are flying in the US, Finland, Spain, Australia, Kuwait, Malaysia, Schweiz, and Canada as CF-18 Hornet. 

The F/A-18 Super Hornet, with the square air intakes, is slowly taking over for the F/A-18 Hornet, and the fighter jet used in the new Top Gun: Maverick, has been repainted and are now the first F/A-18 Super Hornet flying in the Blue Angels demo team.

We have based our watch design with inspiration from the F/A-18 Hornet with the round air intakes.


Tail fins are angled around 20 degrees outwards to each side - we use this key reference in the pattern on the titanium bracelet.


The oval air intakes are very significant on the F/A-18 Hornet and have inspired us in the making of the subdials shape.
 


The cockpit inspired us to use the black and yellow colors on the dial and the second-hand pattern is a direct reference to the ejection seat handle.

 

F/A-18 Hornet was the first fighter jet with carbon-fiber wings and one of its key features that inspired us to do a carbon fiber dial.

 


After long research and a lot of sketching, we move into 2D using photoshop and when 2D is approved, we start the 3D modeling in Solidworks. 

 


I always start with research and then move on to sketches with pen and paper before the  2D and 3D software. I use Solidworks 2020 and because we are a startup business, it's free for one year. This is a big help! After the 3D drawing, it's time for some 3D printing to get feedback on shape and function before prototype.

 

Timeline

 

Previous campaign


We have used Indiegogo and Kickstarter before to fund the prototypes and production of the F-14 Tomcat inspired watches.


https://anchor.fm/takingthetime

 


http://pitotwatches.com

 

http://instagram.com/pitotwatches

Team

Risks & Challenges

I started the company in 2018 and worked on this project to deliver fighter jet-inspired watches for over two years next to my main job as a product developer and 3D designer until I quit my job and went full-time. The third-year without salary and  I used all my savings and retirement funds because I believe so much in this project and the company.

My hard work paid off and we managed to get an investor on board in year three to help us grow the company and I could finally start getting a small paycheck for my work while building up a new danish watch brand.

Our first F-14 watch is now in production and will be in stock Jan 2021 for the first 300 timepieces, after assembly in Germany and shipped to Denmark.

Because we have to order 300 watches as a minimum every time, your help is appreciated and would speed up the production time. We expect to run a big Kickstarter campaign in 2021 to start the production as we did with the F-14 inspired watches.

This campaign is based on a concept and small changes can occur.

story:
There is something special about owning something that most people don't have. Everyone is unique in their own way. We are all individuals. There are parts of us that separate us from others, so why should we wear what everyone else is wearing? The great thing about our style is that it is ours; it impacts us and influences those around us.

What do you want to say when people look at you?

 

What is needed

So far everything has been self-funded and the production stage is almost complete. However, I still need help to push this into full-term so we can launch.

The areas of marketing and administration need to be taken further. Help is needed to raise funds for important aspects of our business such as packaging, labels, registration fees and funds towards starting the next collection.

 

Thank you so much!

Thank you so much!

story:
LEA

About Us

We are an artist, ecologist, and textile designer. Our collaboration is inspired by our wide-ranging work in biodiversity, sustainability, historical museum specimens, photography, fashion, and life-long learning. Our first successful collaboration – hand towels featuring insect collections – was to benefit St. Jude. Please support our campaign to help us expand LEA into a full-fledged woman-owned business. 

LEA’s Mission Statement

We transform nature’s fragile specimens into cloth-based modern wearable art for everyday living. We are committed to using materials that are natural, locally-produced, and carbon-neutral, and to supporting other women-owned businesses.

The Line

The first set of dresses and perks highlight the recent loss of select plant lineages in Thoreau’s Woods. Henry David Thoreau documented the abundant diversity of plants in New England in the 1800s. Scientists have recently revealed through resampling, that some of his plant lineages are now in decline as a result of human influence. The perks for our campaign—pillow covers, hand towels, and masks – feature cyanotype inspired herbarium specimens gleaned from Thoreau’s plant lineages. LEA's entire line is produced and sewn by women.

Our Goal 

Our goal is to launch our line of dresses in 2021. This campaign will provide seed funding for LEA.

Give and Get

In 2019, we began the initial dress design process featuring Thoreau’s specimens. Then, in early 2020 the pandemic hit, and like the rest of the country, we hit pause. At that point, we decided to respond to the moment: face masks to promote safety, and pillow covers and hand towels to enhance the spaces we were all spending so much time in. We designed these items in the same spirit as the dresses we envisioned; the process, however, required minimal in-person contact among the three of us.

You can support our campaign by purchasing the perks on this site or by simply making a donation. They are additionally available in custom bundles at various levels of giving. At the highest levels, we also include the opportunity to acquire art by Leah Sobsey. 

Process

All fabrics used in our products are printed digitally using non-toxic water-based reactive dyes that are approved by the Global Organic Textile Standard (GOTS). This allows us to only print what we need for orders and eliminates fabric waste. The prints have amazing longevity and wash fastness.

Product Materials 

Mask: Front is Made in the USA 100% cotton twill; back is Made in the USA 100% organic cotton percale; elastic is made locally in NC and is latex-free.

Pillow: Made in the USA, 100% cotton twill

Towels: 100% locally-sourced Belgian linen (Libeco), a certified carbon neutral company

A Commitment to Conservation

We will donate 10% of all proceeds in perpetuity to an organization facilitating on-the-ground species conservation. Our initial clothing sales will allow us to donate to the Native Plant Trust, whose mission is to conserve native plants.

Who We Are

Leah Sobsey

For more than a decade, I’ve been making work that invites dialogue between art and science as a way to understand climate change and species loss over time. My tools are 19th-century photographic processes combined with digital technology – media that represent technological change over time. Collections, my first monograph featuring this work, was released in 2016. I was also part of the documentary team that produced Daylight Books’ best-selling Bull City Summer. My work is exhibited internationally in galleries, public spaces, and museums, and has also appeared in New Yorker.com, the Paris Review Daily, Slate.com, and Audubon.org. I am an Assistant Professor of Photography at the University of North Carolina, Greensboro. 

Emily Meineke, Ph.D.

My work is anchored in understanding how human influence has affected plants and insects. I use experiments and historical specimens to study how plant-insect interactions have changed over the past 200 years. I was an EPA STAR Fellow at North Carolina State University, a National Science Foundation Postdoctoral Fellow at the Harvard University Herbaria, and am now Assistant Professor of Urban Landscape Entomology at UC Davis.

Anne Schroth

I own and operate Red Canary, a digital fabric print studio in downtown Greensboro, NC. Since earning my bachelor’s degree from the College of Design at North Carolina State University, I’ve been digitally printing fabric since 1999, working with artists and designers all over the world. 

*Note: Portions of this video were filmed before the pandemic and, as a result, display people unmasked in close proximity.

*Shipping

Please place your order before Dec 11th in order to receive merchandise by December 24th. All orders placed after December 11th will ship in January 2021.

I own and operate Red Canary, a digital fabric print studio in downtown Greensboro, NC. Since earning my bachelor’s degree from the College of Design at North Carolina State University, I’ve been digitally printing fabric since 1999, working with artists and designers all over the world. 

*Note: Portions of this video were filmed before the pandemic and, as a result, display people unmasked in close proximity.
*Shipping
Please place your order before Dec 11th in order to receive merchandise by December 24th. All orders placed after December 11th will ship in January 2021.

story:
(ENG)

According to historical records, soda beverages were first introduced to China in the late Qing Dynasty period by Dutch traders. For that reason, Hong Kong locals still sometimes refer to soda beverages as “Dutch soda-water”.

During Hong Kong’s colonial period, the British Hong Kong government awarded the Medal of Honour to civil servants for their contributions to public service. People dubbed those Medals of Honour as “Dutch soda caps”, because they looked just like the flattened bottle caps of Dutch soda.

At times of poverty in early Hong Kong, children collected Dutch soda bottle caps from the street and used them as toys such as lapel pins and pulling-whistles.

Seen from above, a “Dutch soda cap” resembles a yellow umbrella, a symbol of the Hong Kong democratic movement. Hence, “Dutch soda cap” connects the intuition, creativity and resourcefulness, as well as virtues such as courage, solidarity and justice that civil servants were once recognised for, with the spirit of Dutch traders who were not afraid to explore uncharted waters – a state of mind with which many Hongkongers can currently identify.

Wearing a “Dutch soda cap” therefore expresses pride and an intention to make the best of a difficult situation. It also serves to remind civil servants of the virtues they once prided themselves on.

Made in the Netherlands, designed for Hong Kong.

 

----

(繁中)

根據歷史記載，汽水飲料早於清末民初時期由荷蘭商人引入中國，因此人們便稱其為「荷蘭水」。時以至今，本地香港人有時候仍會將汽水稱為「荷蘭水」。

香港於英國殖民地時期，港英政府將榮譽勳章頒授予表現傑出的公務員，以表揚其對社會及公共服務的貢獻。由於勳章型狀與被壓扁的汽水瓶蓋頗為相似，人們便戲稱這些勳章為「荷蘭水蓋」。

香港開埠初期資源較為貧乏，當時孩童們會在街上收集「荷蘭水蓋」並將其制作成襟章及拉哨等玩具。

從上方看「荷蘭水蓋」有些像把己開的黃色雨傘 – 香港自由及民主運動的象徵。因此「荷蘭水蓋」將直覺、創意、機智與勇氣、團結、正義等公認的美德連繫在一起。亦與於大航海時代的荷蘭航海商員勇敢地探索未知水域所堅持的意志如出一轍。相信這是香港人目前可想像到的共鳴。

配戴「荷蘭水蓋」襟章藉此表揚和勉勵人們在困難時候發揮其最大的勇氣並以表自豪。同時希望憶起上述那些曾令公務員引以為榮的美德。

荷蘭水蓋​物料及手工全荷蘭製造，專誠為香港而設計。

 

 

 

 

(ENG)

90% of net profit will be used for charitable purposes​. We wish to support the ongoing democratic movement in Hong Kong and aim to provide Hongkongers in need (such as protesters, activists etc.) with financial and other kinds of means. That includes the financing of or direct supply of goods, promotional materials and marketing campaigns or the making of donations to local charities or non-profit organization which share our belief of the core values of Hongkongers.

Thank you very much.

Yours sincerely,

 

Dutch Soda Cap - The Team

 

----

(繁中)

90%純利將作慈善及公益用途。我們十分支持及關注於香港持續進行的自由及民主運動，並希望能夠提供各種支援及幫助給有需要的香港人（抗爭者或民主維權人士等）。資助方式例如物資/商品供應及津貼，宣傳項目製作及或簡作捐贈於同樣地擁護香港人核心價值的義務或非牟利/慈善團體組織。 

衷心感謝各位支持。

致此，

 

Dutch Soda Cap - The Team

 

----

Follow, like & share us on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn @DutchSodaCap

story:
20190722 UPDATE! NEW COLOR OPTION! THE ALL-ROUND AVENTURINE 

We are really excited to announce that we have a new color option for ALL-ROUND.

We knew that AVENTURINE with its shimmering gold particles is an eye-catching material and is used to create a high-end appearance for a watch dial. We then select to provide the blue AVENTURINE dial for all the backers to choose from.

 

A GROUP OF WATCH ENTHUSIASTS

Hello! We are the BEHRENS ORIGINAL - a group of watch enthusiasts gathers and create a brand that is based in Hong Kong. We specialized in watchmaking and watch modification, in which we take pride in what we do. Our founder, B.Q.Jack, has more than 15 years in watchmaking - which we genuinely called him a watch factory master. With a group of designers and engineers works perfectly, we keep designing and developing watches every day! 

 

WHAT IS NEW THIS TIME?

With the splendid success of THE MOONPHASE campaign on Kickstarter, knowing the fact that we were funded in 6 hours, we want to explore more possibilities in our watches for all actual watch lovers to adore. 

To make our watches stand-out, we aim at thinking and acting differently from THE MOONPHASE. We have set our new goal for our third product: COMPLEXNESS.  And so, we are proud to release our new BEHRENS ORIGINAL watch: “THE ALL-ROUND”. 

The rule “all-or-nothing” in watches is obeyed by watch lovers. It could be anyone of you that adore the minimalistic watch -- THE MOONPHASE or THE REIN; but perhaps some of you may want to have something more complex in your watches. Imagine you have a watch allows you to handle every situation like a boss, how awesome would that be? “THE ALL-ROUND” can just turn imagination into reality. A price-friendly, excellently designed with a german style, and equipped with the best multi-functions watch -- that is “THE ALL-ROUND”. 

We want our watches to be well-made and high-end. Our quality has been acknowledged and proven by 200+ backers and customers all over the world. We are being discussed on many forums and groups organised by watch lovers. You may check out for more comments about our watches’ quality craftsmanship and their design in the link below: 

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/behrenswatches/moon-phase-automatic-mechanical-watch-by-behrens-o/comments

 

A TASTE OF HIGH-END WATCH

When making a high-end watch, we obey the following rules which we think is most important for watchmaking.

 

SLIM WATCH - 8.5MM MULTIFUNCTIONAL MECHANICAL WATCH

Mechanical watches with multifunction are always adored by watch lovers. However, unlike quartz watches, they are always very heavy and bulky on wrists. And we understand that the size of these amazing mechanical watches can be inconvenient for daily wear.  

In order to have a nice mechanical watch but with a thin design, we provide the best we can: With the well-designed cutting of the case and the super-high quality dome shape sapphire, our watch provides an incredible slim appearance. The thickness of the watch is only 8.5mm exclusive the dome shape sapphire. With the done shape sapphire the total height will be 13.4mm. 

Every part of our design is uniquely made for reaching our goal: a thin mechanical watch. We have gone under many tests on making a thin, durable watch. Our design team remade the dial part more than five times to remove 10-30C each time. There are no words can fully describe the hardship we had in the process,but we have put our efforts wholeheartedly in making this price-friendly, slim, well-functioned, mechanical watch.

'

 

MULTIFUNCTIONAL - 8 INDICATORS

THE ALL-ROUND is multifunctional and is full of "indicators" on the dial. You can get all the information you need daily at a glance-- Mastering everything like a boss.

  • With the Month, Week, and Date indicator, you will never miss a day of your life.
  • With the power reserve indicator placed at the top, you can always keep your watch fully powered.
  • With 24-hour indicator at the bottom (the metallic hemisphere world map), you can set the date in the most convenient way without messing up A.M. and P.M..
  • The hour, minute, and second hand are clearly shown on the dial, you may check your time in your most familiar way.

We try to avoid useless decoration in our design: Like putting a 24-hour hand over a 24-hour disc; this is meaningless. We make sure everything you need is on the dial, and solely on that.

 

 

SAPPHIRE CRYSTAL ONLY - 4.8MM THICK

For producing luxurious watches, we persist to use only sapphire crystal for both sides of the watches. Due to the remarkable hardness of sapphires - 9 on the mohs scale, our watches can hardly be damaged by plain scratches. Thus, we believe that sapphire crystal is the most suitable material for a daily wear.

Dome shaped sapphire crystal is used to give an ultimately slim appearance to the watch. As sapphire is a hard material (A 6mm thick raw sapphire material is used to craft into a 4.8mm dome shaped crystal), it is beyond difficult to make the dome shaped sapphire. Since it is costly and time consuming (our machine can only produce 3 pieces of dome shaped sapphire crystal max. per day), the yield rate is low.

 

OUR MOVEMENT - MIYOTA 9100

Movement is the soul of all watches and that is exactly what attracts all watch collectors. Our factory has more than 10 years of experience in Swiss and Japan movement watchmaking and watch modification. 

This time we selected the Miyota 9100 for our movement, which is well-known for its reliability and stability. This Japan movement functions with a frequency of 4Hz (28,800 A/h), 26 jewels, 40-hour power reserve, automatic winding, and a sweep second movement. With a movement of height 5.52mm and 30mm overall diameter, it is super slim. Combining both thin body and functionality, this movement is only used in high-class watches. Although the price of this movement is very high, we persist to provide the best we can.

 

ACCURACY - 7 DAYS, T0, T24 TESTS

Watch modification and movement tuning are our central focus. As such, absolute accuracy is always on our important checklist. We ensure the quality of every part by using strict control testing standards before assembling the watches.

The testing procedure lasts 7 days

Day 1 Before assembling the watches, the movement is fully wound (also known as T0) mechanically. The movement is tested in five positions, crown left, crown up, crown down, dial-up and dial down. Then given a rest period of 24 hours(also known as T24) , the movement is tested again in the five positions.

Day 3 After assembling all the parts together, the watch is put into an auto-winding machine for 1 day. The watch would be fully wound and be tested with the same testing procedure in Day 1.

Day 5 The watch keeps putting into an auto-winding machine. The watch would be fully wound and be tested with the same testing procedure on Day 1.

Day 7 Before packing, the watch is fully wound(T0) and is tested in five positions again.

All our watches have to pass all of the above procedures before delivery. We make sure that the accuracy of our watches is highly maintained in -20~+20 seconds/day. We tested the watches in more positions than the normal quality checkups do - we tested the watches in 5 positions while the others tested in 3 positions only.

 

ITALIAN CALF LEATHER STRAP -  INTERCHANGEABLE CATCH

We are all perfectionists, we see the pairing of the best leather strap and BEHRENS watches is an obligation. We provide a high quality fine crafted Italian calf leather strap to give you the most comfortable and pleasant wearing experience. The strap with an interchangeable catch on the lugs side allows you to change your strap without any special tool.

For this project we have selected a manufacturer for producing higher grade straps. Our blue will be a more vivid blue than ever; as well as the durability of our straps. Although the cost has increased by 55%, we hope to bring the best onto your wrist. 

- Environmentally friendly mineral tanning according to the "Blauer Engel" guidelines. 

 

MULTI-POLISHING CASE

Case design is one of the significant symbols of our watches which is also widely loved by 150+ BEHRENS ORIGINAL customers. Our dedication for watch making is clear: The case is made of 316L stainless steel which is widely used in high-end watches. We applied many different production processes to make a remarkable watch case. Multi-polishing methods are applied: including mirror polished on the bezel and the edges of the lugs, horizontal brushed on the sides, vertical brushed on the lugs and circular brush on the back. Although these production methods are long and costly, we aim to give you the best looking, durable, and elegant watch cases. Besides, the four lugs of the case are separately produced; the angle of the watch will be sharp and absolute. Such costly production method could only be found in luxury watches production.

 

DIAMOND CUTTING REFLECTIVE INDEX

We innovated a new method of index making - the Diamond Cutting Index. It is also used in THE MOONPHASE model(our previous Kickstarter project). The index is cut by a diamond cutter 20 times in two directions; thus the surface of the index is a complex obliques. To give the dial a luxurious touch, light is our major resource. With light reflects on the index’s glossy surface from different angles, a rainbow(chrome) color is created. We believe such natural phenomenon will attract many of you.

 

2-YEAR WARRANTY

We are confident about the quality of our watches - BEHRENS ORIGINAL watches. Each watch is backed by a 2-year warranty. We have our own factory and watch masters performing quality checks and maintenance everyday before shipping. So rest assured, your precious watches are well taken care of and are ready to give you the most comfortable wearing experience!

 

THE TIMELINE

 

THE MODEL

Spec

 

WHO IS BEHRENS AND WHO ARE WE?

We pledged to inherit Peter Behrens’ (14 April 1868 - 27 February 1940) design philosophy on watchmaking. He was a German architect and designer; and also one of the important figures to the modernist movement.

“...to continue innovating is always been our life goal. All watches are fixed in form and have the design of all looking alike. If we need to break that pattern, we will have to break it from the root -- the movement.”

We have been modifying our own movement since 2012 and testing it for years before revealing it to the world. In honouring his name and his inspiring achievement, we named after him and thus, BEHRENS ORIGINAL.

 

WHAT IS OUR AIM?

Originality! Affordability! Developability!

We are a group of watch enthusiasts who want to make good watches. Our designers and engineers work perfectly for developing new watch system as well as movement modification. If you think we are in the right path. Please do not hesitate to support us. 

 

HANDS-ON

 

PROMOTED BY

promoted by FUND STARTERPACK

So rest assured, your precious watches are well taken care of and are ready to give you the most comfortable wearing experience! THE TIMELINE THE MODELSpec WHO IS BEHRENS AND WHO ARE WE?We pledged to inherit Peter Behrens’ (14 April 1868 - 27 February 1940) design philosophy on watchmaking. He was a German architect and designer; and also one of the important figures to the modernist movement.“...to continue innovating is always been our life goal. All watches are fixed in form and have the design of all looking alike. If we need to break that pattern, we will have to break it from the root -- the movement.”We have been modifying our own movement since 2012 and testing it for years before revealing it to the world. In honouring his name and his inspiring achievement, we named after him and thus, BEHRENS ORIGINAL. WHAT IS OUR AIM?Originality! Affordability! Developability!We are a group of watch enthusiasts who want to make good watches. Our designers and engineers work perfectly for developing new watch system as well as movement modification. If you think we are in the right path. Please do not hesitate to support us.  HANDS-ON PROMOTED BYpromoted by FUND STARTERPACK

story:
Hey everyone! We have great news — Divided By Zero is back on with our third watch collection. Something out of this world taking DBZ design to new heights. The funds were raised successfully for this project, so the watches are in production already! Learn more about the new DBZ watches and get one with the special offer, receiving it along with other backers!
 

Meet our freshest addition to the Divided By Zero collection — the space-influenced Gamma series. Gamma is the first time we're using a luminous filling. And it's the first watch in our ranks where luminosity is part of the design itself!

Since our first project, we’ve followed the initial concept of scientifically approved design. We calculate every part of the design and construction of the watches with the help of actual mathematicians and engineers, combining pure aesthetics with a pragmatic and appealing look. Each collection is devoted to the greatest minds of the past and the present, honoring their remarkable discoveries that left traces in our history. To capture these amazing moments in a wristwatch format is what we aim to achieve with every collection.

The new Gamma series develops the idea even further. It’s the freshest approach to the Divided By Zero concept with new designs, reworked specifications, refreshed case shape, and additional features that are introduced in the series. Look for the decorative luminous filling that shapes and finalizes the look of each model.

While working on the final look of the new series, we determined that we want to remove all design boundaries that limited us before. With Gamma we present a wider variety of available options to choose from — from a classic appearance to the most unusual looks that seem to be out of this world. It’s up to you to choose how whimsical your new Divided By Zero watch will look!

The Gamma series is using the multi-layered Swiss Super-LumiNova® by Tritec. We chose this company because of their almost century-long history in the creation of afterglow pigments and the superior quality of lume they're so proud of. This luminous material is the best solution for wristwatches, 100% Swiss made and and provides the strongest and colorful afterglow as well as totally safe for health of the wearer.

This is our third project, so we’ve received feedback on our previous watch collections. Here’s what some of our supporters tell us about their Alpha and Beta timepieces:

 

Meet the Gamma series NASA Edition!

 

Here's the newest member to the Gamma series — the special NASA edition! The new collection is created with an approval from NASA itself, commemorating their great contribution as the modern conquerors and scholars of Space. Our current project is inspired with Space mysteries, discoveries and studies and we felt that getting the support from NASA on our inverted counterpart to the series would be the perfect thing to do. Now we're proudly present you the exclusive addition to the Gamma series!



ARMSTRONG & ALDRIN WATCH

The Armstrong and Aldrin watches are inspired with the famous pair of astronauts that made the first steps of humanity on the moon surface during the Appollo-11 expedition. 
 


SHEPARD & GRISSOM WATCH

The Grissom and Shepard watches are inspired with the out-of-this-world achievements and interestingly similar space biography of Al Shepard and Gus Grissom, the prominent NASA astronauts and commanders. 

 

Learn more about the new models below and pick your favorite!

Meet the Bruno model, a reference to schematic and simplistic observations on Space in the past.

This model brings you back to the past when people could build their own expectations and ideas about Space, giving birth to beautiful fantasies and harmless delusions, that led to a lot of fascinating folklore tales and stories.

The Bruno watch has a minimalist design that resembles a rough model of our Solar system. In the center of the dial is the Sun, with small orbs representing the planets, and blue traces their orbits, including the logo area and the date window. The futuristic landscape looks even more enigmatic with the lights off.

 

We usually name our watches in each collection after famous Ancient and Renaissance scientists. Could we leave our beloved greatest minds of the past out of the picture? Of course not! This model is named after Giordano Bruno and inspired by his research on the Solar system.

Looking for something even more unconventional? The next watch is just for you!

The Hevelius model is a transparent reference to one of the most famous and spectacular celestial bodies — the Moon, celebrating the everlasting Moon-changing cycle.

The moon’s cycle perfectly inspires the design idea — it can be spotted and observed under certain circumstances, and you’re able to appreciate its beauty at night, just as with this watch! To create an optical illusion of volume, the schematic shape of the Moon in its different phases is printed directly on the crystal.

The main attraction of the Hevelius is its bold design that features an image of the moon that is waning, partly concealed under the dial. Thanks to the strong luminous pigment on the sky-blue parts of the design, at night and in dark areas you’ll be able to catch the concealing Moon right on your wrist.

The Hevelius model is named after the astronomer Johannes Hevelius. He was one of the most notable researchers of the Moon surface, its nature and published the first treatise that was entirely dedicated to Moon as well as was the the author of the first telescopic representation of this enigmatic celestial body.

Interested in something more DBZ-like? See the next watch!

Designing this model was the greatest challenge. It's really difficult to add a more or less classic watch to a series when you're going all out creatively with other designs. However, looks like we managed to achieve the desired results, so meet the Villard watch.

Once again science is our helper! Did you know that gamma radiation could be older than Earth itself? Just like this theory, we see classic watches as the ancestors of any modern designer watch.

Preserving Divided By Zero's heritage, this watch offers a standard layout with traditional hour and minute indexes, calculated and designed with an engineering approach and precision. And we simply couldn't avoid adding a small design twist — the dial is engraved with thin concentric circles referring to the dispersion of gamma radiation.

This watch is our commemoration to Paul Villard and his notable work in the discovery of the nature of gamma rays.

Seeking pure design? Take a look at the last watch in the series!

The Hawking model is a conceptual reference to the attempts to find order in the chaotic reaches of Space.

Many greatest minds tried and keep trying to understand Space and its rules. The Hawking watch allows you to wear a balanced coexistence of chaos and order on your wrist.

The Hawking model offers the aesthetic of combining a contrasting blue concentric texture on the dial with white stitching printed across it. That achieves a mesmerizing effect where one layer corresponds to another, especially with the lume active. Add a cool minimalist impression and you get the most enigmatic watch in the Gamma series!

This watch bears the name of Stephen Hawking, the pioneer of the most discoveries about the structure of the Universe, his life’s work now commemorated by our watch.

Have you decided which one you like most? Or maybe it's all of them? Read more below about the specifications of the watch series to understand Gamma better.

The new Gamma series keeps evolving along with our brand and offers several interesting features and improvements that develop further both the technical aspects and design aesthetics of our watches.

The most notable adjustment is the new case that we developed from scratch and shaped after a spaceship’s saucer. It's your navigator for traveling into the deepest corners of the Divided By Zero design! The case has an engineering touch also, bearing several hollow points to make it feel lighter and more comfortable.

The back lid has a concentric concave shape to maintain the futuristic look and to add an ethereal feeling. Another accompanying feature is flexible lugs for the utmost comfort in wearing our watch.

The watch face has some new features, too! First of all, the Swiss Super-LumiNova® afterglow that completes the design of the dial, highlighting it in the dark. It's achieved by creating several layers of the dial design, filling the lowest layer with a luminous material. We also reworked our integral second hand to make it more fitting to the design concept.

The overall design palette is traditional to the Divided By Zero identity. The black color prevails in the strap, dial, and construction with inserts of our signature blue color, implemented both in watch and strap design. We keep working on the watch straps since our first campaign, always improving them according to feedback from our backers!

All watches in the Gamma series continue to follow standards raised by the previous collections, developing several features even more than before. Each watch has a black PVD-coating on steel parts, a new reworked case which weighs lighter than the predecessor, and it runs on Japanese-made Miyota 1S13 movement. All timepieces from the Gamma series are equipped with black leather straps with a signature blue edging. All dials are decorated with the multi-layered Swiss Super-LumiNova® afterglow coating by the renowned Tritec company. 

Want to know how we developed it? The next chapter will explain how it wasn’t an easy task at all.

We’ve been in the watch industry for three years, so the development of each new collection is always a challenge for us. Every time we want to eclipse our previous success, make the design even more interesting than before, and exceed our limits. We’re not beginners anymore, but the rules are the same; bring something new to catch the attention of watch and design aficionados, as well as, offer something captivating for our previous backers.

That’s how we’ve been spending our time for the past year. Previously, we stuck to minimalist designs limited to strict functionality. But this time, we decided to add bolder moves to the final design, making it not only enjoyable for the wearer but also to stand out and highlight the design on first sight.

We tried dozens of designs and researched tons of scientific works and discoveries to find the most fitting combinations for the Gamma series. Some of the old concepts and sketches you may have seen us sharing with our backers here and on social media. So you can measure the progress, comparing previous versions with the final result you see here! Hope our excellent work catches your attention :)

Once again, we're doing all we can to deliver our watches to you with the best price possible! 

We were able to establish a reliable logistics system and cut a lot of unnecessary mediators on the way from us to your wrists, thanks to crowdfunding!

Since we'll be distributing our watches to you straight from the manufacturer, you'll avoid the usual stages of obtaining your merchandise. You won't be paying for extra expenses that most watches include when they hit the market.

Such favorable conditions and a strong and reliable bond with the manufacturer allow us to offer you a reasonable price tag on any DBZ Gamma watch of your choice. The discount increases even more when using the multiples rewards!

There are a lot of things to do to complete our campaign and make our backers happy with their new watches. We managed to reduce production and post-production periods on every stage to a minimum without loss of quality.

Gamma is our third project, so we have enough experience to provide the most optimal production plan. In our previous campaigns, we even managed to deliver the watches ahead of schedule, which is definitely an uncommon trait for crowdfunded project, so you have no reasons to worry about the terms at all! All watches are in production already, so all you need is to choose the watch and wait for it to be produced and arrive :)

The Gamma series by DBZ is an ambitious project which needs the help of crowdfunding to hit the market. But if you can't support our cause with funds, you can still influence the fate of the new watches with your digital voice! Please, share our watches with your friends, tell them about us and make it happen! Our success is in your hands. And your feeds :)

https://www.instagram.com/divided0/

https://www.facebook.com/divided0

https://twitter.com/divided0

 

You can get HD images of the Divided By Zero Gamma watches on our Dropbox page. Feel free to use the best we have if you’re a journalist, a blogger or simply like our watches :) For all other press related concerns, please contact us at hello@divided-0.com

story: I need these funds to pay for airfare and accomodations for the four days I will be in Israel and Palestine. All additional funds will be donated to Al Manarah, an Israeli NGO that serves Arabs living with disabilities in Nazareth.
story_txt: I need these funds to pay for airfare and accomodations for the four days I will be in Israel and Palestine.  All additional funds will be donated to Al Manarah, an Israeli NGO that serves Arabs living with disabilities in Nazareth.

story:
Hello! Thanks for visiting this fund-raising page, please can you help?

After realising that there was nowhere that my friends and I could go to buy the kind of clothes we liked I decided to open Ahoy. A shop dedicated to alternative fashion and cool gifts.

Working on a shoe-string budget I managed to acquire premises and with a bit of help fixing it up and adding a coat of paint, we had a beautiful new shop on our hands. 


I’ve done my best with the small budget I had to stock the shop with a decent range of clothing items, but due to wholesalers minimum order restrictions I couldn’t make the range as broad as I’d initially hoped. One of the areas very much under-represented in store is a plus size collection.

My hope is that if I can raise enough money via this campaign, I’ll be able to put in an order for a range of awesome plus size fashions. The closer I get to the funding goal the more diverse that range could be. As it stands, if I meet the fund-raising goal I’ll be able to get a D-rail to hang the clothing on, a set of coat hangers, four different styles of dresses, one style of cardigan and one style of skirt. If I can exceed the funding goal then I’ll be able to increase the variety of styles.

Ladies with fuller figures often get frustrated with the lack of fashion ranges available for them in high street outlets and I want Ahoy to stock clothing they’ll love, but I need your help to do it.


I’ve put together some rewards for you, as a big thanks for helping to raise the seed capital to get the plus size section under-way. These rewards have also been sponsored by loyalty card scheme Independent Lancaster, which aims to promote local independent businesses by encouraging customers to shop locally rather than at national chain brands. They’re very kindly offering to give up to two free loyalty cards (worth £20) to people who donate to the campaign – see the specifics of each reward in the list to the right. These cards will enable you to get discounts, freebies and special offers at over 42 businesses in and around Lancaster for a whole year, plus as more businesses support the card over the year you’ll be able to start getting discounts there too! For more information on the loyalty card you can visit www.independent-lancaster.co.uk

So please can you help me out? Even just a fiver towards it would be great. I’d really like to be able to provide a plus sized section, but I need your help.

Thank you!
